                  def cache_unless(condition, name = {}, options = {}, &block)
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            
            

            

                    cache_if !condition, name, options, &block
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            
            

            

            
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            
            

            

                  # This helper returns the name of a cache key for a given fragment cache
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            
            

            

                  # call. By supplying <tt>skip_digest: true</tt> to cache, the digestion of cache
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            
            

            

                  # fragments can be manually bypassed. This is useful when cache fragments
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            
            

            

                  # cannot be manually expired unless you know the exact key which is the
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            
            

            

                  # case when using memcached.
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            1
            

            

                  def cache_fragment_name(name = {}, skip_digest: nil, digest_path: nil)
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            
            

            

                    if skip_digest
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            
            

            

                      name
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            
            

            

                    else
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            
            

            

                      fragment_name_with_digest(name, digest_path)
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            
            

            

            
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            1
            

            

                  def digest_path_from_template(template) # :nodoc:
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            
            

            

                    digest = Digestor.digest(name: template.virtual_path, format: template.format, finder: lookup_context, dependencies: view_cache_dependencies)
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            
            

            

            
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            
            

            

                    if digest.present?
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            
            

            

                      "#{template.virtual_path}:#{digest}"
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            
            

            

                    else
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            
            

            

                      template.virtual_path
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            
            

            

            
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            1
            

            

                private
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            1
            

            

                  def fragment_name_with_digest(name, digest_path)
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            
            

            

                    name = controller.url_for(name).split("://").last if name.is_a?(Hash)
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            
            

            

            
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            
            

            

                    if @current_template&.virtual_path || digest_path
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            
            

            

                      digest_path ||= digest_path_from_template(@current_template)
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            
            

            

                      [ digest_path, name ]
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            
            

            

                    else
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            
            

            

                      name
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            
            

            

            
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            1
            

            

                  def fragment_for(name = {}, options = nil, &block)
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            
            

            

                    if content = read_fragment_for(name, options)
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            
            

            

                      @view_renderer.cache_hits[@current_template&.virtual_path] = :hit if defined?(@view_renderer)
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            
            

            

                      content
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            
            

            

                    else
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            
            

            

                      @view_renderer.cache_hits[@current_template&.virtual_path] = :miss if defined?(@view_renderer)
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            
            

            

                      write_fragment_for(name, options, &block)
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            
            

            

            
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            1
            

            

                  def read_fragment_for(name, options)
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            
            

            

                    controller.read_fragment(name, options)
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            
            

            

            
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            1
            

            

                  def write_fragment_for(name, options)
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            
            

            

                    pos = output_buffer.length
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            
            

            

                    yield
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            
            

            

                    output_safe = output_buffer.html_safe?
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            
            

            

                    fragment = output_buffer.slice!(pos..-1)
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            
            

            

                    if output_safe
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            
            

            

                      self.output_buffer = output_buffer.class.new(output_buffer)
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260. 
            
            

            

                    controller.write_fragment(name, fragment, options)
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      262. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    262. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      263. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    263. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      264. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    264. 
            
            

            

            end
          
      265.

    lib/action_view/helpers/capture_helper.rb

            # frozen_string_literal: true

            require "active_support/core_ext/string/output_safety"
          
      4.

      5.

            1
            

            

            module ActionView
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            
            

            

              # = Action View Capture Helper
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            1
            

            

              module Helpers #:nodoc:
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            
            

            

                # CaptureHelper exposes methods to let you extract generated markup which
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            
            

            

                # can be used in other parts of a template or layout file.
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            
            

            

                #
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            
            

            

                # It provides a method to capture blocks into variables through capture and
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            
            

            

                # a way to capture a block of markup for use in a layout through {content_for}[rdoc-ref:ActionView::Helpers::CaptureHelper#content_for].
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            1
            

            

                module CaptureHelper
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            
            

            

                  # The capture method extracts part of a template as a String object.
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            
            

            

                  # You can then use this object anywhere in your templates, layout, or helpers.
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            
            

            

                  # The capture method can be used in ERB templates...
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            
            

            

                  #   <% @greeting = capture do %>
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            
            

            

                  #     Welcome to my shiny new web page!  The date and time is
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            
            

            

                  #     <%= Time.now %>
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            
            

            

                  #   <% end %>
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            
            

            

                  # ...and Builder (RXML) templates.
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            
            

            

                  #   @timestamp = capture do
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            
            

            

                  #     "The current timestamp is #{Time.now}."
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            
            

            

                  #   end
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            
            

            

                  # You can then use that variable anywhere else. For example:
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            
            

            

                  #   <html>
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            
            

            

                  #   <head><title><%= @greeting %></title></head>
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            
            

            

                  #   <body>
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            
            

            

                  #   <b><%= @greeting %></b>
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            
            

            

                  #   </body>
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            
            

            

                  #   </html>
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            
            

            

                  # The return of capture is the string generated by the block. For Example:
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            
            

            

                  #   @greeting # => "Welcome to my shiny new web page! The date and time is 2018-09-06 11:09:16 -0500"
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            1
            

            

                  def capture(*args)
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            
            

            

                    value = nil
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            
            

            

                    buffer = with_output_buffer { value = yield(*args) }
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            
            

            

                    if (string = buffer.presence || value) && string.is_a?(String)
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            
            

            

                      ERB::Util.html_escape string
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            
            

            

            
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            
            

            

                  # Calling <tt>content_for</tt> stores a block of markup in an identifier for later use.
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            
            

            

                  # In order to access this stored content in other templates, helper modules
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            
            

            

                  # or the layout, you would pass the identifier as an argument to <tt>content_for</tt>.
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55.

                  # WARNING: <tt>content_for</tt> is ignored in caches. So you shouldn't use it for elements that will be fragment cached.

            1
            

            

                  def content_for(name, content = nil, options = {}, &block)
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            
            

            

                    if content || block_given?
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            
            

            

                      if block_given?
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            
            

            

                        options = content if content
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            
            

            

                        content = capture(&block)
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            
            

            

                      end
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            
            

            

                      if content
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            
            

            

                        options[:flush] ? @view_flow.set(name, content) : @view_flow.append(name, content)
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            
            

            

                      end
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            
            

            

                      nil
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            
            

            

                    else
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            
            

            

                      @view_flow.get(name).presence
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            
            

            

            
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            
            

            

                  # The same as +content_for+ but when used with streaming flushes
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            
            

            

                  # straight back to the layout. In other words, if you want to
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            
            

            

                  # concatenate several times to the same buffer when rendering a given
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            
            

            

                  # template, you should use +content_for+, if not, use +provide+ to tell
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            
            

            

                  # the layout to stop looking for more contents.
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            1
            

            

                  def provide(name, content = nil, &block)
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            
            

            

                    content = capture(&block) if block_given?
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            
            

            

                    result = @view_flow.append!(name, content) if content
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            
            

            

                    result unless content
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            
            

            

            
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            
            

            

                  # <tt>content_for?</tt> checks whether any content has been captured yet using <tt>content_for</tt>.
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            
            

            

                  # Useful to render parts of your layout differently based on what is in your views.
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            
            

            

                  #   <%# This is the layout %>
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            
            

            

                  #   <html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" xml:lang="en" lang="en">
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            
            

            

                  #   <head>
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            
            

            

                  #     <title>My Website</title>
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            
            

            

                  #     <%= yield :script %>
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            
            

            

                  #   </head>
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            
            

            

                  #   <body class="<%= content_for?(:right_col) ? 'two-column' : 'one-column' %>">
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            
            

            

                  #     <%= yield %>
          
      192.

                  #   </html>
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            1
            

            

                  def content_for?(name)
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            
            

            

                    @view_flow.get(name).present?
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            
            

            

            
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            
            

            

                  # Use an alternate output buffer for the duration of the block.
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            
            

            

                  # Defaults to a new empty string.
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            1
            

            

                  def with_output_buffer(buf = nil) #:nodoc:
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            
            

            

                    unless buf
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            
            

            

                      buf = ActionView::OutputBuffer.new
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            
            

            

                      if output_buffer && output_buffer.respond_to?(:encoding)
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            
            

            

                        buf.force_encoding(output_buffer.encoding)
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            
            

            

                      end
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            
            

            

                    self.output_buffer, old_buffer = buf, output_buffer
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            
            

            

                    yield
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            
            

            

                    output_buffer
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            
            

            

                  ensure
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            
            

            

                    self.output_buffer = old_buffer
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            
            

            

            end
          
      217.

              module Helpers #:nodoc:

                # This module keeps all methods and behavior in ActionView
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            
            

            

                # that simply delegates to the controller.
          
      9.

                module ControllerHelper #:nodoc:
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            1
            

            

                  attr_internal :controller, :request
          
      11.

                  CONTROLLER_DELEGATES = [:request_forgery_protection_token, :params,
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            
            

            

                    :session, :cookies, :response, :headers, :flash, :action_name,

                    :controller_name, :controller_path]

            1
            

            

                  delegate(*CONTROLLER_DELEGATES, to: :controller)
          
      17.

      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            1
            

            

                  def assign_controller(controller)
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            
            

            

                    if @_controller = controller
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            
            

            

                      @_request = controller.request if controller.respond_to?(:request)
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            
            

            

                      @_config  = controller.config.inheritable_copy if controller.respond_to?(:config)
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            
            

            

                      @_default_form_builder = controller.default_form_builder if controller.respond_to?(:default_form_builder)
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            
            

            

            
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            1
            

            

                  def logger
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            
            

            

                    controller.logger if controller.respond_to?(:logger)
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            
            

            

            
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            1
            

            

                  def respond_to?(method_name, include_private = false)
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            
            

            

                    return controller.respond_to?(method_name) if CONTROLLER_DELEGATES.include?(method_name.to_sym)
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            
            

            

                    super
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            
            

            

                  end

                      options[:name] = "csp-nonce"

                  # request forgery protection parameter and token, respectively.

                  def csrf_meta_tags

                    if defined?(protect_against_forgery?) && protect_against_forgery?

      25.
