                  end
          
      592. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    592. 
            
            

            

            
          
      593. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    593. 
            
            

            

                  # Returns a select tag with options for each of the months January through December with the current month
          
      594. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    594. 
            
            

            

                  # selected. The month names are presented as keys (what's shown to the user) and the month numbers (1-12) are
          
      595. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    595. 
            
            

            

                  # used as values (what's submitted to the server). It's also possible to use month numbers for the presentation
          
      596. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    596. 
            
            

            

                  # instead of names -- set the <tt>:use_month_numbers</tt> key in +options+ to true for this to happen. If you
          
      597. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    597. 
            
            

            

                  # want both numbers and names, set the <tt>:add_month_numbers</tt> key in +options+ to true. If you would prefer
          
      598. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    598. 
            
            

            

                  # to show month names as abbreviations, set the <tt>:use_short_month</tt> key in +options+ to true. If you want
          
      599. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    599. 
            
            

            

                  # to use your own month names, set the <tt>:use_month_names</tt> key in +options+ to an array of 12 month names.
          
      600. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    600. 
            
            

            

                  # If you want to display months with a leading zero set the <tt>:use_two_digit_numbers</tt> key in +options+ to true.
          
      601. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    601. 
            
            

            

                  # Override the field name using the <tt>:field_name</tt> option, 'month' by default.
          
      602. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    602. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      603. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    603. 
            
            

            

                  #   # Generates a select field for months that defaults to the current month that
          
      604. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    604. 
            
            

            

                  #   # will use keys like "January", "March".
          
      605. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    605. 
            
            

            

                  #   select_month(Date.today)
          
      606. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    606. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      607. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    607. 
            
            

            

                  #   # Generates a select field for months that defaults to the current month that
          
      608. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    608. 
            
            

            

                  #   # is named "start" rather than "month".
          
      609. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    609. 
            
            

            

                  #   select_month(Date.today, field_name: 'start')
          
      610. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    610. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      611. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    611. 
            
            

            

                  #   # Generates a select field for months that defaults to the current month that
          
      612. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    612. 
            
            

            

                  #   # will use keys like "1", "3".
          
      613. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    613. 
            
            

            

                  #   select_month(Date.today, use_month_numbers: true)
          
      614. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    614. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      615. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    615. 
            
            

            

                  #   # Generates a select field for months that defaults to the current month that
          
      616. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    616. 
            
            

            

                  #   # will use keys like "1 - January", "3 - March".
          
      617. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    617. 
            
            

            

                  #   select_month(Date.today, add_month_numbers: true)
          
      618. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    618. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      619. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    619. 
            
            

            

                  #   # Generates a select field for months that defaults to the current month that
          
      620. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    620. 
            
            

            

                  #   # will use keys like "Jan", "Mar".
          
      621. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    621. 
            
            

            

                  #   select_month(Date.today, use_short_month: true)
          
      622. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    622. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      623. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    623. 
            
            

            

                  #   # Generates a select field for months that defaults to the current month that
          
      624. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    624. 
            
            

            

                  #   # will use keys like "Januar", "Marts."
          
      625. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    625. 
            
            

            

                  #   select_month(Date.today, use_month_names: %w(Januar Februar Marts ...))
          
      626. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    626. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      627. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    627. 
            
            

            

                  #   # Generates a select field for months that defaults to the current month that
          
      628. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    628. 
            
            

            

                  #   # will use keys with two digit numbers like "01", "03".
          
      629. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    629. 
            
            

            

                  #   select_month(Date.today, use_two_digit_numbers: true)
          
      630. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    630. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      631. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    631. 
            
            

            

                  #   # Generates a select field for months with a custom prompt. Use <tt>prompt: true</tt> for a
          
      632. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    632. 
            
            

            

                  #   # generic prompt.
          
      633. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    633. 
            
            

            

                  #   select_month(14, prompt: 'Choose month')
          
      634. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    634. 
            1
            

            

                  def select_month(date, options = {}, html_options = {})
          
      635. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    635. 
            
            

            

                    DateTimeSelector.new(date, options, html_options).select_month
          
      636. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    636. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      637. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    637. 
            
            

            

            
          
      638. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    638. 
            
            

            

                  # Returns a select tag with options for each of the five years on each side of the current, which is selected.
          
      639. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    639. 
            
            

            

                  # The five year radius can be changed using the <tt>:start_year</tt> and <tt>:end_year</tt> keys in the
          
      640. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    640. 
            
            

            

                  # +options+. Both ascending and descending year lists are supported by making <tt>:start_year</tt> less than or
          
      641. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    641. 
            
            

            

                  # greater than <tt>:end_year</tt>. The <tt>date</tt> can also be substituted for a year given as a number.
          
      642. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    642. 
            
            

            

                  # Override the field name using the <tt>:field_name</tt> option, 'year' by default.
          
      643. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    643. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      644. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    644. 
            
            

            

                  #   # Generates a select field for years that defaults to the current year that
          
      645. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    645. 
            
            

            

                  #   # has ascending year values.
          
      646. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    646. 
            
            

            

                  #   select_year(Date.today, start_year: 1992, end_year: 2007)
          
      647. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    647. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      648. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    648. 
            
            

            

                  #   # Generates a select field for years that defaults to the current year that
          
      649. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    649. 
            
            

            

                  #   # is named 'birth' rather than 'year'.
          
      650. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    650. 
            
            

            

                  #   select_year(Date.today, field_name: 'birth')
          
      651. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    651. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      652. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    652. 
            
            

            

                  #   # Generates a select field for years that defaults to the current year that
          
      653. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    653. 
            
            

            

                  #   # has descending year values.
          
      654. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    654. 
            
            

            

                  #   select_year(Date.today, start_year: 2005, end_year: 1900)
          
      655. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    655. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      656. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    656. 
            
            

            

                  #   # Generates a select field for years that defaults to the year 2006 that
          
      657. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    657. 
            
            

            

                  #   # has ascending year values.
          
      658. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    658. 
            
            

            

                  #   select_year(2006, start_year: 2000, end_year: 2010)
          
      659. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    659. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      660. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    660. 
            
            

            

                  #   # Generates a select field for years with a custom prompt. Use <tt>prompt: true</tt> for a
          
      661. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    661. 
            
            

            

                  #   # generic prompt.
          
      662. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    662. 
            
            

            

                  #   select_year(14, prompt: 'Choose year')
          
      663. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    663. 
            1
            

            

                  def select_year(date, options = {}, html_options = {})
          
      664. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    664. 
            
            

            

                    DateTimeSelector.new(date, options, html_options).select_year
          
      665. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    665. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      666. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    666. 
            
            

            

            
          
      667. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    667. 
            
            

            

                  # Returns an HTML time tag for the given date or time.
          
      668. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    668. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      669. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    669. 
            
            

            

                  #   time_tag Date.today  # =>
          
      670. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    670. 
            
            

            

                  #     <time datetime="2010-11-04">November 04, 2010</time>
          
      671. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    671. 
            
            

            

                  #   time_tag Time.now  # =>
          
      672. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    672. 
            
            

            

                  #     <time datetime="2010-11-04T17:55:45+01:00">November 04, 2010 17:55</time>
          
      673. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    673. 
            
            

            

                  #   time_tag Date.yesterday, 'Yesterday'  # =>
          
      674. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    674. 
            
            

            

                  #     <time datetime="2010-11-03">Yesterday</time>
          
      675. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    675. 
            
            

            

                  #   time_tag Date.today, datetime: Date.today.strftime('%G-W%V') # =>
          
      676. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    676. 
            
            

            

                  #     <time datetime="2010-W44">November 04, 2010</time>
          
      677. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    677. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      678. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    678. 
            
            

            

                  #   <%= time_tag Time.now do %>
          
      679. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    679. 
            
            

            

                  #     <span>Right now</span>
          
      680. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    680. 
            
            

            

                  #   <% end %>
          
      681. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    681. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <time datetime="2010-11-04T17:55:45+01:00"><span>Right now</span></time>
          
      682. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    682. 
            1
            

            

                  def time_tag(date_or_time, *args, &block)
          
      683. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    683. 
            
            

            

                    options  = args.extract_options!
          
      684. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    684. 
            
            

            

                    format   = options.delete(:format) || :long
          
      685. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    685. 
            
            

            

                    content  = args.first || I18n.l(date_or_time, format: format)
          
      686. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    686. 
            
            

            

            
          
      687. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    687. 
            
            

            

                    content_tag("time", content, options.reverse_merge(datetime: date_or_time.iso8601), &block)
          
      688. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    688. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      689. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    689. 
            
            

            

            
          
      690. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    690. 
            1
            

            

                  private
          
      691. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    691. 
            1
            

            

                    def normalize_distance_of_time_argument_to_time(value)
          
      692. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    692. 
            
            

            

                      if value.is_a?(Numeric)
          
      693. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    693. 
            
            

            

                        Time.at(value)
          
      694. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    694. 
            
            

            

                      elsif value.respond_to?(:to_time)
          
      695. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    695. 
            
            

            

                        value.to_time
          
      696. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    696. 
            
            

            

                      else
          
      697. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    697. 
            
            

            

                        raise ArgumentError, "#{value.inspect} can't be converted to a Time value"
          
      698. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    698. 
            
            

            

                      end
          
      699. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    699. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      700. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    700. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      701. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    701. 
            
            

            

            
          
      702. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    702. 
            1
            

            

                class DateTimeSelector #:nodoc:
          
      703. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    703. 
            1
            

            

                  include ActionView::Helpers::TagHelper
          
      704. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    704. 
            
            

            

            
          
      705. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    705. 
            1
            

            

                  DEFAULT_PREFIX = "date"
          
      706. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    706. 
            1
            

            

                  POSITION = {
          
      707. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    707. 
            
            

            

                    year: 1, month: 2, day: 3, hour: 4, minute: 5, second: 6
          
      708. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    708. 
            
            

            

                  }.freeze
          
      709. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    709. 
            
            

            

            
          
      710. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    710. 
            1
            

            

                  AMPM_TRANSLATION = Hash[
          
      711. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    711. 
            
            

            

                    [[0, "12 AM"], [1, "01 AM"], [2, "02 AM"], [3, "03 AM"],
          
      712. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    712. 
            
            

            

                     [4, "04 AM"], [5, "05 AM"], [6, "06 AM"], [7, "07 AM"],
          
      713. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    713. 
            
            

            

                     [8, "08 AM"], [9, "09 AM"], [10, "10 AM"], [11, "11 AM"],
          
      714. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    714. 
            
            

            

                     [12, "12 PM"], [13, "01 PM"], [14, "02 PM"], [15, "03 PM"],
          
      715. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    715. 
            
            

            

                     [16, "04 PM"], [17, "05 PM"], [18, "06 PM"], [19, "07 PM"],
          
      716. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    716. 
            
            

            

                     [20, "08 PM"], [21, "09 PM"], [22, "10 PM"], [23, "11 PM"]]
          
      717. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    717. 
            
            

            

                  ].freeze
          
      718. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    718. 
            
            

            

            
          
      719. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    719. 
            1
            

            

                  def initialize(datetime, options = {}, html_options = {})
          
      720. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    720. 
            
            

            

                    @options      = options.dup
          
      721. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    721. 
            
            

            

                    @html_options = html_options.dup
          
      722. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    722. 
            
            

            

                    @datetime     = datetime
          
      723. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    723. 
            
            

            

                    @options[:datetime_separator] ||= " &mdash; "
          
      724. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    724. 
            
            

            

                    @options[:time_separator]     ||= " : "
          
      725. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    725. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      726. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    726. 
            
            

            

            
          
      727. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    727. 
            1
            

            

                  def select_datetime
          
      728. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    728. 
            
            

            

                    order = date_order.dup
          
      729. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    729. 
            
            

            

                    order -= [:hour, :minute, :second]
          
      730. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    730. 
            
            

            

                    @options[:discard_year]   ||= true unless order.include?(:year)
          
      731. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    731. 
            
            

            

                    @options[:discard_month]  ||= true unless order.include?(:month)
          
      732. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    732. 
            
            

            

                    @options[:discard_day]    ||= true if @options[:discard_month] || !order.include?(:day)
          
      733. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    733. 
            
            

            

                    @options[:discard_minute] ||= true if @options[:discard_hour]
          
      734. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    734. 
            
            

            

                    @options[:discard_second] ||= true unless @options[:include_seconds] && !@options[:discard_minute]
          
      735. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    735. 
            
            

            

            
          
      736. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    736. 
            
            

            

                    set_day_if_discarded
          
      737. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    737. 
            
            

            

            
          
      738. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    738. 
            
            

            

                    if @options[:tag] && @options[:ignore_date]
          
      739. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    739. 
            
            

            

                      select_time
          
      740. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    740. 
            
            

            

                    else
          
      741. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    741. 
            
            

            

                      [:day, :month, :year].each { |o| order.unshift(o) unless order.include?(o) }
          
      742. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    742. 
            
            

            

                      order += [:hour, :minute, :second] unless @options[:discard_hour]
          
      743. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    743. 
            
            

            

            
          
      744. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    744. 
            
            

            

                      build_selects_from_types(order)
          
      745. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    745. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      746. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    746. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      747. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    747. 
            
            

            

            
          
      748. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    748. 
            1
            

            

                  def select_date
          
      749. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    749. 
            
            

            

                    order = date_order.dup
          
      750. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    750. 
            
            

            

            
          
      751. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    751. 
            
            

            

                    @options[:discard_hour]     = true
          
      752. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    752. 
            
            

            

                    @options[:discard_minute]   = true
          
      753. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    753. 
            
            

            

                    @options[:discard_second]   = true
          
      754. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    754. 
            
            

            

            
          
      755. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    755. 
            
            

            

                    @options[:discard_year]   ||= true unless order.include?(:year)
          
      756. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    756. 
            
            

            

                    @options[:discard_month]  ||= true unless order.include?(:month)
          
      757. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    757. 
            
            

            

                    @options[:discard_day]    ||= true if @options[:discard_month] || !order.include?(:day)
          
      758. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    758. 
            
            

            

            
          
      759. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    759. 
            
            

            

                    set_day_if_discarded
          
      760. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    760. 
            
            

            

            
          
      761. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    761. 
            
            

            

                    [:day, :month, :year].each { |o| order.unshift(o) unless order.include?(o) }
          
      762. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    762. 
            
            

            

            
          
      763. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    763. 
            
            

            

                    build_selects_from_types(order)
          
      764. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    764. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      765. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    765. 
            
            

            

            
          
      766. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    766. 
            1
            

            

                  def select_time
          
      767. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    767. 
            
            

            

                    order = []
          
      768. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    768. 
            
            

            

            
          
      769. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    769. 
            
            

            

                    @options[:discard_month]    = true
          
      770. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    770. 
            
            

            

                    @options[:discard_year]     = true
          
      771. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    771. 
            
            

            

                    @options[:discard_day]      = true
          
      772. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    772. 
            
            

            

                    @options[:discard_second] ||= true unless @options[:include_seconds]
          
      773. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    773. 
            
            

            

            
          
      774. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    774. 
            
            

            

                    order += [:year, :month, :day] unless @options[:ignore_date]
          
      775. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    775. 
            
            

            

            
          
      776. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    776. 
            
            

            

                    order += [:hour, :minute]
          
      777. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    777. 
            
            

            

                    order << :second if @options[:include_seconds]
          
      778. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    778. 
            
            

            

            
          
      779. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    779. 
            
            

            

                    build_selects_from_types(order)
          
      780. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    780. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      781. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    781. 
            
            

            

            
          
      782. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    782. 
            1
            

            

                  def select_second
          
      783. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    783. 
            
            

            

                    if @options[:use_hidden] || @options[:discard_second]
          
      784. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    784. 
            
            

            

                      build_hidden(:second, sec) if @options[:include_seconds]
          
      785. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    785. 
            
            

            

                    else
          
      786. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    786. 
            
            

            

                      build_options_and_select(:second, sec)
          
      787. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    787. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      788. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    788. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      789. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    789. 
            
            

            

            
          
      790. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    790. 
            1
            

            

                  def select_minute
          
      791. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    791. 
            
            

            

                    if @options[:use_hidden] || @options[:discard_minute]
          
      792. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    792. 
            
            

            

                      build_hidden(:minute, min)
          
      793. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    793. 
            
            

            

                    else
          
      794. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    794. 
            
            

            

                      build_options_and_select(:minute, min, step: @options[:minute_step])
          
      795. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    795. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      796. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    796. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      797. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    797. 
            
            

            

            
          
      798. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    798. 
            1
            

            

                  def select_hour
          
      799. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    799. 
            
            

            

                    if @options[:use_hidden] || @options[:discard_hour]
          
      800. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    800. 
            
            

            

                      build_hidden(:hour, hour)
          
      801. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    801. 
            
            

            

                    else
          
      802. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    802. 
            
            

            

                      options         = {}
          
      803. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    803. 
            
            

            

                      options[:ampm]  = @options[:ampm] || false
          
      804. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    804. 
            
            

            

                      options[:start] = @options[:start_hour] || 0
          
      805. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    805. 
            
            

            

                      options[:end]   = @options[:end_hour] || 23
          
      806. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    806. 
            
            

            

                      build_options_and_select(:hour, hour, options)
          
      807. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    807. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      808. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    808. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      809. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    809. 
            
            

            

            
          
      810. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    810. 
            1
            

            

                  def select_day
          
      811. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    811. 
            
            

            

                    if @options[:use_hidden] || @options[:discard_day]
          
      812. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    812. 
            
            

            

                      build_hidden(:day, day || 1)
          
      813. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    813. 
            
            

            

                    else
          
      814. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    814. 
            
            

            

                      build_options_and_select(:day, day, start: 1, end: 31, leading_zeros: false, use_two_digit_numbers: @options[:use_two_digit_numbers])
          
      815. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    815. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      816. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    816. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      817. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    817. 
            
            

            

            
          
      818. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    818. 
            1
            

            

                  def select_month
          
      819. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    819. 
            
            

            

                    if @options[:use_hidden] || @options[:discard_month]
          
      820. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    820. 
            
            

            

                      build_hidden(:month, month || 1)
          
      821. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    821. 
            
            

            

                    else
          
      822. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    822. 
            
            

            

                      month_options = []
          
      823. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    823. 
            
            

            

                      1.upto(12) do |month_number|
          
      824. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    824. 
            
            

            

                        options = { value: month_number }
          
      825. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    825. 
            
            

            

                        options[:selected] = "selected" if month == month_number
          
      826. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    826. 
            
            

            

                        month_options << content_tag("option", month_name(month_number), options) + "\n"
          
      827. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    827. 
            
            

            

                      end
          
      828. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    828. 
            
            

            

                      build_select(:month, month_options.join)
          
      829. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    829. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      830. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    830. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      831. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    831. 
            
            

            

            
          
      832. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    832. 
            1
            

            

                  def select_year
          
      833. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    833. 
            
            

            

                    if !year || @datetime == 0
          
      834. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    834. 
            
            

            

                      val = "1"
          
      835. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    835. 
            
            

            

                      middle_year = Date.today.year
          
      836. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    836. 
            
            

            

                    else
          
      837. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    837. 
            
            

            

                      val = middle_year = year
          
      838. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    838. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      839. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    839. 
            
            

            

            
          
      840. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    840. 
            
            

            

                    if @options[:use_hidden] || @options[:discard_year]
          
      841. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    841. 
            
            

            

                      build_hidden(:year, val)
          
      842. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    842. 
            
            

            

                    else
          
      843. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    843. 
            
            

            

                      options                     = {}
          
      844. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    844. 
            
            

            

                      options[:start]             = @options[:start_year] || middle_year - 5
          
      845. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    845. 
            
            

            

                      options[:end]               = @options[:end_year] || middle_year + 5
          
      846. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    846. 
            
            

            

                      options[:step]              = options[:start] < options[:end] ? 1 : -1
          
      847. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    847. 
            
            

            

                      options[:leading_zeros]     = false
          
      848. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    848. 
            
            

            

                      options[:max_years_allowed] = @options[:max_years_allowed] || 1000
          
      849. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    849. 
            
            

            

            
          
      850. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    850. 
            
            

            

                      if (options[:end] - options[:start]).abs > options[:max_years_allowed]
          
      851. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    851. 
            
            

            

                        raise ArgumentError, "There are too many years options to be built. Are you sure you haven't mistyped something? You can provide the :max_years_allowed parameter."
          
      852. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    852. 
            
            

            

                      end
          
      853. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    853. 
            
            

            

            
          
      854. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    854. 
            
            

            

                      build_select(:year, build_year_options(val, options))
          
      855. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    855. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      856. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    856. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      857. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    857. 
            
            

            

            
          
      858. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    858. 
            1
            

            

                  private
          
      859. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    859. 
            1
            

            

                    %w( sec min hour day month year ).each do |method|
          
      860. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    860. 
            6
            

            

                      define_method(method) do
          
      861. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    861. 
            
            

            

                        case @datetime
          
      862. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    862. 
            
            

            

                        when Hash then @datetime[method.to_sym]
          
      863. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    863. 
            
            

            

                        when Numeric then @datetime
          
      864. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    864. 
            
            

            

                        when nil then nil
          
      865. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    865. 
            
            

            

                        else @datetime.send(method)
          
      866. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    866. 
            
            

            

                        end
          
      867. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    867. 
            
            

            

                      end
          
      868. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    868. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      869. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    869. 
            
            

            

            
          
      870. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    870. 
            
            

            

                    # If the day is hidden, the day should be set to the 1st so all month and year choices are
          
      871. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    871. 
            
            

            

                    # valid. Otherwise, February 31st or February 29th, 2011 can be selected, which are invalid.
          
      872. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    872. 
            1
            

            

                    def set_day_if_discarded
          
      873. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    873. 
            
            

            

                      if @datetime && @options[:discard_day]
          
      874. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    874. 
            
            

            

                        @datetime = @datetime.change(day: 1)
          
      875. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    875. 
            
            

            

                      end
          
      876. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    876. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      877. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    877. 
            
            

            

            
          
      878. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    878. 
            
            

            

                    # Returns translated month names, but also ensures that a custom month
          
      879. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    879. 
            
            

            

                    # name array has a leading +nil+ element.
          
      880. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    880. 
            1
            

            

                    def month_names
          
      881. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    881. 
            
            

            

                      @month_names ||= begin
          
      882. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    882. 
            
            

            

                        month_names = @options[:use_month_names] || translated_month_names
          
      883. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    883. 
            
            

            

                        month_names.unshift(nil) if month_names.size < 13
          
      884. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    884. 
            
            

            

                        month_names
          
      885. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    885. 
            
            

            

                      end
          
      886. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    886. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      887. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    887. 
            
            

            

            
          
      888. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    888. 
            
            

            

                    # Returns translated month names.
          
      889. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    889. 
            
            

            

                    #  => [nil, "January", "February", "March",
          
      890. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    890. 
            
            

            

                    #           "April", "May", "June", "July",
          
      891. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    891. 
            
            

            

                    #           "August", "September", "October",
          
      892. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    892. 
            
            

            

                    #           "November", "December"]
          
      893. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    893. 
            
            

            

                    #
          
      894. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    894. 
            
            

            

                    # If <tt>:use_short_month</tt> option is set
          
      895. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    895. 
            
            

            

                    #  => [nil, "Jan", "Feb", "Mar", "Apr", "May", "Jun",
          
      896. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    896. 
            
            

            

                    #           "Jul", "Aug", "Sep", "Oct", "Nov", "Dec"]
          
      897. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    897. 
            1
            

            

                    def translated_month_names
          
      898. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    898. 
            
            

            

                      key = @options[:use_short_month] ? :'date.abbr_month_names' : :'date.month_names'
          
      899. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    899. 
            
            

            

                      I18n.translate(key, locale: @options[:locale])
          
      900. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    900. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      901. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    901. 
            
            

            

            
          
      902. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    902. 
            
            

            

                    # Looks up month names by number (1-based):
          
      903. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    903. 
            
            

            

                    #
          
      904. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    904. 
            
            

            

                    #   month_name(1) # => "January"
          
      905. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    905. 
            
            

            

                    #
          
      906.

                    # If the <tt>:use_month_numbers</tt> option is passed:

    907. 
            
            

            

                    #

    908. 
            
            

            

                    #   month_name(1) # => 1
          
      909. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    909. 
            
            

            

                    #
          
      910.

                    # If the <tt>:use_two_month_numbers</tt> option is passed:
          
      911.

                    #
          
      912.

                    #   month_name(1) # => '01'
          
      913. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    913. 
            
            

            

                    #
          
      914.

                    # If the <tt>:add_month_numbers</tt> option is passed:
          
      915.

                    #

                    #   month_name(1) # => "1 - January"
          
      917.
