    1519. 
            
            

            

                  # Returns an input tag of type "range".
          
      1520. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1520. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      1521. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1521. 
            
            

            

                  # ==== Options
          
      1522. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1522. 
            
            

            

                  # * Accepts same options as range_field_tag
          
      1523. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1523. 
            1
            

            

                  def range_field(object_name, method, options = {})
          
      1524. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1524. 
            
            

            

                    Tags::RangeField.new(object_name, method, self, options).render
          
      1525. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1525. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      1526. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1526. 
            
            

            

            
          
      1527. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1527. 
            1
            

            

                  private
          
      1528. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1528. 
            1
            

            

                    def html_options_for_form_with(url_for_options = nil, model = nil, html: {}, local: !form_with_generates_remote_forms,
          
      1529. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1529. 
            
            

            

                      skip_enforcing_utf8: nil, **options)
          
      1530. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1530. 
            
            

            

                      html_options = options.slice(:id, :class, :multipart, :method, :data).merge(html)
          
      1531. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1531. 
            
            

            

                      html_options[:method] ||= :patch if model.respond_to?(:persisted?) && model.persisted?
          
      1532. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1532. 
            
            

            

                      html_options[:enforce_utf8] = !skip_enforcing_utf8 unless skip_enforcing_utf8.nil?
          
      1533. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1533. 
            
            

            

            
          
      1534. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1534. 
            
            

            

                      html_options[:enctype] = "multipart/form-data" if html_options.delete(:multipart)
          
      1535. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1535. 
            
            

            

            
          
      1536. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1536. 
            
            

            

                      # The following URL is unescaped, this is just a hash of options, and it is the
          
      1537. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1537. 
            
            

            

                      # responsibility of the caller to escape all the values.
          
      1538. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1538. 
            
            

            

                      html_options[:action] = url_for(url_for_options || {})
          
      1539. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1539. 
            
            

            

                      html_options[:"accept-charset"] = "UTF-8"
          
      1540. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1540. 
            
            

            

                      html_options[:"data-remote"] = true unless local
          
      1541. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1541. 
            
            

            

            
          
      1542. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1542. 
            
            

            

                      html_options[:authenticity_token] = options.delete(:authenticity_token)
          
      1543. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1543. 
            
            

            

            
          
      1544. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1544. 
            
            

            

                      if !local && html_options[:authenticity_token].blank?
          
      1545. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1545. 
            
            

            

                        html_options[:authenticity_token] = embed_authenticity_token_in_remote_forms
          
      1546. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1546. 
            
            

            

                      end
          
      1547. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1547. 
            
            

            

            
          
      1548. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1548. 
            
            

            

                      if html_options[:authenticity_token] == true
          
      1549. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1549. 
            
            

            

                        # Include the default authenticity_token, which is only generated when it's set to nil,
          
      1550. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1550. 
            
            

            

                        # but we needed the true value to override the default of no authenticity_token on data-remote.
          
      1551. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1551. 
            
            

            

                        html_options[:authenticity_token] = nil
          
      1552. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1552. 
            
            

            

                      end
          
      1553. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1553. 
            
            

            

            
          
      1554. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1554. 
            
            

            

                      html_options.stringify_keys!
          
      1555. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1555. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      1556. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1556. 
            
            

            

            
          
      1557. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1557. 
            1
            

            

                    def instantiate_builder(record_name, record_object, options)
          
      1558. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1558. 
            
            

            

                      case record_name
          
      1559. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1559. 
            
            

            

                      when String, Symbol
          
      1560. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1560. 
            
            

            

                        object = record_object
          
      1561. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1561. 
            
            

            

                        object_name = record_name
          
      1562. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1562. 
            
            

            

                      else
          
      1563. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1563. 
            
            

            

                        object = record_name
          
      1564. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1564. 
            
            

            

                        object_name = model_name_from_record_or_class(object).param_key if object
          
      1565. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1565. 
            
            

            

                      end
          
      1566. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1566. 
            
            

            

            
          
      1567. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1567. 
            
            

            

                      builder = options[:builder] || default_form_builder_class
          
      1568. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1568. 
            
            

            

                      builder.new(object_name, object, self, options)
          
      1569. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1569. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      1570. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1570. 
            
            

            

            
          
      1571. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1571. 
            1
            

            

                    def default_form_builder_class
          
      1572. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1572. 
            
            

            

                      builder = default_form_builder || ActionView::Base.default_form_builder
          
      1573. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1573. 
            
            

            

                      builder.respond_to?(:constantize) ? builder.constantize : builder
          
      1574. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1574. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      1575. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1575. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      1576. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1576. 
            
            

            

            
          
      1577. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1577. 
            
            

            

                # A +FormBuilder+ object is associated with a particular model object and
          
      1578. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1578. 
            
            

            

                # allows you to generate fields associated with the model object. The
          
      1579. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1579. 
            
            

            

                # +FormBuilder+ object is yielded when using +form_for+ or +fields_for+.
          
      1580. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1580. 
            
            

            

                # For example:
          
      1581. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1581. 
            
            

            

                #
          
      1582. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1582. 
            
            

            

                #   <%= form_for @person do |person_form| %>
          
      1583. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1583. 
            
            

            

                #     Name: <%= person_form.text_field :name %>
          
      1584. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1584. 
            
            

            

                #     Admin: <%= person_form.check_box :admin %>
          
      1585. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1585. 
            
            

            

                #   <% end %>
          
      1586. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1586. 
            
            

            

                #
          
      1587. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1587. 
            
            

            

                # In the above block, a +FormBuilder+ object is yielded as the
          
      1588. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1588. 
            
            

            

                # +person_form+ variable. This allows you to generate the +text_field+
          
      1589. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1589. 
            
            

            

                # and +check_box+ fields by specifying their eponymous methods, which
          
      1590. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1590. 
            
            

            

                # modify the underlying template and associates the <tt>@person</tt> model object
          
      1591. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1591. 
            
            

            

                # with the form.
          
      1592. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1592. 
            
            

            

                #
          
      1593. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1593. 
            
            

            

                # The +FormBuilder+ object can be thought of as serving as a proxy for the
          
      1594. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1594. 
            
            

            

                # methods in the +FormHelper+ module. This class, however, allows you to
          
      1595. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1595. 
            
            

            

                # call methods with the model object you are building the form for.
          
      1596. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1596. 
            
            

            

                #
          
      1597. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1597. 
            
            

            

                # You can create your own custom FormBuilder templates by subclassing this
          
      1598. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1598. 
            
            

            

                # class. For example:
          
      1599. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1599. 
            
            

            

                #
          
      1600. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1600. 
            
            

            

                #   class MyFormBuilder < ActionView::Helpers::FormBuilder
          
      1601. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1601. 
            
            

            

                #     def div_radio_button(method, tag_value, options = {})
          
      1602. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1602. 
            
            

            

                #       @template.content_tag(:div,
          
      1603. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1603. 
            
            

            

                #         @template.radio_button(
          
      1604. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1604. 
            
            

            

                #           @object_name, method, tag_value, objectify_options(options)
          
      1605. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1605. 
            
            

            

                #         )
          
      1606. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1606. 
            
            

            

                #       )
          
      1607. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1607. 
            
            

            

                #     end
          
      1608. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1608. 
            
            

            

                #   end
          
      1609. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1609. 
            
            

            

                #
          
      1610. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1610. 
            
            

            

                # The above code creates a new method +div_radio_button+ which wraps a div
          
      1611. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1611. 
            
            

            

                # around the new radio button. Note that when options are passed in, you
          
      1612. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1612. 
            
            

            

                # must call +objectify_options+ in order for the model object to get
          
      1613. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1613. 
            
            

            

                # correctly passed to the method. If +objectify_options+ is not called,
          
      1614. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1614. 
            
            

            

                # then the newly created helper will not be linked back to the model.
          
      1615. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1615. 
            
            

            

                #
          
      1616. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1616. 
            
            

            

                # The +div_radio_button+ code from above can now be used as follows:
          
      1617. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1617. 
            
            

            

                #
          
      1618. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1618. 
            
            

            

                #   <%= form_for @person, :builder => MyFormBuilder do |f| %>
          
      1619. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1619. 
            
            

            

                #     I am a child: <%= f.div_radio_button(:admin, "child") %>
          
      1620. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1620. 
            
            

            

                #     I am an adult: <%= f.div_radio_button(:admin, "adult") %>
          
      1621. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1621. 
            
            

            

                #   <% end -%>
          
      1622. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1622. 
            
            

            

                #
          
      1623. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1623. 
            
            

            

                # The standard set of helper methods for form building are located in the
          
      1624. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1624. 
            
            

            

                # +field_helpers+ class attribute.
          
      1625. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1625. 
            1
            

            

                class FormBuilder
          
      1626. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1626. 
            1
            

            

                  include ModelNaming
          
      1627. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1627. 
            
            

            

            
          
      1628. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1628. 
            
            

            

                  # The methods which wrap a form helper call.
          
      1629. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1629. 
            1
            

            

                  class_attribute :field_helpers, default: [
          
      1630. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1630. 
            
            

            

                    :fields_for, :fields, :label, :text_field, :password_field,
          
      1631. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1631. 
            
            

            

                    :hidden_field, :file_field, :text_area, :check_box,
          
      1632. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1632. 
            
            

            

                    :radio_button, :color_field, :search_field,
          
      1633. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1633. 
            
            

            

                    :telephone_field, :phone_field, :date_field,
          
      1634. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1634. 
            
            

            

                    :time_field, :datetime_field, :datetime_local_field,
          
      1635. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1635. 
            
            

            

                    :month_field, :week_field, :url_field, :email_field,
          
      1636. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1636. 
            
            

            

                    :number_field, :range_field
          
      1637. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1637. 
            
            

            

                  ]
          
      1638. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1638. 
            
            

            

            
          
      1639. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1639. 
            1
            

            

                  attr_accessor :object_name, :object, :options
          
      1640. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1640. 
            
            

            

            
          
      1641. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1641. 
            1
            

            

                  attr_reader :multipart, :index
          
      1642. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1642. 
            1
            

            

                  alias :multipart? :multipart
          
      1643. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1643. 
            
            

            

            
          
      1644. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1644. 
            1
            

            

                  def multipart=(multipart)
          
      1645. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1645. 
            
            

            

                    @multipart = multipart
          
      1646. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1646. 
            
            

            

            
          
      1647. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1647. 
            
            

            

                    if parent_builder = @options[:parent_builder]
          
      1648. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1648. 
            
            

            

                      parent_builder.multipart = multipart
          
      1649. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1649. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      1650. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1650. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      1651. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1651. 
            
            

            

            
          
      1652. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1652. 
            1
            

            

                  def self._to_partial_path
          
      1653. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1653. 
            
            

            

                    @_to_partial_path ||= name.demodulize.underscore.sub!(/_builder$/, "")
          
      1654. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1654. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      1655. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1655. 
            
            

            

            
          
      1656. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1656. 
            1
            

            

                  def to_partial_path
          
      1657. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1657. 
            
            

            

                    self.class._to_partial_path
          
      1658. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1658. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      1659. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1659. 
            
            

            

            
          
      1660. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1660. 
            1
            

            

                  def to_model
          
      1661. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1661. 
            
            

            

                    self
          
      1662. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1662. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      1663. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1663. 
            
            

            

            
          
      1664. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1664. 
            1
            

            

                  def initialize(object_name, object, template, options)
          
      1665. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1665. 
            
            

            

                    @nested_child_index = {}
          
      1666. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1666. 
            
            

            

                    @object_name, @object, @template, @options = object_name, object, template, options
          
      1667. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1667. 
            
            

            

                    @default_options = @options ? @options.slice(:index, :namespace, :skip_default_ids, :allow_method_names_outside_object) : {}
          
      1668. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1668. 
            
            

            

                    @default_html_options = @default_options.except(:skip_default_ids, :allow_method_names_outside_object)
          
      1669. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1669. 
            
            

            

            
          
      1670. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1670. 
            
            

            

                    convert_to_legacy_options(@options)
          
      1671. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1671. 
            
            

            

            
          
      1672. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1672. 
            
            

            

                    if @object_name&.end_with?("[]")
          
      1673. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1673. 
            
            

            

                      if (object ||= @template.instance_variable_get("@#{@object_name[0..-3]}")) && object.respond_to?(:to_param)
          
      1674. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1674. 
            
            

            

                        @auto_index = object.to_param
          
      1675. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1675. 
            
            

            

                      else
          
      1676. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1676. 
            
            

            

                        raise ArgumentError, "object[] naming but object param and @object var don't exist or don't respond to to_param: #{object.inspect}"
          
      1677. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1677. 
            
            

            

                      end
          
      1678. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1678. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      1679. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1679. 
            
            

            

            
          
      1680. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1680. 
            
            

            

                    @multipart = nil
          
      1681. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1681. 
            
            

            

                    @index = options[:index] || options[:child_index]
          
      1682. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1682. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      1683. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1683. 
            
            

            

            
          
      1684. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1684. 
            
            

            

                  ##
          
      1685. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1685. 
            
            

            

                  # :method: text_field
          
      1686. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1686. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      1687. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1687. 
            
            

            

                  # :call-seq: text_field(method, options = {})
          
      1688. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1688. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      1689. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1689. 
            
            

            

                  # Wraps ActionView::Helpers::FormHelper#text_field for form builders:
          
      1690. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1690. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      1691. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1691. 
            
            

            

                  #   <%= form_with model: @user do |f| %>
          
      1692. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1692. 
            
            

            

                  #     <%= f.text_field :name %>
          
      1693. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1693. 
            
            

            

                  #   <% end %>
          
      1694. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1694. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      1695. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1695. 
            
            

            

                  # Please refer to the documentation of the base helper for details.
          
      1696. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1696. 
            
            

            

            
          
      1697. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1697. 
            
            

            

                  ##
          
      1698. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1698. 
            
            

            

                  # :method: password_field
          
      1699. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1699. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      1700. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1700. 
            
            

            

                  # :call-seq: password_field(method, options = {})
          
      1701. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1701. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      1702. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1702. 
            
            

            

                  # Wraps ActionView::Helpers::FormHelper#password_field for form builders:
          
      1703. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1703. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      1704. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1704. 
            
            

            

                  #   <%= form_with model: @user do |f| %>
          
      1705. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1705. 
            
            

            

                  #     <%= f.password_field :password %>
          
      1706. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1706. 
            
            

            

                  #   <% end %>
          
      1707. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1707. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      1708. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1708. 
            
            

            

                  # Please refer to the documentation of the base helper for details.
          
      1709. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1709. 
            
            

            

            
          
      1710. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1710. 
            
            

            

                  ##
          
      1711. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1711. 
            
            

            

                  # :method: text_area
          
      1712. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1712. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      1713. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1713. 
            
            

            

                  # :call-seq: text_area(method, options = {})
          
      1714. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1714. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      1715. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1715. 
            
            

            

                  # Wraps ActionView::Helpers::FormHelper#text_area for form builders:
          
      1716. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1716. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      1717. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1717. 
            
            

            

                  #   <%= form_with model: @user do |f| %>
          
      1718. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1718. 
            
            

            

                  #     <%= f.text_area :detail %>
          
      1719. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1719. 
            
            

            

                  #   <% end %>
          
      1720. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1720. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      1721. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1721. 
            
            

            

                  # Please refer to the documentation of the base helper for details.
          
      1722. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1722. 
            
            

            

            
          
      1723. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1723. 
            
            

            

                  ##
          
      1724. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1724. 
            
            

            

                  # :method: color_field
          
      1725. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1725. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      1726. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1726. 
            
            

            

                  # :call-seq: color_field(method, options = {})
          
      1727. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1727. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      1728. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1728. 
            
            

            

                  # Wraps ActionView::Helpers::FormHelper#color_field for form builders:
          
      1729. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1729. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      1730. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1730. 
            
            

            

                  #   <%= form_with model: @user do |f| %>
          
      1731. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1731. 
            
            

            

                  #     <%= f.color_field :favorite_color %>
          
      1732. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1732. 
            
            

            

                  #   <% end %>
          
      1733. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1733. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      1734. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1734. 
            
            

            

                  # Please refer to the documentation of the base helper for details.
          
      1735. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1735. 
            
            

            

            
          
      1736. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1736. 
            
            

            

                  ##
          
      1737. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1737. 
            
            

            

                  # :method: search_field
          
      1738. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1738. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      1739. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1739. 
            
            

            

                  # :call-seq: search_field(method, options = {})
          
      1740.

      1904.
