                  #   # => <select id="people" name="people"><option value="" label=" "></option><option value="1">David</option></select>
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            
            

            

                  #   select_tag "people", options_from_collection_for_select(@people, "id", "name"), include_blank: "All"
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <select id="people" name="people"><option value="">All</option><option value="1">David</option></select>
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            
            

            

                  #   select_tag "people", options_from_collection_for_select(@people, "id", "name"), prompt: "Select something"
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <select id="people" name="people"><option value="">Select something</option><option value="1">David</option></select>
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            
            

            

                  #   select_tag "destination", raw("<option>NYC</option><option>Paris</option><option>Rome</option>"), disabled: true
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <select disabled="disabled" id="destination" name="destination"><option>NYC</option>
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            
            

            

                  #   #    <option>Paris</option><option>Rome</option></select>
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            
            

            

                  #   select_tag "credit_card", options_for_select([ "VISA", "MasterCard" ], "MasterCard")
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <select id="credit_card" name="credit_card"><option>VISA</option>
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            
            

            

                  #   #    <option selected="selected">MasterCard</option></select>
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            1
            

            

                  def select_tag(name, option_tags = nil, options = {})
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            
            

            

                    option_tags ||= ""
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            
            

            

                    html_name = (options[:multiple] == true && !name.end_with?("[]")) ? "#{name}[]" : name
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            
            

            

            
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            
            

            

                    if options.include?(:include_blank)
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            
            

            

                      include_blank = options[:include_blank]
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            
            

            

                      options = options.except(:include_blank)
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            
            

            

                      options_for_blank_options_tag = { value: "" }
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            
            

            

            
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            
            

            

                      if include_blank == true
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            
            

            

                        include_blank = ""
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            
            

            

                        options_for_blank_options_tag[:label] = " "
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            
            

            

                      end
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            
            

            

            
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            
            

            

                      if include_blank
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            
            

            

                        option_tags = content_tag("option", include_blank, options_for_blank_options_tag).safe_concat(option_tags)
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            
            

            

                      end
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            
            

            

            
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            
            

            

                    if prompt = options.delete(:prompt)
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            
            

            

                      option_tags = content_tag("option", prompt, value: "").safe_concat(option_tags)
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            
            

            

            
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            
            

            

                    content_tag "select", option_tags, { "name" => html_name, "id" => sanitize_to_id(name) }.update(options.stringify_keys)
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            
            

            

            
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            
            

            

                  # Creates a standard text field; use these text fields to input smaller chunks of text like a username
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            
            

            

                  # or a search query.
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            
            

            

                  # ==== Options
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            
            

            

                  # * <tt>:disabled</tt> - If set to true, the user will not be able to use this input.
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            
            

            

                  # * <tt>:size</tt> - The number of visible characters that will fit in the input.
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            
            

            

                  # * <tt>:maxlength</tt> - The maximum number of characters that the browser will allow the user to enter.
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            
            

            

                  # * <tt>:placeholder</tt> - The text contained in the field by default which is removed when the field receives focus.
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            
            

            

                  #   If set to true, use a translation is found in the current I18n locale
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            
            

            

                  #   (through helpers.placeholders.<modelname>.<attribute>).
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            
            

            

                  # * Any other key creates standard HTML attributes for the tag.
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            
            

            

                  # ==== Examples
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            
            

            

                  #   text_field_tag 'name'
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <input id="name" name="name" type="text" />
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            
            

            

                  #   text_field_tag 'query', 'Enter your search query here'
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <input id="query" name="query" type="text" value="Enter your search query here" />
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            
            

            

                  #   text_field_tag 'search', nil, placeholder: 'Enter search term...'
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <input id="search" name="search" placeholder="Enter search term..." type="text" />
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            
            

            

                  #   text_field_tag 'request', nil, class: 'special_input'
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <input class="special_input" id="request" name="request" type="text" />
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            
            

            

                  #   text_field_tag 'address', '', size: 75
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <input id="address" name="address" size="75" type="text" value="" />
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            
            

            

                  #   text_field_tag 'zip', nil, maxlength: 5
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <input id="zip" maxlength="5" name="zip" type="text" />
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            
            

            

                  #   text_field_tag 'payment_amount', '$0.00', disabled: true
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <input disabled="disabled" id="payment_amount" name="payment_amount" type="text" value="$0.00" />
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            
            

            

                  #   text_field_tag 'ip', '0.0.0.0', maxlength: 15, size: 20, class: "ip-input"
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <input class="ip-input" id="ip" maxlength="15" name="ip" size="20" type="text" value="0.0.0.0" />
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            1
            

            

                  def text_field_tag(name, value = nil, options = {})
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            
            

            

                    tag :input, { "type" => "text", "name" => name, "id" => sanitize_to_id(name), "value" => value }.update(options.stringify_keys)
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            
            

            

            
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            
            

            

                  # Creates a label element. Accepts a block.
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            
            

            

                  # ==== Options
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            
            

            

                  # * Creates standard HTML attributes for the tag.
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            
            

            

                  # ==== Examples
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            
            

            

                  #   label_tag 'name'
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <label for="name">Name</label>
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            
            

            

                  #   label_tag 'name', 'Your name'
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <label for="name">Your name</label>
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            
            

            

                  #   label_tag 'name', nil, class: 'small_label'
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <label for="name" class="small_label">Name</label>
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            1
            

            

                  def label_tag(name = nil, content_or_options = nil, options = nil, &block)
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            
            

            

                    if block_given? && content_or_options.is_a?(Hash)
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            
            

            

                      options = content_or_options = content_or_options.stringify_keys
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            
            

            

                    else
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            
            

            

                      options ||= {}
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            
            

            

                      options = options.stringify_keys
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            
            

            

                    options["for"] = sanitize_to_id(name) unless name.blank? || options.has_key?("for")
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            
            

            

                    content_tag :label, content_or_options || name.to_s.humanize, options, &block
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            
            

            

            
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            
            

            

                  # Creates a hidden form input field used to transmit data that would be lost due to HTTP's statelessness or
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            
            

            

                  # data that should be hidden from the user.
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            
            

            

                  # ==== Options
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            
            

            

                  # * Creates standard HTML attributes for the tag.
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            
            

            

                  # ==== Examples
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            
            

            

                  #   hidden_field_tag 'tags_list'
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <input id="tags_list" name="tags_list" type="hidden" />
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            
            

            

                  #   hidden_field_tag 'token', 'VUBJKB23UIVI1UU1VOBVI@'
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <input id="token" name="token" type="hidden" value="VUBJKB23UIVI1UU1VOBVI@" />
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            
            

            

                  #   hidden_field_tag 'collected_input', '', onchange: "alert('Input collected!')"
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <input id="collected_input" name="collected_input" onchange="alert('Input collected!')"
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            
            

            

                  #   #    type="hidden" value="" />
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            1
            

            

                  def hidden_field_tag(name, value = nil, options = {})
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            
            

            

                    text_field_tag(name, value, options.merge(type: :hidden))
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            
            

            

            
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            
            

            

                  # Creates a file upload field. If you are using file uploads then you will also need
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            
            

            

                  # to set the multipart option for the form tag:
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            
            

            

                  #   <%= form_tag '/upload', multipart: true do %>
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            
            

            

                  #     <label for="file">File to Upload</label> <%= file_field_tag "file" %>
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            
            

            

                  #     <%= submit_tag %>
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            
            

            

                  #   <% end %>
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            
            

            

                  # The specified URL will then be passed a File object containing the selected file, or if the field
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            
            

            

                  # was left blank, a StringIO object.
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            
            

            

                  # ==== Options
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            
            

            

                  # * Creates standard HTML attributes for the tag.
          
      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260. 
            
            

            

                  # * <tt>:disabled</tt> - If set to true, the user will not be able to use this input.
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261. 
            
            

            

                  # * <tt>:multiple</tt> - If set to true, *in most updated browsers* the user will be allowed to select multiple files.
          
      262. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    262. 
            
            

            

                  # * <tt>:accept</tt> - If set to one or multiple mime-types, the user will be suggested a filter when choosing a file. You still need to set up model validations.
          
      263. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    263. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      264. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    264. 
            
            

            

                  # ==== Examples
          
      265. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    265. 
            
            

            

                  #   file_field_tag 'attachment'
          
      266. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    266. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <input id="attachment" name="attachment" type="file" />
          
      267. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    267. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      268. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    268. 
            
            

            

                  #   file_field_tag 'avatar', class: 'profile_input'
          
      269. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    269. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <input class="profile_input" id="avatar" name="avatar" type="file" />
          
      270. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    270. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      271. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    271. 
            
            

            

                  #   file_field_tag 'picture', disabled: true
          
      272. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    272. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <input disabled="disabled" id="picture" name="picture" type="file" />
          
      273. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    273. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      274. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    274. 
            
            

            

                  #   file_field_tag 'resume', value: '~/resume.doc'
          
      275. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    275. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <input id="resume" name="resume" type="file" value="~/resume.doc" />
          
      276. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    276. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      277. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    277. 
            
            

            

                  #   file_field_tag 'user_pic', accept: 'image/png,image/gif,image/jpeg'
          
      278. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    278. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <input accept="image/png,image/gif,image/jpeg" id="user_pic" name="user_pic" type="file" />
          
      279. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    279. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      280. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    280. 
            
            

            

                  #   file_field_tag 'file', accept: 'text/html', class: 'upload', value: 'index.html'
          
      281. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    281. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <input accept="text/html" class="upload" id="file" name="file" type="file" value="index.html" />
          
      282. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    282. 
            1
            

            

                  def file_field_tag(name, options = {})
          
      283. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    283. 
            
            

            

                    text_field_tag(name, nil, convert_direct_upload_option_to_url(options.merge(type: :file)))
          
      284. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    284. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      285. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    285. 
            
            

            

            
          
      286. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    286. 
            
            

            

                  # Creates a password field, a masked text field that will hide the users input behind a mask character.
          
      287. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    287. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      288. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    288. 
            
            

            

                  # ==== Options
          
      289. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    289. 
            
            

            

                  # * <tt>:disabled</tt> - If set to true, the user will not be able to use this input.
          
      290. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    290. 
            
            

            

                  # * <tt>:size</tt> - The number of visible characters that will fit in the input.
          
      291. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    291. 
            
            

            

                  # * <tt>:maxlength</tt> - The maximum number of characters that the browser will allow the user to enter.
          
      292. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    292. 
            
            

            

                  # * Any other key creates standard HTML attributes for the tag.
          
      293. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    293. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      294. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    294. 
            
            

            

                  # ==== Examples
          
      295. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    295. 
            
            

            

                  #   password_field_tag 'pass'
          
      296. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    296. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <input id="pass" name="pass" type="password" />
          
      297. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    297. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      298. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    298. 
            
            

            

                  #   password_field_tag 'secret', 'Your secret here'
          
      299. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    299. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <input id="secret" name="secret" type="password" value="Your secret here" />
          
      300. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    300. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      301. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    301. 
            
            

            

                  #   password_field_tag 'masked', nil, class: 'masked_input_field'
          
      302. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    302. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <input class="masked_input_field" id="masked" name="masked" type="password" />
          
      303. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    303. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      304. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    304. 
            
            

            

                  #   password_field_tag 'token', '', size: 15
          
      305. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    305. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <input id="token" name="token" size="15" type="password" value="" />
          
      306. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    306. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      307. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    307. 
            
            

            

                  #   password_field_tag 'key', nil, maxlength: 16
          
      308. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    308. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <input id="key" maxlength="16" name="key" type="password" />
          
      309. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    309. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      310. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    310. 
            
            

            

                  #   password_field_tag 'confirm_pass', nil, disabled: true
          
      311. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    311. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <input disabled="disabled" id="confirm_pass" name="confirm_pass" type="password" />
          
      312. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    312. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      313. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    313. 
            
            

            

                  #   password_field_tag 'pin', '1234', maxlength: 4, size: 6, class: "pin_input"
          
      314. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    314. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <input class="pin_input" id="pin" maxlength="4" name="pin" size="6" type="password" value="1234" />
          
      315. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    315. 
            1
            

            

                  def password_field_tag(name = "password", value = nil, options = {})
          
      316. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    316. 
            
            

            

                    text_field_tag(name, value, options.merge(type: :password))
          
      317. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    317. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      318. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    318. 
            
            

            

            
          
      319. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    319. 
            
            

            

                  # Creates a text input area; use a textarea for longer text inputs such as blog posts or descriptions.
          
      320. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    320. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      321. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    321. 
            
            

            

                  # ==== Options
          
      322. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    322. 
            
            

            

                  # * <tt>:size</tt> - A string specifying the dimensions (columns by rows) of the textarea (e.g., "25x10").
          
      323. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    323. 
            
            

            

                  # * <tt>:rows</tt> - Specify the number of rows in the textarea
          
      324. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    324. 
            
            

            

                  # * <tt>:cols</tt> - Specify the number of columns in the textarea
          
      325. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    325. 
            
            

            

                  # * <tt>:disabled</tt> - If set to true, the user will not be able to use this input.
          
      326. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    326. 
            
            

            

                  # * <tt>:escape</tt> - By default, the contents of the text input are HTML escaped.
          
      327. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    327. 
            
            

            

                  #   If you need unescaped contents, set this to false.
          
      328. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    328. 
            
            

            

                  # * Any other key creates standard HTML attributes for the tag.
          
      329. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    329. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      330. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    330. 
            
            

            

                  # ==== Examples
          
      331. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    331. 
            
            

            

                  #   text_area_tag 'post'
          
      332. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    332. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <textarea id="post" name="post"></textarea>
          
      333. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    333. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      334. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    334. 
            
            

            

                  #   text_area_tag 'bio', @user.bio
          
      335. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    335. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <textarea id="bio" name="bio">This is my biography.</textarea>
          
      336. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    336. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      337. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    337. 
            
            

            

                  #   text_area_tag 'body', nil, rows: 10, cols: 25
          
      338. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    338. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <textarea cols="25" id="body" name="body" rows="10"></textarea>
          
      339. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    339. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      340. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    340. 
            
            

            

                  #   text_area_tag 'body', nil, size: "25x10"
          
      341. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    341. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <textarea name="body" id="body" cols="25" rows="10"></textarea>
          
      342. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    342. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      343. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    343. 
            
            

            

                  #   text_area_tag 'description', "Description goes here.", disabled: true
          
      344. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    344. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <textarea disabled="disabled" id="description" name="description">Description goes here.</textarea>
          
      345. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    345. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      346. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    346. 
            
            

            

                  #   text_area_tag 'comment', nil, class: 'comment_input'
          
      347. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    347. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <textarea class="comment_input" id="comment" name="comment"></textarea>
          
      348. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    348. 
            1
            

            

                  def text_area_tag(name, content = nil, options = {})
          
      349. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    349. 
            
            

            

                    options = options.stringify_keys
          
      350. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    350. 
            
            

            

            
          
      351. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    351. 
            
            

            

                    if size = options.delete("size")
          
      352. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    352. 
            
            

            

                      options["cols"], options["rows"] = size.split("x") if size.respond_to?(:split)
          
      353. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    353. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      354. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    354. 
            
            

            

            
          
      355. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    355. 
            
            

            

                    escape = options.delete("escape") { true }
          
      356. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    356. 
            
            

            

                    content = ERB::Util.html_escape(content) if escape
          
      357. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    357. 
            
            

            

            
          
      358. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    358. 
            
            

            

                    content_tag :textarea, content.to_s.html_safe, { "name" => name, "id" => sanitize_to_id(name) }.update(options)
          
      359. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    359. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      360. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    360. 
            
            

            

            
          
      361. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    361. 
            
            

            

                  # Creates a check box form input tag.
          
      362. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    362. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      363. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    363. 
            
            

            

                  # ==== Options
          
      364. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    364. 
            
            

            

                  # * <tt>:disabled</tt> - If set to true, the user will not be able to use this input.
          
      365. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    365. 
            
            

            

                  # * Any other key creates standard HTML options for the tag.
          
      366. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    366. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      367. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    367. 
            
            

            

                  # ==== Examples
          
      368. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    368. 
            
            

            

                  #   check_box_tag 'accept'
          
      369. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    369. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <input id="accept" name="accept" type="checkbox" value="1" />
          
      370. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    370. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      371. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    371. 
            
            

            

                  #   check_box_tag 'rock', 'rock music'
          
      372. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    372. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <input id="rock" name="rock" type="checkbox" value="rock music" />
          
      373. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    373. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      374. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    374. 
            
            

            

                  #   check_box_tag 'receive_email', 'yes', true
          
      375. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    375. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <input checked="checked" id="receive_email" name="receive_email" type="checkbox" value="yes" />
          
      376. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    376. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      377. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    377. 
            
            

            

                  #   check_box_tag 'tos', 'yes', false, class: 'accept_tos'
          
      378. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    378. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <input class="accept_tos" id="tos" name="tos" type="checkbox" value="yes" />
          
      379. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    379. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      380. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    380. 
            
            

            

                  #   check_box_tag 'eula', 'accepted', false, disabled: true
          
      381. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    381. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <input disabled="disabled" id="eula" name="eula" type="checkbox" value="accepted" />
          
      382. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    382. 
            1
            

            

                  def check_box_tag(name, value = "1", checked = false, options = {})
          
      383. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    383. 
            
            

            

                    html_options = { "type" => "checkbox", "name" => name, "id" => sanitize_to_id(name), "value" => value }.update(options.stringify_keys)
          
      384. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    384. 
            
            

            

                    html_options["checked"] = "checked" if checked
          
      385. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    385. 
            
            

            

                    tag :input, html_options
          
      386. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    386. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      387. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    387. 
            
            

            

            
          
      388. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    388. 
            
            

            

                  # Creates a radio button; use groups of radio buttons named the same to allow users to
          
      389. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    389. 
            
            

            

                  # select from a group of options.
          
      390. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    390. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      391. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    391. 
            
            

            

                  # ==== Options
          
      392. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    392. 
            
            

            

                  # * <tt>:disabled</tt> - If set to true, the user will not be able to use this input.
          
      393. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    393. 
            
            

            

                  # * Any other key creates standard HTML options for the tag.
          
      394. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    394. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      395. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    395. 
            
            

            

                  # ==== Examples
          
      396. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    396. 
            
            

            

                  #   radio_button_tag 'favorite_color', 'maroon'
          
      397. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    397. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <input id="favorite_color_maroon" name="favorite_color" type="radio" value="maroon" />
          
      398. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    398. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      399. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    399. 
            
            

            

                  #   radio_button_tag 'receive_updates', 'no', true
          
      400. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    400. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <input checked="checked" id="receive_updates_no" name="receive_updates" type="radio" value="no" />
          
      401. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    401. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      402. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    402. 
            
            

            

                  #   radio_button_tag 'time_slot', "3:00 p.m.", false, disabled: true
          
      403. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    403. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <input disabled="disabled" id="time_slot_3:00_p.m." name="time_slot" type="radio" value="3:00 p.m." />
          
      404. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    404. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      405. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    405. 
            
            

            

                  #   radio_button_tag 'color', "green", true, class: "color_input"
          
      406. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    406. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <input checked="checked" class="color_input" id="color_green" name="color" type="radio" value="green" />
          
      407. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    407. 
            1
            

            

                  def radio_button_tag(name, value, checked = false, options = {})
          
      408. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    408. 
            
            

            

                    html_options = { "type" => "radio", "name" => name, "id" => "#{sanitize_to_id(name)}_#{sanitize_to_id(value)}", "value" => value }.update(options.stringify_keys)
          
      409. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    409. 
            
            

            

                    html_options["checked"] = "checked" if checked
          
      410. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    410. 
            
            

            

                    tag :input, html_options
          
      411. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    411. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      412. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    412. 
            
            

            

            
          
      413. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    413. 
            
            

            

                  # Creates a submit button with the text <tt>value</tt> as the caption.
          
      414. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    414. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      415. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    415. 
            
            

            

                  # ==== Options
          
      416. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    416. 
            
            

            

                  # * <tt>:data</tt> - This option can be used to add custom data attributes.
          
      417. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    417. 
            
            

            

                  # * <tt>:disabled</tt> - If true, the user will not be able to use this input.
          
      418. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    418. 
            
            

            

                  # * Any other key creates standard HTML options for the tag.
          
      419. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    419. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      420. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    420. 
            
            

            

                  # ==== Data attributes
          
      421. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    421. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      422. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    422. 
            
            

            

                  # * <tt>confirm: 'question?'</tt> - If present the unobtrusive JavaScript
          
      423. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    423. 
            
            

            

                  #   drivers will provide a prompt with the question specified. If the user accepts,
          
      424. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    424. 
            
            

            

                  #   the form is processed normally, otherwise no action is taken.
          
      425. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    425. 
            
            

            

                  # * <tt>:disable_with</tt> - Value of this parameter will be used as the value for a
          
      426. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    426. 
            
            

            

                  #   disabled version of the submit button when the form is submitted. This feature is
          
      427. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    427. 
            
            

            

                  #   provided by the unobtrusive JavaScript driver. To disable this feature for a single submit tag
          
      428. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    428. 
            
            

            

                  #   pass <tt>:data => { disable_with: false }</tt> Defaults to value attribute.
          
      429. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    429. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      430. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    430. 
            
            

            

                  # ==== Examples
          
      431. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    431. 
            
            

            

                  #   submit_tag
          
      432. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    432. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <input name="commit" data-disable-with="Save changes" type="submit" value="Save changes" />
          
      433. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    433. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      434. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    434. 
            
            

            

                  #   submit_tag "Edit this article"
          
      435. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    435. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <input name="commit" data-disable-with="Edit this article" type="submit" value="Edit this article" />
          
      436. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    436. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      437. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    437. 
            
            

            

                  #   submit_tag "Save edits", disabled: true
          
      438. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    438. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <input disabled="disabled" name="commit" data-disable-with="Save edits" type="submit" value="Save edits" />
          
      439. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    439. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      440. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    440. 
            
            

            

                  #   submit_tag "Complete sale", data: { disable_with: "Submitting..." }
          
      441. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    441. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <input name="commit" data-disable-with="Submitting..." type="submit" value="Complete sale" />
          
      442. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    442. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      443. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    443. 
            
            

            

                  #   submit_tag nil, class: "form_submit"
          
      444. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    444. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <input class="form_submit" name="commit" type="submit" />
          
      445. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    445. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      446. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    446. 
            
            

            

                  #   submit_tag "Edit", class: "edit_button"
          
      447. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    447. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <input class="edit_button" data-disable-with="Edit" name="commit" type="submit" value="Edit" />
          
      448. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    448. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      449. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    449. 
            
            

            

                  #   submit_tag "Save", data: { confirm: "Are you sure?" }
          
      450. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    450. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <input name='commit' type='submit' value='Save' data-disable-with="Save" data-confirm="Are you sure?" />
          
      451. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    451. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      452. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    452. 
            1
            

            

                  def submit_tag(value = "Save changes", options = {})
          
      453. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    453. 
            
            

            

                    options = options.deep_stringify_keys
          
      454. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    454. 
            
            

            

                    tag_options = { "type" => "submit", "name" => "commit", "value" => value }.update(options)
          
      455. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    455. 
            
            

            

                    set_default_disable_with value, tag_options
          
      456. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    456. 
            
            

            

                    tag :input, tag_options
          
      457. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    457. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      458. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    458. 
            
            

            

            
          
      459. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    459. 
            
            

            

                  # Creates a button element that defines a <tt>submit</tt> button,
          
      460. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    460. 
            
            

            

                  # <tt>reset</tt> button or a generic button which can be used in
          
      461. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    461. 
            
            

            

                  # JavaScript, for example. You can use the button tag as a regular
          
      462. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    462. 
            
            

            

                  # submit tag but it isn't supported in legacy browsers. However,
          
      463. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    463. 
            
            

            

                  # the button tag does allow for richer labels such as images and emphasis,
          
      464. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    464. 
            
            

            

                  # so this helper will also accept a block. By default, it will create
          
      465. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    465. 
            
            

            

                  # a button tag with type <tt>submit</tt>, if type is not given.
          
      466. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    466. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      467. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    467. 
            
            

            

                  # ==== Options
          
      468. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    468. 
            
            

            

                  # * <tt>:data</tt> - This option can be used to add custom data attributes.
          
      469. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    469. 
            
            

            

                  # * <tt>:disabled</tt> - If true, the user will not be able to
          
      470. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    470. 
            
            

            

                  #   use this input.
          
      471. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    471. 
            
            

            

                  # * Any other key creates standard HTML options for the tag.
          
      472. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    472. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      473. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    473. 
            
            

            

                  # ==== Data attributes
          
      474. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    474. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      475. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    475. 
            
            

            

                  # * <tt>confirm: 'question?'</tt> - If present, the
          
      476. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    476. 
            
            

            

                  #   unobtrusive JavaScript drivers will provide a prompt with
          
      477. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    477. 
            
            

            

                  #   the question specified. If the user accepts, the form is
          
      478. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    478. 
            
            

            

                  #   processed normally, otherwise no action is taken.
          
      479. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    479. 
            
            

            

                  # * <tt>:disable_with</tt> - Value of this parameter will be
          
      480. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    480. 
            
            

            

                  #   used as the value for a disabled version of the submit
          
      481. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    481. 
            
            

            

                  #   button when the form is submitted. This feature is provided
          
      482. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    482. 
            
            

            

                  #   by the unobtrusive JavaScript driver.
          
      483. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    483. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      484. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    484. 
            
            

            

                  # ==== Examples
          
      485. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    485. 
            
            

            

                  #   button_tag
          
      486. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    486. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <button name="button" type="submit">Button</button>
          
      487. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    487. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      488. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    488. 
            
            

            

                  #   button_tag 'Reset', type: 'reset'
          
      489. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    489. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <button name="button" type="reset">Reset</button>
          
      490. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    490. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      491. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    491. 
            
            

            

                  #   button_tag 'Button', type: 'button'
          
      492. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    492. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <button name="button" type="button">Button</button>
          
      493. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    493. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      494. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    494. 
            
            

            

                  #   button_tag 'Reset', type: 'reset', disabled: true
          
      495. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    495. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <button name="button" type="reset" disabled="disabled">Reset</button>
          
      496. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    496. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      497. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    497. 
            
            

            

                  #   button_tag(type: 'button') do
          
      498. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    498. 
            
            

            

                  #     content_tag(:strong, 'Ask me!')
          
      499. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    499. 
            
            

            

                  #   end
          
      500. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    500. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <button name="button" type="button">
          
      501. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    501. 
            
            

            

                  #   #     <strong>Ask me!</strong>
          
      502. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    502. 
            
            

            

                  #   #    </button>
          
      503. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    503. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      504. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    504. 
            
            

            

                  #   button_tag "Save", data: { confirm: "Are you sure?" }
          
      505. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    505. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <button name="button" type="submit" data-confirm="Are you sure?">Save</button>
          
      506. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    506. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      507. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    507. 
            
            

            

                  #   button_tag "Checkout", data: { disable_with: "Please wait..." }
          
      508. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    508. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <button data-disable-with="Please wait..." name="button" type="submit">Checkout</button>
          
      509. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    509. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      510. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    510. 
            1
            

            

                  def button_tag(content_or_options = nil, options = nil, &block)
          
      511. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    511. 
            
            

            

                    if content_or_options.is_a? Hash
          
      512. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    512. 
            
            

            

                      options = content_or_options
          
      513. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    513. 
            
            

            

                    else
          
      514. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    514. 
            
            

            

                      options ||= {}
          
      515. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    515. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      516. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    516. 
            
            

            

            
          
      517. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    517. 
            
            

            

                    options = { "name" => "button", "type" => "submit" }.merge!(options.stringify_keys)
          
      518. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    518. 
            
            

            

            
          
      519. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    519. 
            
            

            

                    if block_given?
          
      520. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    520. 
            
            

            

                      content_tag :button, options, &block
          
      521. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    521. 
            
            

            

                    else
          
      522. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    522. 
            
            

            

                      content_tag :button, content_or_options || "Button", options
          
      523. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    523. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      524. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    524. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      525. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    525. 
            
            

            

            
          
      526. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    526. 
            
            

            

                  # Displays an image which when clicked will submit the form.
          
      527. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    527. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      528. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    528. 
            
            

            

                  # <tt>source</tt> is passed to AssetTagHelper#path_to_image
          
      529. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    529. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      530. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    530. 
            
            

            

                  # ==== Options
          
      531. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    531. 
            
            

            

                  # * <tt>:data</tt> - This option can be used to add custom data attributes.
          
      532. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    532. 
            
            

            

                  # * <tt>:disabled</tt> - If set to true, the user will not be able to use this input.
          
      533. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    533. 
            
            

            

                  # * Any other key creates standard HTML options for the tag.
          
      534. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    534. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      535. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    535. 
            
            

            

                  # ==== Data attributes
          
      536. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    536. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      537. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    537. 
            
            

            

                  # * <tt>confirm: 'question?'</tt> - This will add a JavaScript confirm
          
      538. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    538. 
            
            

            

                  #   prompt with the question specified. If the user accepts, the form is
          
      539. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    539. 
            
            

            

                  #   processed normally, otherwise no action is taken.
          
      540. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    540. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      541. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    541. 
            
            

            

                  # ==== Examples
          
      542. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    542. 
            
            

            

                  #   image_submit_tag("login.png")
          
      543. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    543. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <input src="/assets/login.png" type="image" />
          
      544. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    544. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      545. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    545. 
            
            

            

                  #   image_submit_tag("purchase.png", disabled: true)
          
      546. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    546. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <input disabled="disabled" src="/assets/purchase.png" type="image" />
          
      547. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    547. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      548. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    548. 
            
            

            

                  #   image_submit_tag("search.png", class: 'search_button', alt: 'Find')
          
      549. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    549. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <input class="search_button" src="/assets/search.png" type="image" />
          
      550. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    550. 
            
            

            

                  #
