      551. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    551. 
            
            

            

                  #   image_submit_tag("agree.png", disabled: true, class: "agree_disagree_button")
          
      552. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    552. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <input class="agree_disagree_button" disabled="disabled" src="/assets/agree.png" type="image" />
          
      553. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    553. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      554. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    554. 
            
            

            

                  #   image_submit_tag("save.png", data: { confirm: "Are you sure?" })
          
      555. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    555. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <input src="/assets/save.png" data-confirm="Are you sure?" type="image" />
          
      556. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    556. 
            1
            

            

                  def image_submit_tag(source, options = {})
          
      557. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    557. 
            
            

            

                    options = options.stringify_keys
          
      558. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    558. 
            
            

            

                    src = path_to_image(source, skip_pipeline: options.delete("skip_pipeline"))
          
      559. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    559. 
            
            

            

                    tag :input, { "type" => "image", "src" => src }.update(options)
          
      560. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    560. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      561. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    561. 
            
            

            

            
          
      562. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    562. 
            
            

            

                  # Creates a field set for grouping HTML form elements.
          
      563. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    563. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      564. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    564. 
            
            

            

                  # <tt>legend</tt> will become the fieldset's title (optional as per W3C).
          
      565. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    565. 
            
            

            

                  # <tt>options</tt> accept the same values as tag.
          
      566. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    566. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      567. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    567. 
            
            

            

                  # ==== Examples
          
      568. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    568. 
            
            

            

                  #   <%= field_set_tag do %>
          
      569. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    569. 
            
            

            

                  #     <p><%= text_field_tag 'name' %></p>
          
      570. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    570. 
            
            

            

                  #   <% end %>
          
      571. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    571. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <fieldset><p><input id="name" name="name" type="text" /></p></fieldset>
          
      572. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    572. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      573. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    573. 
            
            

            

                  #   <%= field_set_tag 'Your details' do %>
          
      574. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    574. 
            
            

            

                  #     <p><%= text_field_tag 'name' %></p>
          
      575. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    575. 
            
            

            

                  #   <% end %>
          
      576. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    576. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <fieldset><legend>Your details</legend><p><input id="name" name="name" type="text" /></p></fieldset>
          
      577. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    577. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      578. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    578. 
            
            

            

                  #   <%= field_set_tag nil, class: 'format' do %>
          
      579. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    579. 
            
            

            

                  #     <p><%= text_field_tag 'name' %></p>
          
      580. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    580. 
            
            

            

                  #   <% end %>
          
      581. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    581. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <fieldset class="format"><p><input id="name" name="name" type="text" /></p></fieldset>
          
      582. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    582. 
            1
            

            

                  def field_set_tag(legend = nil, options = nil, &block)
          
      583. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    583. 
            
            

            

                    output = tag(:fieldset, options, true)
          
      584. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    584. 
            
            

            

                    output.safe_concat(content_tag("legend", legend)) unless legend.blank?
          
      585. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    585. 
            
            

            

                    output.concat(capture(&block)) if block_given?
          
      586. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    586. 
            
            

            

                    output.safe_concat("</fieldset>")
          
      587. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    587. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      588. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    588. 
            
            

            

            
          
      589. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    589. 
            
            

            

                  # Creates a text field of type "color".
          
      590. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    590. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      591. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    591. 
            
            

            

                  # ==== Options
          
      592. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    592. 
            
            

            

                  # * Accepts the same options as text_field_tag.
          
      593. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    593. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      594. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    594. 
            
            

            

                  # ==== Examples
          
      595. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    595. 
            
            

            

                  #   color_field_tag 'name'
          
      596. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    596. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <input id="name" name="name" type="color" />
          
      597. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    597. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      598. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    598. 
            
            

            

                  #   color_field_tag 'color', '#DEF726'
          
      599. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    599. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <input id="color" name="color" type="color" value="#DEF726" />
          
      600. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    600. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      601. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    601. 
            
            

            

                  #   color_field_tag 'color', nil, class: 'special_input'
          
      602. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    602. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <input class="special_input" id="color" name="color" type="color" />
          
      603. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    603. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      604. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    604. 
            
            

            

                  #   color_field_tag 'color', '#DEF726', class: 'special_input', disabled: true
          
      605. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    605. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <input disabled="disabled" class="special_input" id="color" name="color" type="color" value="#DEF726" />
          
      606. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    606. 
            1
            

            

                  def color_field_tag(name, value = nil, options = {})
          
      607. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    607. 
            
            

            

                    text_field_tag(name, value, options.merge(type: :color))
          
      608. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    608. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      609. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    609. 
            
            

            

            
          
      610. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    610. 
            
            

            

                  # Creates a text field of type "search".
          
      611. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    611. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      612. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    612. 
            
            

            

                  # ==== Options
          
      613. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    613. 
            
            

            

                  # * Accepts the same options as text_field_tag.
          
      614. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    614. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      615. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    615. 
            
            

            

                  # ==== Examples
          
      616. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    616. 
            
            

            

                  #   search_field_tag 'name'
          
      617. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    617. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <input id="name" name="name" type="search" />
          
      618. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    618. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      619. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    619. 
            
            

            

                  #   search_field_tag 'search', 'Enter your search query here'
          
      620. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    620. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <input id="search" name="search" type="search" value="Enter your search query here" />
          
      621. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    621. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      622. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    622. 
            
            

            

                  #   search_field_tag 'search', nil, class: 'special_input'
          
      623. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    623. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <input class="special_input" id="search" name="search" type="search" />
          
      624. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    624. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      625. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    625. 
            
            

            

                  #   search_field_tag 'search', 'Enter your search query here', class: 'special_input', disabled: true
          
      626. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    626. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <input disabled="disabled" class="special_input" id="search" name="search" type="search" value="Enter your search query here" />
          
      627. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    627. 
            1
            

            

                  def search_field_tag(name, value = nil, options = {})
          
      628. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    628. 
            
            

            

                    text_field_tag(name, value, options.merge(type: :search))
          
      629. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    629. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      630. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    630. 
            
            

            

            
          
      631. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    631.

    647.

      648. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    648. 
            1

      649.

      670. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    670. 
            1
            

            

                  def date_field_tag(name, value = nil, options = {})
          
      671. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    671. 
            
            

            

                    text_field_tag(name, value, options.merge(type: :date))
          
      672. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    672. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      673.

    674. 
            
            

            

                  # Creates a text field of type "time".
          
      675. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    675. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      676. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    676. 
            
            

            

                  # === Options
          
      677. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    677. 
            
            

            

                  # * <tt>:min</tt> - The minimum acceptable value.
          
      678. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    678. 
            
            

            

                  # * <tt>:max</tt> - The maximum acceptable value.
          
      679. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    679. 
            
            

            

                  # * <tt>:step</tt> - The acceptable value granularity.
          
      680. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    680. 
            
            

            

                  # * Otherwise accepts the same options as text_field_tag.
          
      681. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    681. 
            1
            

            

                  def time_field_tag(name, value = nil, options = {})
          
      682. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    682. 
            
            

            

                    text_field_tag(name, value, options.merge(type: :time))
          
      683. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    683. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      684. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    684. 
            
            

            

            
          
      685. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    685.

    687. 
            
            

            

                  # === Options
          
      688. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    688. 
            
            

            

                  # * <tt>:min</tt> - The minimum acceptable value.
          
      689. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    689. 
            
            

            

                  # * <tt>:max</tt> - The maximum acceptable value.
          
      690. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    690. 
            
            

            

                  # * <tt>:step</tt> - The acceptable value granularity.
          
      691. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    691. 
            
            

            

                  # * Otherwise accepts the same options as text_field_tag.
          
      692. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    692. 
            1

      737. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    737. 
            1
            

            

                  def url_field_tag(name, value = nil, options = {})
          
      738.

                    text_field_tag(name, value, options.merge(type: :url))

    741. 
            
            

            

                  # Creates a text field of type "email".
          
      742. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    742. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      743. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    743. 
            
            

            

                  # ==== Options
          
      744. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    744. 
            
            

            

                  # * Accepts the same options as text_field_tag.
          
      745. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    745. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      746. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    746. 
            
            

            

                  # ==== Examples
          
      747. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    747. 
            
            

            

                  #   email_field_tag 'name'
          
      748. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    748. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <input id="name" name="name" type="email" />
          
      749. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    749. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      750. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    750. 
            
            

            

                  #   email_field_tag 'email', 'email@example.com'
          
      751. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    751. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <input id="email" name="email" type="email" value="email@example.com" />
          
      752. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    752. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      753. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    753. 
            
            

            

                  #   email_field_tag 'email', nil, class: 'special_input'
          
      754. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    754. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <input class="special_input" id="email" name="email" type="email" />
          
      755. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    755. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      756. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    756. 
            
            

            

                  #   email_field_tag 'email', 'email@example.com', class: 'special_input', disabled: true
          
      757. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    757. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <input disabled="disabled" class="special_input" id="email" name="email" type="email" value="email@example.com" />
          
      758. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    758. 
            1
            

            

                  def email_field_tag(name, value = nil, options = {})
          
      759. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    759. 
            
            

            

                    text_field_tag(name, value, options.merge(type: :email))
          
      760. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    760. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      761. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    761. 
            
            

            

            
          
      762. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    762. 
            
            

            

                  # Creates a number field.
          
      763. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    763. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      764. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    764. 
            
            

            

                  # ==== Options
          
      765. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    765. 
            
            

            

                  # * <tt>:min</tt> - The minimum acceptable value.
          
      766. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    766. 
            
            

            

                  # * <tt>:max</tt> - The maximum acceptable value.
          
      767. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    767. 
            
            

            

                  # * <tt>:in</tt> - A range specifying the <tt>:min</tt> and
          
      768. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    768. 
            
            

            

                  #   <tt>:max</tt> values.
          
      769. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    769. 
            
            

            

                  # * <tt>:within</tt> - Same as <tt>:in</tt>.
          
      770. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    770. 
            
            

            

                  # * <tt>:step</tt> - The acceptable value granularity.
          
      771. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    771. 
            
            

            

                  # * Otherwise accepts the same options as text_field_tag.
          
      772. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    772. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      773. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    773. 
            
            

            

                  # ==== Examples
          
      774. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    774. 
            
            

            

                  #   number_field_tag 'quantity'
          
      775. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    775. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <input id="quantity" name="quantity" type="number" />
          
      776. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    776. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      777. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    777. 
            
            

            

                  #   number_field_tag 'quantity', '1'
          
      778. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    778. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <input id="quantity" name="quantity" type="number" value="1" />
          
      779. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    779. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      780. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    780.

                  def number_field_tag(name, value = nil, options = {})
          
      804. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    804. 
            
            

            

                    options = options.stringify_keys
          
      805. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    805. 
            
            

            

                    options["type"] ||= "number"
          
      806. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    806. 
            
            

            

                    if range = options.delete("in") || options.delete("within")
          
      807. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    807. 
            
            

            

                      options.update("min" => range.min, "max" => range.max)
          
      808. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    808. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      809. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    809. 
            
            

            

                    text_field_tag(name, value, options)

    810.

                    def html_options_for_form(url_for_options, options)
          
      831. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    831. 
            
            

            

                      options.stringify_keys.tap do |html_options|

      833. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    833. 
            
            

            

                        # The following URL is unescaped, this is just a hash of options, and it is the
          
      834. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    834. 
            
            

            

                        # responsibility of the caller to escape all the values.
          
      835. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    835. 
            
            

            

                        html_options["action"]  = url_for(url_for_options)
          
      836. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    836. 
            
            

            

                        html_options["accept-charset"] = "UTF-8"
          
      837. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    837. 
            
            

            

            
          
      838. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    838. 
            
            

            

                        html_options["data-remote"] = true if html_options.delete("remote")
          
      839. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    839. 
            
            

            

            
          
      840. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    840. 
            
            

            

                        if html_options["data-remote"] &&
          
      841. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    841. 
            
            

            

                           !embed_authenticity_token_in_remote_forms &&
          
      842. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    842. 
            
            

            

                           html_options["authenticity_token"].blank?
          
      843. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    843. 
            
            

            

                          # The authenticity token is taken from the meta tag in this case
          
      844.

                          html_options["authenticity_token"] = false
          
      845.

      846.

      847.

                    def extra_tags_for_form(html_options)
          
      854. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    854. 
            
            

            

                      authenticity_token = html_options.delete("authenticity_token")
          
      855. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    855. 
            
            

            

                      method = html_options.delete("method").to_s.downcase
          
      856. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    856. 
            
            

            

            
          
      857. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    857. 
            
            

            

                      method_tag = \
          
      858. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    858. 
            
            

            

                        case method
          
      859. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    859. 
            
            

            

                        when "get"
          
      860. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    860. 
            
            

            

                          html_options["method"] = "get"
          
      861. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    861. 
            
            

            

                          ""
          
      862. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    862. 
            
            

            

                        when "post", ""
          
      863. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    863. 
            
            

            

                          html_options["method"] = "post"
          
      864. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    864. 
            
            

            

                          token_tag(authenticity_token, form_options: {
          
      865. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    865. 
            
            

            

                            action: html_options["action"],
          
      866. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    866. 
            
            

            

                            method: "post"
          
      867. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    867. 
            
            

            

                          })
          
      868. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    868. 
            
            

            

                        else
          
      869. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    869. 
            
            

            

                          html_options["method"] = "post"
          
      870. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    870. 
            
            

            

                          method_tag(method) + token_tag(authenticity_token, form_options: {
          
      871. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    871. 
            
            

            

                            action: html_options["action"],
          
      872. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    872. 
            
            

            

                            method: method
          
      873. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    873. 
            
            

            

                          })
          
      874. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    874. 
            
            

            

                        end
          
      875. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    875. 
            
            

            

            
          
      876. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    876. 
            
            

            

                      if html_options.delete("enforce_utf8") { default_enforce_utf8 }
          
      877. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    877. 
            
            

            

                        utf8_enforcer_tag + method_tag
          
      878. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    878. 
            
            

            

                      else
          
      879. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    879. 
            
            

            

                        method_tag
          
      880. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    880. 
            
            

            

                      end
          
      881. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    881. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      882.

                    def form_tag_html(html_options)

                    def set_default_disable_with(value, tag_options)

                      return unless ActionView::Base.automatically_disable_submit_tag

                        disable_with_text ||= data["disable_with"] if data

                  JS_ESCAPE_MAP = {
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            
            

            

                    '\\'    => '\\\\',
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            
            

            

                    "</"    => '<\/',
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            
            

            

                    "\r\n"  => '\n',
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            
            

            

                    "\n"    => '\n',
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            
            

            

                    "\r"    => '\n',
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            
            

            

                    '"'     => '\\"',
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            
            

            

                    "'"     => "\\'",
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            
            

            

                    "`"     => "\\`",
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            
            

            

                    "$"     => "\\$"
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18.

                  JS_ESCAPE_MAP[(+"\342\200\250").force_encoding(Encoding::UTF_8).encode!] = "&#x2028;"

                  JS_ESCAPE_MAP[(+"\342\200\251").force_encoding(Encoding::UTF_8).encode!] = "&#x2029;"

                  # Escapes carriage returns and single and double quotes for JavaScript segments.
          
      24.

                  #
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            
            

            

                  # Also available through the alias j(). This is particularly helpful in JavaScript
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            
            

            

                  # responses, like:
          
      27.

                  #

                  #   $('some_element').replaceWith('<%= j render 'some/element_template' %>');

                  def escape_javascript(javascript)
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            
            

            

                    javascript = javascript.to_s
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            
            

            

                    if javascript.empty?
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            
            

            

                      result = ""
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            
            

            

                    else
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            
            

            

                      result = javascript.gsub(/(\\|<\/|\r\n|\342\200\250|\342\200\251|[\n\r"']|[`]|[$])/u, JS_ESCAPE_MAP)
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            
            

            

                    javascript.html_safe? ? result.html_safe : result
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            
            

            

            
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            1
            

            

                  alias_method :j, :escape_javascript
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            
            

            

            
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            
            

            

                  # Returns a JavaScript tag with the +content+ inside. Example:
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            
            

            

                  #   javascript_tag "alert('All is good')"
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      44.

                  # Returns:

                  def javascript_tag(content_or_options_with_block = nil, html_options = {}, &block)

    77. 
            
            

            

                    content =

    78. 
            
            

            

                      if block_given?
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79.

      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            
            

            

                        capture(&block)

    81.

      82.

    83.

      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84.

    85. 
            
            

            

                    if html_options[:nonce] == true
          
      86.

                  def javascript_cdata_section(content) #:nodoc:

    12. 
            
            

            

                # precision, positional notation, file size and pretty printing.

                  # Formats a +number+ into a phone number (US by default e.g., (555)
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            
            

            

                  # 123-9876). You can customize the format in the +options+ hash.
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            
            

            

                  # ==== Options
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            
            

            

                  # * <tt>:area_code</tt> - Adds parentheses around the area code.
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            
            

            

                  # * <tt>:delimiter</tt> - Specifies the delimiter to use
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            
            

            

                  #   (defaults to "-").
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            
            

            

                  # * <tt>:extension</tt> - Specifies an extension to add to the
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            
            

            

                  #   end of the generated number.
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            
            

            

                  # * <tt>:country_code</tt> - Sets the country code for the phone
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            
            

            

                  #   number.
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            
            

            

                  # * <tt>:pattern</tt> - Specifies how the number is divided into three
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            
            

            

                  #   groups with the custom regexp to override the default format.
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            
            

            

                  # * <tt>:raise</tt> - If true, raises +InvalidNumberError+ when
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            
            

            

                  #   the argument is invalid.
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42.

                  def number_to_phone(number, options = {})
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            
            

            

                    return unless number
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64.

      65.

                  # Formats a +number+ into a currency string (e.g., $13.65). You
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            
            

            

                  # can customize the format in the +options+ hash.
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            
            

            

                  # The currency unit and number formatting of the current locale will be used
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            
            

            

                  # unless otherwise specified in the provided options. No currency conversion
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            
            

            

                  # is performed. If the user is given a way to change their locale, they will
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            
            

            

                  # also be able to change the relative value of the currency displayed with
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            
            

            

                  # this helper. If your application will ever support multiple locales, you
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            
            

            

                  # may want to specify a constant <tt>:locale</tt> option or consider
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            
            

            

                  # using a library capable of currency conversion.
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            
            

            

                  # ==== Options
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            
            

            

                  # * <tt>:locale</tt> - Sets the locale to be used for formatting
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            
            

            

                  #   (defaults to current locale).
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            
            

            

                  # * <tt>:precision</tt> - Sets the level of precision (defaults
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            
            

            

                  #   to 2).
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            
            

            

                  # * <tt>:unit</tt> - Sets the denomination of the currency
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            
            

            

                  #   (defaults to "$").
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            
            

            

                  # * <tt>:separator</tt> - Sets the separator between the units
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            
            

            

                  #   (defaults to ".").
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            
            

            

                  # * <tt>:delimiter</tt> - Sets the thousands delimiter (defaults
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            
            

            

                  #   to ",").
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            
            

            

                  # * <tt>:format</tt> - Sets the format for non-negative numbers
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            
            

            

                  #   (defaults to "%u%n").  Fields are <tt>%u</tt> for the
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            
            

            

                  #   currency, and <tt>%n</tt> for the number.
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            
            

            

                  # * <tt>:negative_format</tt> - Sets the format for negative
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            
            

            

                  #   numbers (defaults to prepending a hyphen to the formatted
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            
            

            

                  #   number given by <tt>:format</tt>).  Accepts the same fields
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            
            

            

                  #   than <tt>:format</tt>, except <tt>%n</tt> is here the
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            
            

            

                  #   absolute value of the number.
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            
            

            

                  # * <tt>:raise</tt> - If true, raises +InvalidNumberError+ when
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            
            

            

                  #   the argument is invalid.
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            
            

            

                  # * <tt>:strip_insignificant_zeros</tt> - If +true+ removes
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            
            

            

                  #   insignificant zeros after the decimal separator (defaults to
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            
            

            

                  #   +false+).
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106.

      107.

                  # ==== Examples
          
      108.

                  def number_to_currency(number, options = {})
          
      128.
