                    def tag_string(name, content = nil, escape_attributes: true, **options, &block)
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            
            

            

                      content = @view_context.capture(self, &block) if block_given?
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            
            

            

                      if VOID_ELEMENTS.include?(name) && content.nil?
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            
            

            

                        "<#{name.to_s.dasherize}#{tag_options(options, escape_attributes)}>".html_safe
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            
            

            

                      else
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            
            

            

                        content_tag_string(name.to_s.dasherize, content || "", options, escape_attributes)
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            
            

            

                      end
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            
            

            

            
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            1
            

            

                    def content_tag_string(name, content, options, escape = true)
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            
            

            

                      tag_options = tag_options(options, escape) if options
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            
            

            

                      content     = ERB::Util.unwrapped_html_escape(content) if escape
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            
            

            

                      "<#{name}#{tag_options}>#{PRE_CONTENT_STRINGS[name]}#{content}</#{name}>".html_safe
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            
            

            

            
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            1
            

            

                    def tag_options(options, escape = true)
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            
            

            

                      return if options.blank?
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            
            

            

                      output = +""
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            
            

            

                      sep    = " "
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            
            

            

                      options.each_pair do |key, value|
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            
            

            

                        type = TAG_TYPES[key]
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            
            

            

                        if type == :prefix && value.is_a?(Hash)
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            
            

            

                          value.each_pair do |k, v|
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            
            

            

                            next if v.nil?
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            
            

            

                            output << sep
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            
            

            

                            output << prefix_tag_option(key, k, v, escape)
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            
            

            

                          end
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            
            

            

                        elsif type == :boolean
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            
            

            

                          if value
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            
            

            

                            output << sep
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            
            

            

                            output << boolean_tag_option(key)
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            
            

            

                          end
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            
            

            

                        elsif !value.nil?
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            
            

            

                          output << sep
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            
            

            

                          output << tag_option(key, value, escape)
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            
            

            

                        end
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            
            

            

                      end
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            
            

            

                      output unless output.empty?
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            
            

            

            
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            1
            

            

                    def boolean_tag_option(key)
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            
            

            

                      %(#{key}="#{key}")
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            
            

            

            
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            1
            

            

                    def tag_option(key, value, escape)
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            
            

            

                      case value
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            
            

            

                      when Array, Hash
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            
            

            

                        value = TagHelper.build_tag_values(value) if key.to_s == "class"
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            
            

            

                        value = escape ? safe_join(value, " ") : value.join(" ")
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            
            

            

                      else
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            
            

            

                        value = escape ? ERB::Util.unwrapped_html_escape(value) : value.to_s
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            
            

            

                      end
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            
            

            

                      value = value.gsub('"', "&quot;") if value.include?('"')
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            
            

            

                      %(#{key}="#{value}")
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            
            

            

            
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            1
            

            

                    private
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            1
            

            

                      def prefix_tag_option(prefix, key, value, escape)
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            
            

            

                        key = "#{prefix}-#{key.to_s.dasherize}"
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            
            

            

                        unless value.is_a?(String) || value.is_a?(Symbol) || value.is_a?(BigDecimal)
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            
            

            

                          value = value.to_json
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            
            

            

                        end
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            
            

            

                        tag_option(key, value, escape)
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            
            

            

                      end
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            
            

            

            
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            1
            

            

                      def respond_to_missing?(*args)
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            
            

            

                        true
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            
            

            

                      end
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            
            

            

            
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            1
            

            

                      def method_missing(called, *args, **options, &block)
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            
            

            

                        tag_string(called, *args, **options, &block)
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            
            

            

                      end
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            
            

            

            
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            
            

            

                  # Returns an HTML tag.
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            
            

            

                  # === Building HTML tags
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            
            

            

                  # Builds HTML5 compliant tags with a tag proxy. Every tag can be built with:
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            
            

            

                  #   tag.<tag name>(optional content, options)
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            
            

            

                  # where tag name can be e.g. br, div, section, article, or any tag really.
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            
            

            

                  # ==== Passing content
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            
            

            

                  # Tags can pass content to embed within it:
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            
            

            

                  #   tag.h1 'All titles fit to print' # => <h1>All titles fit to print</h1>
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            
            

            

                  #   tag.div tag.p('Hello world!')  # => <div><p>Hello world!</p></div>
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            
            

            

                  # Content can also be captured with a block, which is useful in templates:
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            
            

            

                  #   <%= tag.p do %>
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            
            

            

                  #     The next great American novel starts here.
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            
            

            

                  #   <% end %>
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <p>The next great American novel starts here.</p>
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            
            

            

                  # ==== Options
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            
            

            

                  # Use symbol keyed options to add attributes to the generated tag.
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            
            

            

                  #   tag.section class: %w( kitties puppies )
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <section class="kitties puppies"></section>
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            
            

            

                  #   tag.section id: dom_id(@post)
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <section id="<generated dom id>"></section>
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            
            

            

                  # Pass +true+ for any attributes that can render with no values, like +disabled+ and +readonly+.
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            
            

            

                  #   tag.input type: 'text', disabled: true
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <input type="text" disabled="disabled">
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            
            

            

                  # HTML5 <tt>data-*</tt> attributes can be set with a single +data+ key
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            
            

            

                  # pointing to a hash of sub-attributes.
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            
            

            

                  # To play nicely with JavaScript conventions, sub-attributes are dasherized.
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            
            

            

                  #   tag.article data: { user_id: 123 }
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <article data-user-id="123"></article>
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            
            

            

                  # Thus <tt>data-user-id</tt> can be accessed as <tt>dataset.userId</tt>.
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            
            

            

                  # Data attribute values are encoded to JSON, with the exception of strings, symbols and
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            
            

            

                  # BigDecimals.
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            
            

            

                  # This may come in handy when using jQuery's HTML5-aware <tt>.data()</tt>
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            
            

            

                  # from 1.4.3.
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            
            

            

                  #   tag.div data: { city_state: %w( Chicago IL ) }
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <div data-city-state="[&quot;Chicago&quot;,&quot;IL&quot;]"></div>
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            
            

            

                  # The generated attributes are escaped by default. This can be disabled using
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            
            

            

                  # +escape_attributes+.
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            
            

            

                  #   tag.img src: 'open & shut.png'
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <img src="open &amp; shut.png">
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            
            

            

                  #   tag.img src: 'open & shut.png', escape_attributes: false
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <img src="open & shut.png">
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            
            

            

                  # The tag builder respects
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            
            

            

                  # {HTML5 void elements}[https://www.w3.org/TR/html5/syntax.html#void-elements]
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            
            

            

                  # if no content is passed, and omits closing tags for those elements.
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            
            

            

                  #   # A standard element:
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            
            

            

                  #   tag.div # => <div></div>
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            
            

            

                  #   # A void element:
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            
            

            

                  #   tag.br  # => <br>
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            
            

            

                  # === Legacy syntax
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            
            

            

                  # The following format is for legacy syntax support. It will be deprecated in future versions of Rails.
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            
            

            

                  #   tag(name, options = nil, open = false, escape = true)
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            
            

            

                  # It returns an empty HTML tag of type +name+ which by default is XHTML
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            
            

            

                  # compliant. Set +open+ to true to create an open tag compatible
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            
            

            

                  # with HTML 4.0 and below. Add HTML attributes by passing an attributes
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            
            

            

                  # hash to +options+. Set +escape+ to false to disable attribute value
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            
            

            

                  # escaping.
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            
            

            

                  # ==== Options
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            
            

            

                  # You can use symbols or strings for the attribute names.
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            
            

            

                  # Use +true+ with boolean attributes that can render with no value, like
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            
            

            

                  # +disabled+ and +readonly+.
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            
            

            

                  # HTML5 <tt>data-*</tt> attributes can be set with a single +data+ key
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            
            

            

                  # pointing to a hash of sub-attributes.
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            
            

            

                  # ==== Examples
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            
            

            

                  #   tag("br")
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <br />
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            
            

            

                  #   tag("br", nil, true)
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <br>
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            
            

            

                  #   tag("input", type: 'text', disabled: true)
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <input type="text" disabled="disabled" />
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            
            

            

                  #   tag("input", type: 'text', class: ["strong", "highlight"])
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <input class="strong highlight" type="text" />
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            
            

            

                  #   tag("img", src: "open & shut.png")
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <img src="open &amp; shut.png" />
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            
            

            

                  #   tag("img", { src: "open &amp; shut.png" }, false, false)
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <img src="open &amp; shut.png" />
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            
            

            

                  #   tag("div", data: { name: 'Stephen', city_state: %w(Chicago IL) })
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <div data-name="Stephen" data-city-state="[&quot;Chicago&quot;,&quot;IL&quot;]" />
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            
            

            

                  #   tag("div", class: { highlight: current_user.admin? })
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <div class="highlight" />
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            1
            

            

                  def tag(name = nil, options = nil, open = false, escape = true)
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            
            

            

                    if name.nil?
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            
            

            

                      tag_builder
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            
            

            

                    else
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            
            

            

                      "<#{name}#{tag_builder.tag_options(options, escape) if options}#{open ? ">" : " />"}".html_safe
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            
            

            

            
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            
            

            

                  # Returns an HTML block tag of type +name+ surrounding the +content+. Add
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            
            

            

                  # HTML attributes by passing an attributes hash to +options+.
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            
            

            

                  # Instead of passing the content as an argument, you can also use a block
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            
            

            

                  # in which case, you pass your +options+ as the second parameter.
          
      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260. 
            
            

            

                  # Set escape to false to disable attribute value escaping.
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261. 
            
            

            

                  # Note: this is legacy syntax, see +tag+ method description for details.
          
      262. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    262. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      263. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    263. 
            
            

            

                  # ==== Options
          
      264. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    264. 
            
            

            

                  # The +options+ hash can be used with attributes with no value like (<tt>disabled</tt> and
          
      265. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    265. 
            
            

            

                  # <tt>readonly</tt>), which you can give a value of true in the +options+ hash. You can use
          
      266. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    266. 
            
            

            

                  # symbols or strings for the attribute names.
          
      267. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    267. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      268. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    268. 
            
            

            

                  # ==== Examples
          
      269. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    269. 
            
            

            

                  #   content_tag(:p, "Hello world!")
          
      270. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    270. 
            
            

            

                  #    # => <p>Hello world!</p>
          
      271. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    271. 
            
            

            

                  #   content_tag(:div, content_tag(:p, "Hello world!"), class: "strong")
          
      272. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    272. 
            
            

            

                  #    # => <div class="strong"><p>Hello world!</p></div>
          
      273. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    273. 
            
            

            

                  #   content_tag(:div, "Hello world!", class: ["strong", "highlight"])
          
      274. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    274. 
            
            

            

                  #    # => <div class="strong highlight">Hello world!</div>
          
      275. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    275. 
            
            

            

                  #   content_tag(:div, "Hello world!", class: ["strong", { highlight: current_user.admin? }])
          
      276. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    276. 
            
            

            

                  #    # => <div class="strong highlight">Hello world!</div>
          
      277. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    277. 
            
            

            

                  #   content_tag("select", options, multiple: true)
          
      278. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    278. 
            
            

            

                  #    # => <select multiple="multiple">...options...</select>
          
      279. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    279. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      280. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    280. 
            
            

            

                  #   <%= content_tag :div, class: "strong" do -%>
          
      281. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    281. 
            
            

            

                  #     Hello world!
          
      282. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    282. 
            
            

            

                  #   <% end -%>
          
      283. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    283. 
            
            

            

                  #    # => <div class="strong">Hello world!</div>
          
      284. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    284. 
            1
            

            

                  def content_tag(name, content_or_options_with_block = nil, options = nil, escape = true, &block)
          
      285. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    285. 
            
            

            

                    if block_given?
          
      286. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    286. 
            
            

            

                      options = content_or_options_with_block if content_or_options_with_block.is_a?(Hash)
          
      287. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    287. 
            
            

            

                      tag_builder.content_tag_string(name, capture(&block), options, escape)
          
      288. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    288. 
            
            

            

                    else
          
      289. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    289. 
            
            

            

                      tag_builder.content_tag_string(name, content_or_options_with_block, options, escape)
          
      290. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    290. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      291. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    291. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      292. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    292. 
            
            

            

            
          
      293. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    293. 
            
            

            

                  # Returns a string of class names built from +args+.
          
      294. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    294. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      295. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    295. 
            
            

            

                  # ==== Examples
          
      296. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    296. 
            
            

            

                  #   class_names("foo", "bar")
          
      297. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    297. 
            
            

            

                  #    # => "foo bar"
          
      298. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    298. 
            
            

            

                  #   class_names({ foo: true, bar: false })
          
      299. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    299. 
            
            

            

                  #    # => "foo"
          
      300. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    300. 
            
            

            

                  #   class_names(nil, false, 123, "", "foo", { bar: true })
          
      301. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    301. 
            
            

            

                  #    # => "123 foo bar"
          
      302. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    302. 
            1
            

            

                  def class_names(*args)
          
      303. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    303. 
            
            

            

                    safe_join(build_tag_values(*args), " ")
          
      304. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    304. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      305. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    305. 
            
            

            

            
          
      306. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    306. 
            
            

            

                  # Returns a CDATA section with the given +content+. CDATA sections
          
      307. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    307. 
            
            

            

                  # are used to escape blocks of text containing characters which would
          
      308. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    308. 
            
            

            

                  # otherwise be recognized as markup. CDATA sections begin with the string
          
      309. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    309. 
            
            

            

                  # <tt><![CDATA[</tt> and end with (and may not contain) the string <tt>]]></tt>.
          
      310. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    310. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      311. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    311. 
            
            

            

                  #   cdata_section("<hello world>")
          
      312. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    312. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <![CDATA[<hello world>]]>
          
      313. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    313. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      314. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    314. 
            
            

            

                  #   cdata_section(File.read("hello_world.txt"))
          
      315. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    315. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <![CDATA[<hello from a text file]]>
          
      316. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    316. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      317. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    317. 
            
            

            

                  #   cdata_section("hello]]>world")
          
      318. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    318. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <![CDATA[hello]]]]><![CDATA[>world]]>
          
      319. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    319. 
            1
            

            

                  def cdata_section(content)
          
      320. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    320. 
            
            

            

                    splitted = content.to_s.gsub(/\]\]\>/, "]]]]><![CDATA[>")
          
      321. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    321. 
            
            

            

                    "<![CDATA[#{splitted}]]>".html_safe
          
      322. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    322. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      323. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    323. 
            
            

            

            
          
      324. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    324. 
            
            

            

                  # Returns an escaped version of +html+ without affecting existing escaped entities.
          
      325. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    325. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      326. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    326. 
            
            

            

                  #   escape_once("1 < 2 &amp; 3")
          
      327. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    327. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => "1 &lt; 2 &amp; 3"
          
      328. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    328. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      329. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    329. 
            
            

            

                  #   escape_once("&lt;&lt; Accept & Checkout")
          
      330. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    330. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => "&lt;&lt; Accept &amp; Checkout"
          
      331. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    331. 
            1
            

            

                  def escape_once(html)
          
      332. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    332. 
            
            

            

                    ERB::Util.html_escape_once(html)
          
      333. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    333. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      334. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    334. 
            
            

            

            
          
      335. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    335. 
            1
            

            

                  private
          
      336. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    336. 
            1
            

            

                    def build_tag_values(*args)
          
      337. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    337. 
            
            

            

                      tag_values = []
          
      338. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    338. 
            
            

            

            
          
      339. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    339. 
            
            

            

                      args.each do |tag_value|
          
      340. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    340. 
            
            

            

                        case tag_value
          
      341. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    341. 
            
            

            

                        when Hash
          
      342. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    342. 
            
            

            

                          tag_value.each do |key, val|
          
      343. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    343. 
            
            

            

                            tag_values << key.to_s if val && key.present?
          
      344. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    344. 
            
            

            

                          end
          
      345. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    345. 
            
            

            

                        when Array
          
      346. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    346. 
            
            

            

                          tag_values.concat build_tag_values(*tag_value)
          
      347. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    347. 
            
            

            

                        else
          
      348. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    348. 
            
            

            

                          tag_values << tag_value.to_s if tag_value.present?
          
      349. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    349. 
            
            

            

                        end
          
      350. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    350. 
            
            

            

                      end
          
      351. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    351. 
            
            

            

            
          
      352. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    352. 
            
            

            

                      tag_values
          
      353. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    353. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      354. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    354. 
            1
            

            

                    module_function :build_tag_values
          
      355. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    355. 
            
            

            

            
          
      356. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    356. 
            1
            

            

                    def tag_builder
          
      357. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    357. 
            
            

            

                      @tag_builder ||= TagBuilder.new(self)
          
      358. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    358. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      359. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    359. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      360. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    360. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      361.

            end

                    def initialize(object_name, method_name, template_object, options = {})
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            
            

            

                      @object_name, @method_name = object_name.to_s.dup, method_name.to_s.dup
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            
            

            

                      @template_object = template_object
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            
            

            

            
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            
            

            

                      @object_name.sub!(/\[\]$/, "") || @object_name.sub!(/\[\]\]$/, "]")
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            
            

            

                      @object = retrieve_object(options.delete(:object))
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            
            

            

                      @skip_default_ids = options.delete(:skip_default_ids)
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            
            

            

                      @allow_method_names_outside_object = options.delete(:allow_method_names_outside_object)
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            
            

            

                      @options = options
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            
            

            

            
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            
            

            

                      if Regexp.last_match
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            
            

            

                        @generate_indexed_names = true
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            
            

            

                        @auto_index = retrieve_autoindex(Regexp.last_match.pre_match)
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            
            

            

                      else
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            
            

            

                        @generate_indexed_names = false
          
      27.

                        @auto_index = nil

      29.

                    end

                    # This is what child classes implement.
          
      32.

                    def render
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            
            

            

                      raise NotImplementedError, "Subclasses must implement a render method"
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      35.
