                    button = if block_given?
          
      331. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    331. 
            
            

            

                      content_tag("button", html_options, &block)
          
      332. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    332. 
            
            

            

                    else
          
      333. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    333. 
            
            

            

                      html_options["value"] = name || url
          
      334. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    334. 
            
            

            

                      tag("input", html_options)
          
      335. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    335. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      336. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    336. 
            
            

            

            
          
      337. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    337. 
            
            

            

                    inner_tags = method_tag.safe_concat(button).safe_concat(request_token_tag)
          
      338. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    338. 
            
            

            

                    if params
          
      339. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    339. 
            
            

            

                      to_form_params(params).each do |param|
          
      340. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    340. 
            
            

            

                        inner_tags.safe_concat tag(:input, type: "hidden", name: param[:name], value: param[:value])
          
      341. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    341. 
            
            

            

                      end
          
      342. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    342. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      343. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    343. 
            
            

            

                    content_tag("form", inner_tags, form_options)
          
      344. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    344. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      345. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    345. 
            
            

            

            
          
      346. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    346. 
            
            

            

                  # Creates a link tag of the given +name+ using a URL created by the set of
          
      347. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    347. 
            
            

            

                  # +options+ unless the current request URI is the same as the links, in
          
      348. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    348. 
            
            

            

                  # which case only the name is returned (or the given block is yielded, if
          
      349. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    349. 
            
            

            

                  # one exists). You can give +link_to_unless_current+ a block which will
          
      350. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    350. 
            
            

            

                  # specialize the default behavior (e.g., show a "Start Here" link rather
          
      351. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    351. 
            
            

            

                  # than the link's text).
          
      352. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    352. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      353. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    353. 
            
            

            

                  # ==== Examples
          
      354. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    354. 
            
            

            

                  # Let's say you have a navigation menu...
          
      355. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    355. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      356. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    356. 
            
            

            

                  #   <ul id="navbar">
          
      357. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    357. 
            
            

            

                  #     <li><%= link_to_unless_current("Home", { action: "index" }) %></li>
          
      358. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    358. 
            
            

            

                  #     <li><%= link_to_unless_current("About Us", { action: "about" }) %></li>
          
      359. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    359. 
            
            

            

                  #   </ul>
          
      360. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    360. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      361. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    361. 
            
            

            

                  # If in the "about" action, it will render...
          
      362. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    362. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      363. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    363. 
            
            

            

                  #   <ul id="navbar">
          
      364. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    364. 
            
            

            

                  #     <li><a href="/controller/index">Home</a></li>
          
      365. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    365. 
            
            

            

                  #     <li>About Us</li>
          
      366. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    366. 
            
            

            

                  #   </ul>
          
      367. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    367. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      368. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    368. 
            
            

            

                  # ...but if in the "index" action, it will render:
          
      369. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    369. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      370. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    370. 
            
            

            

                  #   <ul id="navbar">
          
      371. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    371. 
            
            

            

                  #     <li>Home</li>
          
      372. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    372. 
            
            

            

                  #     <li><a href="/controller/about">About Us</a></li>
          
      373. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    373. 
            
            

            

                  #   </ul>
          
      374. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    374. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      375. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    375. 
            
            

            

                  # The implicit block given to +link_to_unless_current+ is evaluated if the current
          
      376. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    376. 
            
            

            

                  # action is the action given. So, if we had a comments page and wanted to render a
          
      377. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    377. 
            
            

            

                  # "Go Back" link instead of a link to the comments page, we could do something like this...
          
      378. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    378. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      379. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    379. 
            
            

            

                  #    <%=
          
      380. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    380. 
            
            

            

                  #        link_to_unless_current("Comment", { controller: "comments", action: "new" }) do
          
      381. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    381. 
            
            

            

                  #           link_to("Go back", { controller: "posts", action: "index" })
          
      382. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    382. 
            
            

            

                  #        end
          
      383. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    383. 
            
            

            

                  #     %>
          
      384. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    384. 
            1
            

            

                  def link_to_unless_current(name, options = {}, html_options = {}, &block)
          
      385. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    385. 
            
            

            

                    link_to_unless current_page?(options), name, options, html_options, &block
          
      386. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    386. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      387. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    387. 
            
            

            

            
          
      388. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    388. 
            
            

            

                  # Creates a link tag of the given +name+ using a URL created by the set of
          
      389. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    389. 
            
            

            

                  # +options+ unless +condition+ is true, in which case only the name is
          
      390. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    390. 
            
            

            

                  # returned. To specialize the default behavior (i.e., show a login link rather
          
      391. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    391. 
            
            

            

                  # than just the plaintext link text), you can pass a block that
          
      392. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    392. 
            
            

            

                  # accepts the name or the full argument list for +link_to_unless+.
          
      393. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    393. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      394. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    394. 
            
            

            

                  # ==== Examples
          
      395. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    395. 
            
            

            

                  #   <%= link_to_unless(@current_user.nil?, "Reply", { action: "reply" }) %>
          
      396. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    396. 
            
            

            

                  #   # If the user is logged in...
          
      397. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    397. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <a href="/controller/reply/">Reply</a>
          
      398. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    398. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      399. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    399. 
            
            

            

                  #   <%=
          
      400. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    400. 
            
            

            

                  #      link_to_unless(@current_user.nil?, "Reply", { action: "reply" }) do |name|
          
      401. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    401. 
            
            

            

                  #        link_to(name, { controller: "accounts", action: "signup" })
          
      402. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    402. 
            
            

            

                  #      end
          
      403. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    403. 
            
            

            

                  #   %>
          
      404. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    404. 
            
            

            

                  #   # If the user is logged in...
          
      405. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    405. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <a href="/controller/reply/">Reply</a>
          
      406. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    406. 
            
            

            

                  #   # If not...
          
      407. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    407. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <a href="/accounts/signup">Reply</a>
          
      408. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    408. 
            1
            

            

                  def link_to_unless(condition, name, options = {}, html_options = {}, &block)
          
      409. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    409. 
            
            

            

                    link_to_if !condition, name, options, html_options, &block
          
      410. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    410. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      411. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    411. 
            
            

            

            
          
      412. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    412. 
            
            

            

                  # Creates a link tag of the given +name+ using a URL created by the set of
          
      413. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    413. 
            
            

            

                  # +options+ if +condition+ is true, otherwise only the name is
          
      414. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    414. 
            
            

            

                  # returned. To specialize the default behavior, you can pass a block that
          
      415. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    415. 
            
            

            

                  # accepts the name or the full argument list for +link_to_if+.
          
      416. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    416. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      417. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    417. 
            
            

            

                  # ==== Examples
          
      418. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    418. 
            
            

            

                  #   <%= link_to_if(@current_user.nil?, "Login", { controller: "sessions", action: "new" }) %>
          
      419. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    419. 
            
            

            

                  #   # If the user isn't logged in...
          
      420. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    420. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <a href="/sessions/new/">Login</a>
          
      421. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    421. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      422. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    422. 
            
            

            

                  #   <%=
          
      423. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    423. 
            
            

            

                  #      link_to_if(@current_user.nil?, "Login", { controller: "sessions", action: "new" }) do
          
      424. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    424. 
            
            

            

                  #        link_to(@current_user.login, { controller: "accounts", action: "show", id: @current_user })
          
      425. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    425. 
            
            

            

                  #      end
          
      426. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    426. 
            
            

            

                  #   %>
          
      427. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    427. 
            
            

            

                  #   # If the user isn't logged in...
          
      428. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    428. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <a href="/sessions/new/">Login</a>
          
      429. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    429. 
            
            

            

                  #   # If they are logged in...
          
      430. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    430. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <a href="/accounts/show/3">my_username</a>
          
      431. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    431. 
            1
            

            

                  def link_to_if(condition, name, options = {}, html_options = {}, &block)
          
      432. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    432. 
            
            

            

                    if condition
          
      433. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    433. 
            
            

            

                      link_to(name, options, html_options)
          
      434. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    434. 
            
            

            

                    else
          
      435. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    435. 
            
            

            

                      if block_given?
          
      436. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    436. 
            
            

            

                        block.arity <= 1 ? capture(name, &block) : capture(name, options, html_options, &block)
          
      437. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    437. 
            
            

            

                      else
          
      438. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    438. 
            
            

            

                        ERB::Util.html_escape(name)
          
      439. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    439. 
            
            

            

                      end
          
      440. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    440. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      441. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    441. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      442. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    442. 
            
            

            

            
          
      443. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    443. 
            
            

            

                  # Creates a mailto link tag to the specified +email_address+, which is
          
      444. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    444. 
            
            

            

                  # also used as the name of the link unless +name+ is specified. Additional
          
      445. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    445. 
            
            

            

                  # HTML attributes for the link can be passed in +html_options+.
          
      446. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    446. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      447. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    447. 
            
            

            

                  # +mail_to+ has several methods for customizing the email itself by
          
      448. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    448. 
            
            

            

                  # passing special keys to +html_options+.
          
      449. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    449. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      450. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    450. 
            
            

            

                  # ==== Options
          
      451. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    451. 
            
            

            

                  # * <tt>:subject</tt> - Preset the subject line of the email.
          
      452. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    452. 
            
            

            

                  # * <tt>:body</tt> - Preset the body of the email.
          
      453. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    453. 
            
            

            

                  # * <tt>:cc</tt> - Carbon Copy additional recipients on the email.
          
      454. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    454. 
            
            

            

                  # * <tt>:bcc</tt> - Blind Carbon Copy additional recipients on the email.
          
      455. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    455. 
            
            

            

                  # * <tt>:reply_to</tt> - Preset the Reply-To field of the email.
          
      456. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    456. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      457. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    457. 
            
            

            

                  # ==== Obfuscation
          
      458. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    458. 
            
            

            

                  # Prior to Rails 4.0, +mail_to+ provided options for encoding the address
          
      459. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    459. 
            
            

            

                  # in order to hinder email harvesters.  To take advantage of these options,
          
      460. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    460. 
            
            

            

                  # install the +actionview-encoded_mail_to+ gem.
          
      461. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    461. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      462. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    462. 
            
            

            

                  # ==== Examples
          
      463. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    463. 
            
            

            

                  #   mail_to "me@domain.com"
          
      464. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    464. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <a href="mailto:me@domain.com">me@domain.com</a>
          
      465. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    465. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      466. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    466. 
            
            

            

                  #   mail_to "me@domain.com", "My email"
          
      467. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    467. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <a href="mailto:me@domain.com">My email</a>
          
      468. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    468. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      469. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    469. 
            
            

            

                  #   mail_to "me@domain.com", "My email", cc: "ccaddress@domain.com",
          
      470. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    470. 
            
            

            

                  #            subject: "This is an example email"
          
      471. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    471. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <a href="mailto:me@domain.com?cc=ccaddress@domain.com&subject=This%20is%20an%20example%20email">My email</a>
          
      472. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    472. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      473. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    473. 
            
            

            

                  # You can use a block as well if your link target is hard to fit into the name parameter. ERB example:
          
      474. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    474. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      475. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    475. 
            
            

            

                  #   <%= mail_to "me@domain.com" do %>
          
      476. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    476. 
            
            

            

                  #     <strong>Email me:</strong> <span>me@domain.com</span>
          
      477. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    477. 
            
            

            

                  #   <% end %>
          
      478. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    478. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <a href="mailto:me@domain.com">
          
      479. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    479. 
            
            

            

                  #          <strong>Email me:</strong> <span>me@domain.com</span>
          
      480. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    480. 
            
            

            

                  #        </a>
          
      481. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    481. 
            1
            

            

                  def mail_to(email_address, name = nil, html_options = {}, &block)
          
      482. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    482. 
            
            

            

                    html_options, name = name, nil if block_given?
          
      483. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    483. 
            
            

            

                    html_options = (html_options || {}).stringify_keys
          
      484. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    484. 
            
            

            

            
          
      485. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    485. 
            
            

            

                    extras = %w{ cc bcc body subject reply_to }.map! { |item|
          
      486. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    486. 
            
            

            

                      option = html_options.delete(item).presence || next
          
      487. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    487. 
            
            

            

                      "#{item.dasherize}=#{ERB::Util.url_encode(option)}"
          
      488. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    488. 
            
            

            

                    }.compact
          
      489. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    489. 
            
            

            

                    extras = extras.empty? ? "" : "?" + extras.join("&")
          
      490. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    490. 
            
            

            

            
          
      491. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    491. 
            
            

            

                    encoded_email_address = ERB::Util.url_encode(email_address).gsub("%40", "@")
          
      492. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    492. 
            
            

            

                    html_options["href"] = "mailto:#{encoded_email_address}#{extras}"
          
      493. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    493. 
            
            

            

            
          
      494. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    494. 
            
            

            

                    content_tag("a", name || email_address, html_options, &block)
          
      495. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    495. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      496. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    496. 
            
            

            

            
          
      497. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    497. 
            
            

            

                  # True if the current request URI was generated by the given +options+.
          
      498. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    498. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      499. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    499. 
            
            

            

                  # ==== Examples
          
      500. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    500. 
            
            

            

                  # Let's say we're in the <tt>http://www.example.com/shop/checkout?order=desc&page=1</tt> action.
          
      501. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    501. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      502. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    502. 
            
            

            

                  #   current_page?(action: 'process')
          
      503. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    503. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => false
          
      504. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    504. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      505. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    505. 
            
            

            

                  #   current_page?(action: 'checkout')
          
      506. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    506. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => true
          
      507. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    507. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      508. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    508. 
            
            

            

                  #   current_page?(controller: 'library', action: 'checkout')
          
      509. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    509. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => false
          
      510. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    510. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      511. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    511. 
            
            

            

                  #   current_page?(controller: 'shop', action: 'checkout')
          
      512. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    512. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => true
          
      513. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    513. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      514. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    514. 
            
            

            

                  #   current_page?(controller: 'shop', action: 'checkout', order: 'asc')
          
      515. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    515. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => false
          
      516. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    516. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      517. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    517. 
            
            

            

                  #   current_page?(controller: 'shop', action: 'checkout', order: 'desc', page: '1')
          
      518. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    518. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => true
          
      519. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    519. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      520. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    520. 
            
            

            

                  #   current_page?(controller: 'shop', action: 'checkout', order: 'desc', page: '2')
          
      521. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    521. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => false
          
      522. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    522. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      523. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    523. 
            
            

            

                  #   current_page?('http://www.example.com/shop/checkout')
          
      524. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    524. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => true
          
      525. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    525. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      526. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    526. 
            
            

            

                  #   current_page?('http://www.example.com/shop/checkout', check_parameters: true)
          
      527. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    527. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => false
          
      528. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    528. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      529. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    529. 
            
            

            

                  #   current_page?('/shop/checkout')
          
      530. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    530. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => true
          
      531. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    531. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      532. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    532. 
            
            

            

                  #   current_page?('http://www.example.com/shop/checkout?order=desc&page=1')
          
      533. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    533. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => true
          
      534. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    534. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      535. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    535. 
            
            

            

                  # Let's say we're in the <tt>http://www.example.com/products</tt> action with method POST in case of invalid product.
          
      536. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    536. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      537. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    537. 
            
            

            

                  #   current_page?(controller: 'product', action: 'index')
          
      538. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    538. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => false
          
      539. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    539. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      540. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    540. 
            
            

            

                  # We can also pass in the symbol arguments instead of strings.
          
      541. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    541. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      542. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    542. 
            1
            

            

                  def current_page?(options, check_parameters: false)
          
      543. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    543. 
            
            

            

                    unless request
          
      544. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    544. 
            
            

            

                      raise "You cannot use helpers that need to determine the current " \
          
      545. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    545. 
            
            

            

                            "page unless your view context provides a Request object " \
          
      546. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    546. 
            
            

            

                            "in a #request method"
          
      547. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    547. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      548. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    548. 
            
            

            

            
          
      549. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    549. 
            
            

            

                    return false unless request.get? || request.head?
          
      550. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    550. 
            
            

            

            
          
      551. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    551. 
            
            

            

                    check_parameters ||= options.is_a?(Hash) && options.delete(:check_parameters)
          
      552. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    552. 
            
            

            

                    url_string = URI::DEFAULT_PARSER.unescape(url_for(options)).force_encoding(Encoding::BINARY)
          
      553. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    553. 
            
            

            

            
          
      554. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    554. 
            
            

            

                    # We ignore any extra parameters in the request_uri if the
          
      555. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    555. 
            
            

            

                    # submitted URL doesn't have any either. This lets the function
          
      556. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    556. 
            
            

            

                    # work with things like ?order=asc
          
      557. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    557. 
            
            

            

                    # the behaviour can be disabled with check_parameters: true
          
      558. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    558. 
            
            

            

                    request_uri = url_string.index("?") || check_parameters ? request.fullpath : request.path
          
      559. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    559. 
            
            

            

                    request_uri = URI::DEFAULT_PARSER.unescape(request_uri).force_encoding(Encoding::BINARY)
          
      560. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    560. 
            
            

            

            
          
      561. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    561. 
            
            

            

                    if url_string.start_with?("/") && url_string != "/"
          
      562. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    562. 
            
            

            

                      url_string.chomp!("/")
          
      563. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    563. 
            
            

            

                      request_uri.chomp!("/")
          
      564. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    564. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      565. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    565. 
            
            

            

            
          
      566. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    566. 
            
            

            

                    if %r{^\w+://}.match?(url_string)
          
      567. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    567. 
            
            

            

                      url_string == "#{request.protocol}#{request.host_with_port}#{request_uri}"
          
      568. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    568. 
            
            

            

                    else
          
      569. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    569. 
            
            

            

                      url_string == request_uri
          
      570. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    570. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      571. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    571. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      572. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    572. 
            
            

            

            
          
      573. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    573. 
            
            

            

                  # Creates an SMS anchor link tag to the specified +phone_number+, which is
          
      574. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    574. 
            
            

            

                  # also used as the name of the link unless +name+ is specified. Additional
          
      575. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    575. 
            
            

            

                  # HTML attributes for the link can be passed in +html_options+.
          
      576. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    576. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      577. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    577. 
            
            

            

                  # When clicked, an SMS message is prepopulated with the passed phone number
          
      578. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    578. 
            
            

            

                  # and optional +body+ value.
          
      579. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    579. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      580. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    580. 
            
            

            

                  # +sms_to+ has a +body+ option for customizing the SMS message itself by
          
      581. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    581. 
            
            

            

                  # passing special keys to +html_options+.
          
      582. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    582. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      583. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    583. 
            
            

            

                  # ==== Options
          
      584. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    584. 
            
            

            

                  # * <tt>:body</tt> - Preset the body of the message.
          
      585. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    585. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      586. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    586. 
            
            

            

                  # ==== Examples
          
      587. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    587. 
            
            

            

                  #   sms_to "5155555785"
          
      588. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    588. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <a href="sms:5155555785;">5155555785</a>
          
      589. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    589. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      590. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    590. 
            
            

            

                  #   sms_to "5155555785", "Text me"
          
      591. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    591. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <a href="sms:5155555785;">Text me</a>
          
      592. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    592. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      593. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    593. 
            
            

            

                  #   sms_to "5155555785", "Text me",
          
      594. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    594. 
            
            

            

                  #          body: "Hello Jim I have a question about your product."
          
      595. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    595. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <a href="sms:5155555785;?body=Hello%20Jim%20I%20have%20a%20question%20about%20your%20product">Text me</a>
          
      596. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    596. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      597. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    597. 
            
            

            

                  # You can use a block as well if your link target is hard to fit into the name parameter. \ERB example:
          
      598. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    598. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      599. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    599. 
            
            

            

                  #   <%= sms_to "5155555785" do %>
          
      600. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    600. 
            
            

            

                  #     <strong>Text me:</strong>
          
      601. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    601. 
            
            

            

                  #   <% end %>
          
      602. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    602. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <a href="sms:5155555785;">
          
      603. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    603. 
            
            

            

                  #          <strong>Text me:</strong>
          
      604. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    604. 
            
            

            

                  #        </a>
          
      605. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    605. 
            1
            

            

                  def sms_to(phone_number, name = nil, html_options = {}, &block)
          
      606. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    606. 
            
            

            

                    html_options, name = name, nil if block_given?
          
      607. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    607. 
            
            

            

                    html_options = (html_options || {}).stringify_keys
          
      608. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    608. 
            
            

            

            
          
      609. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    609. 
            
            

            

                    extras = %w{ body }.map! { |item|
          
      610. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    610. 
            
            

            

                      option = html_options.delete(item).presence || next
          
      611. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    611. 
            
            

            

                      "#{item.dasherize}=#{ERB::Util.url_encode(option)}"
          
      612. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    612. 
            
            

            

                    }.compact
          
      613. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    613. 
            
            

            

                    extras = extras.empty? ? "" : "?&" + extras.join("&")
          
      614. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    614. 
            
            

            

            
          
      615. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    615. 
            
            

            

                    encoded_phone_number = ERB::Util.url_encode(phone_number)
          
      616. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    616. 
            
            

            

                    html_options["href"] = "sms:#{encoded_phone_number};#{extras}"
          
      617. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    617. 
            
            

            

            
          
      618. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    618. 
            
            

            

                    content_tag("a", name || phone_number, html_options, &block)
          
      619. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    619. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      620. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    620. 
            
            

            

            
          
      621. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    621. 
            
            

            

                  # Creates a TEL anchor link tag to the specified +phone_number+, which is
          
      622. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    622. 
            
            

            

                  # also used as the name of the link unless +name+ is specified. Additional
          
      623. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    623. 
            
            

            

                  # HTML attributes for the link can be passed in +html_options+.
          
      624. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    624. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      625. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    625. 
            
            

            

                  # When clicked, the default app to make calls is opened, and it
          
      626. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    626. 
            
            

            

                  # is prepopulated with the passed phone number and optional
          
      627. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    627. 
            
            

            

                  # +country_code+ value.
          
      628. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    628. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      629. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    629. 
            
            

            

                  # +phone_to+ has an optional +country_code+ option which automatically adds the country
          
      630. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    630. 
            
            

            

                  # code as well as the + sign in the phone numer that gets prepopulated,
          
      631. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    631. 
            
            

            

                  # for example if +country_code: "01"+  +\+01+ will be prepended to the
          
      632. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    632. 
            
            

            

                  # phone numer, by passing special keys to +html_options+.
          
      633. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    633. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      634. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    634. 
            
            

            

                  # ==== Options
          
      635. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    635. 
            
            

            

                  # * <tt>:country_code</tt> - Prepends the country code to the number
          
      636. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    636. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      637. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    637. 
            
            

            

                  # ==== Examples
          
      638. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    638. 
            
            

            

                  #   phone_to "1234567890"
          
      639. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    639. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <a href="tel:1234567890">1234567890</a>
          
      640. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    640. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      641. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    641. 
            
            

            

                  #   phone_to "1234567890", "Phone me"
          
      642. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    642. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <a href="tel:134567890">Phone me</a>
          
      643. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    643. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      644. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    644. 
            
            

            

                  #   phone_to "1234567890", "Phone me", country_code: "01"
          
      645. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    645. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <a href="tel:+015155555785">Phone me</a>
          
      646. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    646. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      647. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    647. 
            
            

            

                  # You can use a block as well if your link target is hard to fit into the name parameter. \ERB example:
          
      648. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    648. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      649. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    649. 
            
            

            

                  #   <%= phone_to "1234567890" do %>
          
      650. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    650. 
            
            

            

                  #     <strong>Phone me:</strong>
          
      651. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    651. 
            
            

            

                  #   <% end %>
          
      652. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    652. 
            
            

            

                  #   # => <a href="tel:1234567890">
          
      653. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    653. 
            
            

            

                  #          <strong>Phone me:</strong>
          
      654. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    654. 
            
            

            

                  #        </a>
          
      655. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    655. 
            1
            

            

                  def phone_to(phone_number, name = nil, html_options = {}, &block)
          
      656. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    656. 
            
            

            

                    html_options, name = name, nil if block_given?
          
      657. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    657. 
            
            

            

                    html_options = (html_options || {}).stringify_keys
          
      658. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    658. 
            
            

            

            
          
      659. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    659. 
            
            

            

                    country_code = html_options.delete("country_code").presence
          
      660. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    660. 
            
            

            

                    country_code = country_code.nil? ? "" : "+#{ERB::Util.url_encode(country_code)}"
          
      661. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    661. 
            
            

            

            
          
      662. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    662. 
            
            

            

                    encoded_phone_number = ERB::Util.url_encode(phone_number)
          
      663. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    663. 
            
            

            

                    html_options["href"] = "tel:#{country_code}#{encoded_phone_number}"
          
      664. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    664. 
            
            

            

            
          
      665. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    665. 
            
            

            

                    content_tag("a", name || phone_number, html_options, &block)
          
      666. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    666. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      667. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    667. 
            
            

            

            
          
      668. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    668. 
            1
            

            

                  private
          
      669. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    669. 
            1
            

            

                    def convert_options_to_data_attributes(options, html_options)
          
      670. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    670. 
            
            

            

                      if html_options
          
      671. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    671. 
            
            

            

                        html_options = html_options.stringify_keys
          
      672. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    672. 
            
            

            

                        html_options["data-remote"] = "true" if link_to_remote_options?(options) || link_to_remote_options?(html_options)
          
      673. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    673. 
            
            

            

            
          
      674. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    674. 
            
            

            

                        method = html_options.delete("method")
          
      675. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    675. 
            
            

            

            
          
      676. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    676. 
            
            

            

                        add_method_to_attributes!(html_options, method) if method
          
      677. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    677. 
            
            

            

            
          
      678. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    678. 
            
            

            

                        html_options
          
      679. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    679. 
            
            

            

                      else
          
      680. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    680. 
            
            

            

                        link_to_remote_options?(options) ? { "data-remote" => "true" } : {}
          
      681. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    681. 
            
            

            

                      end
          
      682. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    682. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      683. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    683. 
            
            

            

            
          
      684. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    684. 
            1
            

            

                    def link_to_remote_options?(options)
          
      685. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    685. 
            
            

            

                      if options.is_a?(Hash)
          
      686. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    686. 
            
            

            

                        options.delete("remote") || options.delete(:remote)
          
      687. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    687. 
            
            

            

                      end
          
      688. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    688. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      689. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    689. 
            
            

            

            
          
      690. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    690. 
            1
            

            

                    def add_method_to_attributes!(html_options, method)
          
      691. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    691. 
            
            

            

                      if method_not_get_method?(method) && !html_options["rel"]&.match?(/nofollow/)
          
      692. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    692. 
            
            

            

                        if html_options["rel"].blank?
          
      693. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    693. 
            
            

            

                          html_options["rel"] = "nofollow"
          
      694. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    694. 
            
            

            

                        else
          
      695. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    695. 
            
            

            

                          html_options["rel"] = "#{html_options["rel"]} nofollow"
          
      696. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    696. 
            
            

            

                        end
          
      697. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    697. 
            
            

            

                      end
          
      698. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    698. 
            
            

            

                      html_options["data-method"] = method
          
      699. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    699. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      700. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    700. 
            
            

            

            
          
      701. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    701. 
            1
            

            

                    STRINGIFIED_COMMON_METHODS = {
          
      702. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    702. 
            
            

            

                      get:    "get",
          
      703. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    703. 
            
            

            

                      delete: "delete",
          
      704. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    704. 
            
            

            

                      patch:  "patch",
          
      705. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    705. 
            
            

            

                      post:   "post",
          
      706. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    706. 
            
            

            

                      put:    "put",
          
      707. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    707. 
            
            

            

                    }.freeze
          
      708. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    708. 
            
            

            

            
          
      709. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    709. 
            1
            

            

                    def method_not_get_method?(method)
          
      710. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    710. 
            
            

            

                      return false unless method
          
      711. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    711. 
            
            

            

                      (STRINGIFIED_COMMON_METHODS[method] || method.to_s.downcase) != "get"
          
      712. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    712. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      713. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    713. 
            
            

            

            
          
      714. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    714. 
            1
            

            

                    def token_tag(token = nil, form_options: {})
          
      715. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    715. 
            
            

            

                      if token != false && defined?(protect_against_forgery?) && protect_against_forgery?
          
      716. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    716. 
            
            

            

                        token ||= form_authenticity_token(form_options: form_options)
          
      717. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    717. 
            
            

            

                        tag(:input, type: "hidden", name: request_forgery_protection_token.to_s, value: token)
          
      718. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    718. 
            
            

            

                      else
          
      719. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    719. 
            
            

            

                        ""
          
      720. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    720. 
            
            

            

                      end
          
      721. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    721. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      722. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    722. 
            
            

            

            
          
      723. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    723. 
            1
            

            

                    def method_tag(method)
          
      724. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    724. 
            
            

            

                      tag("input", type: "hidden", name: "_method", value: method.to_s)
          
      725. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    725. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      726. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    726. 
            
            

            

            
          
      727. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    727. 
            
            

            

                    # Returns an array of hashes each containing :name and :value keys
          
      728. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    728. 
            
            

            

                    # suitable for use as the names and values of form input fields:
          
      729. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    729. 
            
            

            

                    #
          
      730. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    730. 
            
            

            

                    #   to_form_params(name: 'David', nationality: 'Danish')
          
      731. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    731. 
            
            

            

                    #   # => [{name: 'name', value: 'David'}, {name: 'nationality', value: 'Danish'}]
          
      732. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    732. 
            
            

            

                    #
          
      733. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    733. 
            
            

            

                    #   to_form_params(country: { name: 'Denmark' })
          
      734. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    734. 
            
            

            

                    #   # => [{name: 'country[name]', value: 'Denmark'}]
          
      735. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    735. 
            
            

            

                    #
          
      736. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    736. 
            
            

            

                    #   to_form_params(countries: ['Denmark', 'Sweden']})
          
      737. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    737. 
            
            

            

                    #   # => [{name: 'countries[]', value: 'Denmark'}, {name: 'countries[]', value: 'Sweden'}]
          
      738. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    738. 
            
            

            

                    #
          
      739. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    739. 
            
            

            

                    # An optional namespace can be passed to enclose key names:
          
      740. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    740. 
            
            

            

                    #
          
      741. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    741. 
            
            

            

                    #   to_form_params({ name: 'Denmark' }, 'country')
          
      742. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    742. 
            
            

            

                    #   # => [{name: 'country[name]', value: 'Denmark'}]
          
      743. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    743. 
            1
            

            

                    def to_form_params(attribute, namespace = nil)
          
      744. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    744. 
            
            

            

                      attribute = if attribute.respond_to?(:permitted?)
          
      745. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    745. 
            
            

            

                        attribute.to_h
          
      746. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    746. 
            
            

            

                      else
          
      747. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    747. 
            
            

            

                        attribute
          
      748. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    748. 
            
            

            

                      end
          
      749. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    749. 
            
            

            

            
          
      750. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    750. 
            
            

            

                      params = []
          
      751. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    751. 
            
            

            

                      case attribute
          
      752. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    752. 
            
            

            

                      when Hash
          
      753. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    753. 
            
            

            

                        attribute.each do |key, value|
          
      754. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    754. 
            
            

            

                          prefix = namespace ? "#{namespace}[#{key}]" : key
          
      755. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    755. 
            
            

            

                          params.push(*to_form_params(value, prefix))
          
      756. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    756. 
            
            

            

                        end
          
      757. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    757. 
            
            

            

                      when Array
          
      758. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    758. 
            
            

            

                        array_prefix = "#{namespace}[]"
          
      759. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    759. 
            
            

            

                        attribute.each do |value|
          
      760. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    760. 
            
            

            

                          params.push(*to_form_params(value, array_prefix))
          
      761. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    761. 
            
            

            

                        end
          
      762. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    762. 
            
            

            

                      else
          
      763. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    763. 
            
            

            

                        params << { name: namespace.to_s, value: attribute.to_param }
          
      764. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    764. 
            
            

            

                      end
          
      765. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    765. 
            
            

            

            
          
      766. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    766. 
            
            

            

                      params.sort_by { |pair| pair[:name] }
          
      767. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    767. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      768. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    768. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      769. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    769. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      770. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    770. 
            
            

            

            end
          
      771.

    lib/action_view/layouts.rb

    50.0% lines covered

    84 relevant lines. 42 lines covered and 42 lines missed.

            # frozen_string_literal: true
