      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            1
            

            

            require "action_view/rendering"
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            1
            

            

            require "active_support/core_ext/module/redefine_method"
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            
            

            

            
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            1
            

            

            module ActionView
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            
            

            

              # Layouts reverse the common pattern of including shared headers and footers in many templates to isolate changes in
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            
            

            

              # repeated setups. The inclusion pattern has pages that look like this:
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            
            

            

              #   <%= render "shared/header" %>
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            
            

            

              #   Hello World
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            
            

            

              #   <%= render "shared/footer" %>
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            
            

            

              # This approach is a decent way of keeping common structures isolated from the changing content, but it's verbose
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            
            

            

              # and if you ever want to change the structure of these two includes, you'll have to change all the templates.
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            
            

            

              # With layouts, you can flip it around and have the common structure know where to insert changing content. This means
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            
            

            

              # that the header and footer are only mentioned in one place, like this:
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            
            

            

              #   // The header part of this layout
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            
            

            

              #   <%= yield %>
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            
            

            

              #   // The footer part of this layout
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            
            

            

              # And then you have content pages that look like this:
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            
            

            

              #    hello world
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            
            

            

              # At rendering time, the content page is computed and then inserted in the layout, like this:
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            
            

            

              #   // The header part of this layout
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            
            

            

              #   hello world
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            
            

            

              #   // The footer part of this layout
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            
            

            

              # == Accessing shared variables
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            
            

            

              # Layouts have access to variables specified in the content pages and vice versa. This allows you to have layouts with
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            
            

            

              # references that won't materialize before rendering time:
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            
            

            

              #   <h1><%= @page_title %></h1>
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            
            

            

              #   <%= yield %>
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            
            

            

              # ...and content pages that fulfill these references _at_ rendering time:
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            
            

            

              #    <% @page_title = "Welcome" %>
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            
            

            

              #    Off-world colonies offers you a chance to start a new life
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            
            

            

              # The result after rendering is:
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            
            

            

              #   <h1>Welcome</h1>
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            
            

            

              #   Off-world colonies offers you a chance to start a new life
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            
            

            

              # == Layout assignment
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            
            

            

              # You can either specify a layout declaratively (using the #layout class method) or give
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            
            

            

              # it the same name as your controller, and place it in <tt>app/views/layouts</tt>.
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            
            

            

              # If a subclass does not have a layout specified, it inherits its layout using normal Ruby inheritance.
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            
            

            

              # For instance, if you have PostsController and a template named <tt>app/views/layouts/posts.html.erb</tt>,
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            
            

            

              # that template will be used for all actions in PostsController and controllers inheriting
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            
            

            

              # from PostsController.
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            
            

            

              # If you use a module, for instance Weblog::PostsController, you will need a template named
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            
            

            

              # <tt>app/views/layouts/weblog/posts.html.erb</tt>.
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            
            

            

              # Since all your controllers inherit from ApplicationController, they will use
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            
            

            

              # <tt>app/views/layouts/application.html.erb</tt> if no other layout is specified
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            
            

            

              # or provided.
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            
            

            

              # == Inheritance Examples
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            
            

            

              #   class BankController < ActionController::Base
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            
            

            

              #     # bank.html.erb exists
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            
            

            

              #   class ExchangeController < BankController
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            
            

            

              #     # exchange.html.erb exists
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            
            

            

              #   class CurrencyController < BankController
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            
            

            

              #   class InformationController < BankController
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            
            

            

              #     layout "information"
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            
            

            

              #   class TellerController < InformationController
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            
            

            

              #     # teller.html.erb exists
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            
            

            

              #   class EmployeeController < InformationController
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            
            

            

              #     # employee.html.erb exists
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            
            

            

              #     layout nil
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            
            

            

              #   class VaultController < BankController
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            
            

            

              #     layout :access_level_layout
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            
            

            

              #   class TillController < BankController
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            
            

            

              #     layout false
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            
            

            

              # In these examples, we have three implicit lookup scenarios:
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            
            

            

              # * The +BankController+ uses the "bank" layout.
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            
            

            

              # * The +ExchangeController+ uses the "exchange" layout.
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            
            

            

              # * The +CurrencyController+ inherits the layout from BankController.
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            
            

            

              # However, when a layout is explicitly set, the explicitly set layout wins:
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            
            

            

              # * The +InformationController+ uses the "information" layout, explicitly set.
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            
            

            

              # * The +TellerController+ also uses the "information" layout, because the parent explicitly set it.
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            
            

            

              # * The +EmployeeController+ uses the "employee" layout, because it set the layout to +nil+, resetting the parent configuration.
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            
            

            

              # * The +VaultController+ chooses a layout dynamically by calling the <tt>access_level_layout</tt> method.
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            
            

            

              # * The +TillController+ does not use a layout at all.
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            
            

            

              # == Types of layouts
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            
            

            

              # Layouts are basically just regular templates, but the name of this template needs not be specified statically. Sometimes
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            
            

            

              # you want to alternate layouts depending on runtime information, such as whether someone is logged in or not. This can
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            
            

            

              # be done either by specifying a method reference as a symbol or using an inline method (as a proc).
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            
            

            

              # The method reference is the preferred approach to variable layouts and is used like this:
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            
            

            

              #   class WeblogController < ActionController::Base
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            
            

            

              #     layout :writers_and_readers
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            
            

            

              #     def index
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            
            

            

              #       # fetching posts
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            
            

            

              #     end
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            
            

            

              #     private
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            
            

            

              #       def writers_and_readers
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            
            

            

              #         logged_in? ? "writer_layout" : "reader_layout"
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            
            

            

              #       end
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            
            

            

              #   end
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            
            

            

              # Now when a new request for the index action is processed, the layout will vary depending on whether the person accessing
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            
            

            

              # is logged in or not.
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            
            

            

              # If you want to use an inline method, such as a proc, do something like this:
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            
            

            

              #   class WeblogController < ActionController::Base
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            
            

            

              #     layout proc { |controller| controller.logged_in? ? "writer_layout" : "reader_layout" }
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            
            

            

              #   end
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            
            

            

              # If an argument isn't given to the proc, it's evaluated in the context of
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            
            

            

              # the current controller anyway.
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            
            

            

              #   class WeblogController < ActionController::Base
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            
            

            

              #     layout proc { logged_in? ? "writer_layout" : "reader_layout" }
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            
            

            

              #   end
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            
            

            

              # Of course, the most common way of specifying a layout is still just as a plain template name:
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            
            

            

              #   class WeblogController < ActionController::Base
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            
            

            

              #     layout "weblog_standard"
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            
            

            

              #   end
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            
            

            

              # The template will be looked always in <tt>app/views/layouts/</tt> folder. But you can point
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            
            

            

              # <tt>layouts</tt> folder direct also. <tt>layout "layouts/demo"</tt> is the same as <tt>layout "demo"</tt>.
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            
            

            

              # Setting the layout to +nil+ forces it to be looked up in the filesystem and fallbacks to the parent behavior if none exists.
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            
            

            

              # Setting it to +nil+ is useful to re-enable template lookup overriding a previous configuration set in the parent:
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            
            

            

              #     class ApplicationController < ActionController::Base
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            
            

            

              #       layout "application"
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            
            

            

              #     end
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            
            

            

              #     class PostsController < ApplicationController
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            
            

            

              #       # Will use "application" layout
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            
            

            

              #     end
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            
            

            

              #     class CommentsController < ApplicationController
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            
            

            

              #       # Will search for "comments" layout and fallback "application" layout
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            
            

            

              #       layout nil
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            
            

            

              #     end
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            
            

            

              # == Conditional layouts
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            
            

            

              # If you have a layout that by default is applied to all the actions of a controller, you still have the option of rendering
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            
            

            

              # a given action or set of actions without a layout, or restricting a layout to only a single action or a set of actions. The
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            
            

            

              # <tt>:only</tt> and <tt>:except</tt> options can be passed to the layout call. For example:
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            
            

            

              #   class WeblogController < ActionController::Base
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            
            

            

              #     layout "weblog_standard", except: :rss
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            
            

            

              #     # ...
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            
            

            

              #   end
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            
            

            

              # This will assign "weblog_standard" as the WeblogController's layout for all actions except for the +rss+ action, which will
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            
            

            

              # be rendered directly, without wrapping a layout around the rendered view.
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            
            

            

              # Both the <tt>:only</tt> and <tt>:except</tt> condition can accept an arbitrary number of method references, so
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            
            

            

              # #<tt>except: [ :rss, :text_only ]</tt> is valid, as is <tt>except: :rss</tt>.
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            
            

            

              # == Using a different layout in the action render call
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            
            

            

              # If most of your actions use the same layout, it makes perfect sense to define a controller-wide layout as described above.
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            
            

            

              # Sometimes you'll have exceptions where one action wants to use a different layout than the rest of the controller.
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            
            

            

              # You can do this by passing a <tt>:layout</tt> option to the <tt>render</tt> call. For example:
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            
            

            

              #   class WeblogController < ActionController::Base
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            
            

            

              #     layout "weblog_standard"
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            
            

            

              #     def help
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            
            

            

              #       render action: "help", layout: "help"
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            
            

            

              #     end
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            
            

            

              #   end
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            
            

            

              # This will override the controller-wide "weblog_standard" layout, and will render the help action with the "help" layout instead.
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            1
            

            

              module Layouts
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            1
            

            

                extend ActiveSupport::Concern
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            
            

            

            
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            1
            

            

                include ActionView::Rendering
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            
            

            

            
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            1
            

            

                included do
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            1
            

            

                  class_attribute :_layout, instance_accessor: false
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            1
            

            

                  class_attribute :_layout_conditions, instance_accessor: false, default: {}
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            
            

            

            
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            1
            

            

                  _write_layout_method
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            
            

            

            
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            1
            

            

                delegate :_layout_conditions, to: :class
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            
            

            

            
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            1
            

            

                module ClassMethods
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            1
            

            

                  def inherited(klass) # :nodoc:
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            9
            

            

                    super
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            9
            

            

                    klass._write_layout_method
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            
            

            

            
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            
            

            

                  # This module is mixed in if layout conditions are provided. This means
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            
            

            

                  # that if no layout conditions are used, this method is not used
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            1
            

            

                  module LayoutConditions # :nodoc:
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            1
            

            

                    private
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            
            

            

                      # Determines whether the current action has a layout definition by
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            
            

            

                      # checking the action name against the :only and :except conditions
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            
            

            

                      # set by the <tt>layout</tt> method.
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            
            

            

                      #
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            
            

            

                      # ==== Returns
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            
            

            

                      # * <tt>Boolean</tt> - True if the action has a layout definition, false otherwise.
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            1
            

            

                      def _conditional_layout?
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            
            

            

                        return unless super
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            
            

            

            
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            
            

            

                        conditions = _layout_conditions
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            
            

            

            
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            
            

            

                        if only = conditions[:only]
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            
            

            

                          only.include?(action_name)
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            
            

            

                        elsif except = conditions[:except]
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            
            

            

                          !except.include?(action_name)
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            
            

            

                        else
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            
            

            

                          true
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            
            

            

                        end
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            
            

            

                      end
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            
            

            

            
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            
            

            

                  # Specify the layout to use for this class.
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            
            

            

                  # If the specified layout is a:
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            
            

            

                  # String:: the String is the template name
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            
            

            

                  # Symbol:: call the method specified by the symbol
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            
            

            

                  # Proc::   call the passed Proc
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            
            

            

                  # false::  There is no layout
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            
            

            

                  # true::   raise an ArgumentError
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            
            

            

                  # nil::    Force default layout behavior with inheritance
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            
            

            

                  # Return value of +Proc+ and +Symbol+ arguments should be +String+, +false+, +true+ or +nil+
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            
            

            

                  # with the same meaning as described above.
          
      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260. 
            
            

            

                  # ==== Parameters
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261. 
            
            

            

                  # * <tt>layout</tt> - The layout to use.
          
      262. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    262. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      263. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    263. 
            
            

            

                  # ==== Options (conditions)
          
      264. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    264. 
            
            

            

                  # * :only   - A list of actions to apply this layout to.
          
      265. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    265. 
            
            

            

                  # * :except - Apply this layout to all actions but this one.
          
      266. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    266. 
            1
            

            

                  def layout(layout, conditions = {})
          
      267. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    267. 
            
            

            

                    include LayoutConditions unless conditions.empty?
          
      268. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    268. 
            
            

            

            
          
      269. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    269. 
            
            

            

                    conditions.each { |k, v| conditions[k] = Array(v).map(&:to_s) }
          
      270. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    270. 
            
            

            

                    self._layout_conditions = conditions
          
      271. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    271. 
            
            

            

            
          
      272. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    272. 
            
            

            

                    self._layout = layout
          
      273. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    273. 
            
            

            

                    _write_layout_method
          
      274. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    274. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      275. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    275. 
            
            

            

            
          
      276. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    276. 
            
            

            

                  # Creates a _layout method to be called by _default_layout .
          
      277. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    277. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      278. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    278. 
            
            

            

                  # If a layout is not explicitly mentioned then look for a layout with the controller's name.
          
      279. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    279. 
            
            

            

                  # if nothing is found then try same procedure to find super class's layout.
          
      280. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    280. 
            1
            

            

                  def _write_layout_method # :nodoc:
          
      281. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    281. 
            10
            

            

                    silence_redefinition_of_method(:_layout)
          
      282. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    282. 
            
            

            

            
          
      283. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    283. 
            10
            

            

                    prefixes = /\blayouts/.match?(_implied_layout_name) ? [] : ["layouts"]
          
      284. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    284. 
            10
            

            

                    default_behavior = "lookup_context.find_all('#{_implied_layout_name}', #{prefixes.inspect}, false, [], { formats: formats }).first || super"
          
      285. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    285. 
            10
            

            

                    name_clause = if name
          
      286. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    286. 
            10
            

            

                      default_behavior
          
      287. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    287. 
            
            

            

                    else
          
      288. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    288. 
            
            

            

                      <<-RUBY
          
      289. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    289. 
            
            

            

                        super
          
      290. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    290. 
            
            

            

                      RUBY
          
      291. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    291. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      292. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    292. 
            
            

            

            
          
      293. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    293. 
            10
            

            

                    layout_definition = \
          
      294. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    294. 
            
            

            

                      case _layout
          
      295. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    295. 
            
            

            

                      when String
          
      296. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    296. 
            
            

            

                        _layout.inspect
          
      297. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    297. 
            
            

            

                      when Symbol
          
      298. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    298. 
            
            

            

                        <<-RUBY
          
      299. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    299. 
            
            

            

                          #{_layout}.tap do |layout|
          
      300. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    300. 
            
            

            

                            return #{default_behavior} if layout.nil?
          
      301. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    301. 
            
            

            

                            unless layout.is_a?(String) || !layout
          
      302. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    302. 
            
            

            

                              raise ArgumentError, "Your layout method :#{_layout} returned \#{layout}. It " \
          
      303. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    303. 
            
            

            

                                "should have returned a String, false, or nil"
          
      304. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    304. 
            
            

            

                            end
          
      305. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    305. 
            
            

            

                          end
          
      306. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    306. 
            
            

            

                        RUBY
          
      307. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    307. 
            
            

            

                      when Proc
          
      308. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    308. 
            
            

            

                        define_method :_layout_from_proc, &_layout
          
      309. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    309. 
            
            

            

                        private :_layout_from_proc
          
      310. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    310. 
            
            

            

                        <<-RUBY
          
      311. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    311. 
            
            

            

                          result = _layout_from_proc(#{_layout.arity == 0 ? '' : 'self'})
          
      312. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    312. 
            
            

            

                          return #{default_behavior} if result.nil?
          
      313. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    313. 
            
            

            

                          result
          
      314. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    314. 
            
            

            

                        RUBY
          
      315. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    315. 
            
            

            

                      when false
          
      316. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    316. 
            
            

            

                        nil
          
      317. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    317. 
            
            

            

                      when true
          
      318. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    318. 
            
            

            

                        raise ArgumentError, "Layouts must be specified as a String, Symbol, Proc, false, or nil"
          
      319. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    319. 
            
            

            

                      when nil
          
      320. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    320. 
            10
            

            

                        name_clause
          
      321. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    321. 
            
            

            

                      end
          
      322. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    322. 
            
            

            

            
          
      323. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    323. 
            10
            

            

                    class_eval <<-RUBY, __FILE__, __LINE__ + 1
          
      324. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    324. 
            
            

            

                      # frozen_string_literal: true
          
      325. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    325. 
            
            

            

                      def _layout(lookup_context, formats)
          
      326. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    326. 
            
            

            

                        if _conditional_layout?
          
      327.

                    # If no layout is supplied, look for a template named the return

                def _normalize_options(options) # :nodoc:

                  super

                  if _include_layout?(options)

      353.

                def initialize(*) # :nodoc:

                # Controls whether an action should be rendered using a layout.
          
      364. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    364. 
            
            

            

                # If you want to disable any <tt>layout</tt> settings for the
          
      365. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    365. 
            
            

            

                # current action so that it is rendered without a layout then
          
      366. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    366. 
            
            

            

                # either override this method in your controller to return false
          
      367. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    367. 
            
            

            

                # for that action or set the <tt>action_has_layout</tt> attribute
          
      368. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    368. 
            
            

            

                # to false before rendering.
          
      369. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    369. 
            1
            

            

                def action_has_layout?

                  @_action_has_layout

                def _conditional_layout?

    375. 
            
            

            

                  true

                # This will be overwritten by _write_layout_method

                def _layout(*); end
          
      380. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    380. 
            
            

            

            
          
      381. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    381. 
            
            

            

                # Determine the layout for a given name, taking into account the name type.
          
      382. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    382. 
            
            

            

                #
          
      383. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    383. 
            
            

            

                # ==== Parameters
          
      384. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    384. 
            
            

            

                # * <tt>name</tt> - The name of the template
          
      385. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    385. 
            1
            

            

                def _layout_for_option(name)
          
      386. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    386. 
            
            

            

                  case name
          
      387. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    387. 
            
            

            

                  when String     then _normalize_layout(name)
          
      388. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    388. 
            
            

            

                  when Proc       then name
          
      389. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    389. 
            
            

            

                  when true       then Proc.new { |lookup_context, formats| _default_layout(lookup_context, formats, true)  }
          
      390. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    390. 
            
            

            

                  when :default   then Proc.new { |lookup_context, formats| _default_layout(lookup_context, formats, false) }
          
      391. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    391. 
            
            

            

                  when false, nil then nil
          
      392. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    392. 
            
            

            

                  else
          
      393. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    393. 
            
            

            

                    raise ArgumentError,
          
      394. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    394. 
            
            

            

                      "String, Proc, :default, true, or false, expected for `layout'; you passed #{name.inspect}"
          
      395. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    395. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      396. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    396. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      397. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    397. 
            
            

            

            
          
      398. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    398. 
            1
            

            

                def _normalize_layout(value)
          
      399. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    399. 
            
            

            

                  value.is_a?(String) && !value.match?(/\blayouts/) ? "layouts/#{value}" : value
          
      400. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    400. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      401. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    401. 
            
            

            

            
          
      402. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    402. 
            
            

            

                # Returns the default layout for this controller.
          
      403. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    403. 
            
            

            

                # Optionally raises an exception if the layout could not be found.
          
      404. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    404. 
            
            

            

                #
          
      405. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    405. 
            
            

            

                # ==== Parameters
          
      406. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    406. 
            
            

            

                # * <tt>formats</tt> - The formats accepted to this layout
          
      407. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    407. 
            
            

            

                # * <tt>require_layout</tt> - If set to +true+ and layout is not found,
          
      408. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    408. 
            
            

            

                #   an +ArgumentError+ exception is raised (defaults to +false+)
          
      409. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    409. 
            
            

            

                #
          
      410. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    410. 
            
            

            

                # ==== Returns
          
      411. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    411. 
            
            

            

                # * <tt>template</tt> - The template object for the default layout (or +nil+)
          
      412. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    412. 
            1
            

            

                def _default_layout(lookup_context, formats, require_layout = false)
          
      413. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    413. 
            
            

            

                  begin
          
      414. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    414. 
            
            

            

                    value = _layout(lookup_context, formats) if action_has_layout?
          
      415. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    415. 
            
            

            

                  rescue NameError => e
          
      416. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    416. 
            
            

            

                    raise e, "Could not render layout: #{e.message}"
          
      417. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    417. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      418. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    418. 
            
            

            

            
          
      419. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    419. 
            
            

            

                  if require_layout && action_has_layout? && !value
          
      420. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    420. 
            
            

            

                    raise ArgumentError,
          
      421. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    421. 
            
            

            

                      "There was no default layout for #{self.class} in #{view_paths.inspect}"
          
      422. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    422. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      423. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    423. 
            
            

            

            
          
      424. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    424. 
            
            

            

                  _normalize_layout(value)
          
      425. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    425. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      426. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    426. 
            
            

            

            
          
      427. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    427. 
            1
            

            

                def _include_layout?(options)
          
      428. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    428. 
            
            

            

                  (options.keys & [:body, :plain, :html, :inline, :partial]).empty? || options.key?(:layout)
          
      429. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    429. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      430. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    430. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      431. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    431. 
            
            

            

            end

                def render_template(event)
          
      18.

                  info do

      20.

                def render_partial(event)

                  debug do

                EMPTY = ""
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            1
            

            

                def from_rails_root(string) # :doc:
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            
            

            

                  string = string.sub(rails_root, EMPTY)
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            
            

            

                  string.sub!(VIEWS_PATTERN, EMPTY)
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            
            

            

                  string
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      70.

                def rails_root # :doc:
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            
            

            

                  @root ||= "#{Rails.root}/"
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            
            

            

            
          
      75.

                def render_count(payload) # :doc:
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            
            

            

                  if payload[:cache_hits]
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            
            

            

                    "[#{payload[:cache_hits]} / #{payload[:count]} cache hits]"
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            
            

            

                  else
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            
            

            

                    "[#{payload[:count]} times]"
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            
            

            

            
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            1
            

            

                def cache_message(payload) # :doc:
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            
            

            

                  case payload[:cache_hit]
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            
            

            

                  when :hit
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            
            

            

                    "[cache hit]"
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            
            

            

                  when :miss
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            
            

            

                    "[cache miss]"
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            
            

            

            
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            1
            

            

                def log_rendering_start(payload, name)
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            
            

            

                  debug do
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            
            

            

                    qualifier =
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            
            

            

                      if name == "render_template.action_view"
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            
            

            

                        ""
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            
            

            

                      elsif name == "render_layout.action_view"
          
      98.

              # <tt>LookupContext</tt> is the object responsible for holding all information

              # required for looking up templates, i.e. view paths and details.

    13. 
            
            

            

              # view paths, used in the resolver cache lookup. Since this key is generated
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14.

                  def _set_detail(key, value) # :doc:

    117.

                  # Adds fallbacks to the view paths. Useful in cases when you are rendering

      152.

            1
            

            

                  def with_fallbacks
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            
            

            

                    view_paths = build_view_paths((@view_paths.paths + self.class.fallbacks).uniq)
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            
            

            

            
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            
            

            

                    if block_given?
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            
            

            

                      ActiveSupport::Deprecation.warn <<~eowarn.squish
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            
            

            

                      Calling `with_fallbacks` with a block is deprecated.  Call methods on
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            
            

            

                      the lookup context returned by `with_fallbacks` instead.
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            
            

            

                      eowarn
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            
            

            

            
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            
            

            

                      begin
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            
            

            

                        _view_paths = @view_paths
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            
            

            

                        @view_paths = view_paths
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            
            

            

                        yield
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            
            

            

                      ensure
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            
            

            

                        @view_paths = _view_paths
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            
            

            

                      end
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            
            

            

                    else
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            
            

            

                      ActionView::LookupContext.new(view_paths, @details, @prefixes)
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      172.

                private
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            
            

            

                  # Whenever setting view paths, makes a copy so that we can manipulate them in
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            
            

            

                  # instance objects as we wish.
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            1
            

            

                  def build_view_paths(paths)
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            
            

            

                    ActionView::PathSet.new(Array(paths))
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            
            

            

            
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            1
            

            

                  def args_for_lookup(name, prefixes, partial, keys, details_options)
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            
            

            

                    name, prefixes = normalize_name(name, prefixes)
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            
            

            

                    details, details_key = detail_args_for(details_options)
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            
            

            

                    [name, prefixes, partial || false, details, details_key, keys]
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            
            

            

                  end

                  # Compute details hash and key according to user options (e.g. passed from #render).

                  def detail_args_for(options) # :doc:

    188. 
            
            

            

                    return @details, details_key if options.empty? # most common path.

                    user_details = @details.merge(options)
          
      190.

      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            
            

            

                    if @cache

      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      196.
