                  def args_for_any(name, prefixes, partial)
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            
            

            

                    name, prefixes = normalize_name(name, prefixes)
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            
            

            

                    details, details_key = detail_args_for_any
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            
            

            

                    [name, prefixes, partial || false, details, details_key]
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204.

      205.

            1
            

            

                  def detail_args_for_any
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            
            

            

                    @detail_args_for_any ||= begin
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            
            

            

                      details = {}
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            
            

            

            
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            
            

            

                      registered_details.each do |k|

    213.

      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215.

      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216.

                  # Support legacy foo.erb names even though we now ignore .erb
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            
            

            

                  # as well as incorrectly putting part of the path in the template
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            
            

            

                  # name instead of the prefix.
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            1
            

            

                  def normalize_name(name, prefixes)
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            
            

            

                    prefixes = prefixes.presence
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            
            

            

                    parts    = name.to_s.split("/")
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            
            

            

                    parts.shift if parts.first.empty?
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            
            

            

                    name = parts.pop
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            
            

            

            
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            
            

            

                    return name, prefixes || [""] if parts.empty?
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            
            

            

            
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            
            

            

                    parts    = parts.join("/")
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            
            

            

                    prefixes = prefixes ? prefixes.map { |p| "#{p}/#{parts}" } : [parts]
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            
            

            

            
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            
            

            

                    return name, prefixes
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            
            

            

            
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            1

                private :initialize_details

                def formats=(values)
          
      280. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    280. 
            
            

            

                  if values
          
      281. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    281. 
            
            

            

                    values = values.dup
          
      282. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    282. 
            
            

            

                    values.concat(default_formats) if values.delete "*/*"
          
      283. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    283. 
            
            

            

                    values.uniq!
          
      284. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    284. 
            
            

            

            
          
      285. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    285. 
            
            

            

                    invalid_values = (values - Template::Types.symbols)
          
      286. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    286. 
            
            

            

                    unless invalid_values.empty?
          
      287. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    287. 
            
            

            

                      raise ArgumentError, "Invalid formats: #{invalid_values.map(&:inspect).join(", ")}"
          
      288. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    288. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      289. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    289. 
            
            

            

            
          
      290. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    290. 
            
            

            

                    if values == [:js]

    291.

      296.

                def locale=(value)

      310.

                def dom_class(record_or_class, prefix = nil)
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75.

      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76.

    77.

                def dom_id(record, prefix = nil)

    90. 
            
            

            

                  if record_id = record_key_for_dom_id(record)

              private
          
      98.

                # Returns a string representation of the key attribute(s) that is suitable for use in an HTML DOM id.
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            
            

            

                # This can be overwritten to customize the default generated string representation if desired.
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            
            

            

                # If you need to read back a key from a dom_id in order to query for the underlying database record,
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            
            

            

                # you should write a helper like 'person_record_from_dom_id' that will extract the key either based
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            
            

            

                # on the default implementation (which just joins all key attributes with '_') or on your own
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            
            

            

                # overwritten version of the method. By default, this implementation passes the key string through a
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            
            

            

                # method that replaces all characters that are invalid inside DOM ids, with valid ones. You need to
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            
            

            

                # make sure yourself that your dom ids are valid, in case you overwrite this method.
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            1
            

            

                def record_key_for_dom_id(record) # :doc:
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            
            

            

                  key = convert_to_model(record).to_key
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            
            

            

                  key ? key.join(JOIN) : key
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            
            

            

              end

    111. 
            
            

            

            end

              # This class defines the interface for a renderer. Each class that

              # subclasses +AbstractRenderer+ is used by the base +Renderer+ class to

              # renderer object of the correct type is created, and the +render+ method on

                    def local_variable(path)

                      if as = @options[:as]

      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            
            

            

                          base = path.end_with?("/") ? "" : File.basename(path)
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            
            

            

                          raise_invalid_identifier(path) unless base =~ /\A_?(.*?)(?:\.\w+)*\z/
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            
            

            

                          $1.to_sym
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            
            

            

                        end
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            
            

            

                      end
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            
            

            

                    end

                    IDENTIFIER_ERROR_MESSAGE = "The partial name (%s) is not a valid Ruby identifier; " \
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            
            

            

                                               "make sure your partial name starts with underscore."
          
      58.

      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            
            

            

                                               "make sure it starts with lowercase letter, " \
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            
            

            

                                               "and is followed by any combination of letters, numbers and underscores."
          
      62.

                    # Obtains the path to where the object's partial is located. If the object
          
      72.

                    # responds to +to_partial_path+, then +to_partial_path+ will be called and
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            
            

            

                    # will provide the path. If the object does not respond to +to_partial_path+,
          
      74.

                    def merge_prefix_into_object_path(prefix, object_path)
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            
            

            

                      if prefix.include?(?/) && object_path.include?(?/)
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            
            

            

                        prefixes = []
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            
            

            

                        prefix_array = File.dirname(prefix).split("/")
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            
            

            

                        object_path_array = object_path.split("/")[0..-3] # skip model dir & partial
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            
            

            

            
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            
            

            

                        prefix_array.each_with_index do |dir, index|
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            
            

            

                          break if dir == object_path_array[index]
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            
            

            

                          prefixes << dir
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            
            

            

                        end
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            
            

            

            
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            
            

            

                        (prefixes << object_path).join("/")
          
      106.

                  def each_with_info

                    return enum_for(:each_with_info) unless block_given?

                class PreloadCollectionIterator < SameCollectionIterator # :nodoc:

                  def initialize(collection, path, variables, relation)

                    super(collection, path, variables)

                  def from_collection(collection)

                  def each_with_info

                class MixedCollectionIterator < CollectionIterator # :nodoc:

                  def each_with_info

                    return enum_for(:each_with_info) unless block_given?

                def render_collection_with_partial(collection, partial, context, block)
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            
            

            

                  iter_vars  = retrieve_variable(partial)

    102. 
            
            

            

            
          
      103.

                  collection = if collection.respond_to?(:preload_associations)
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            
            

            

                    PreloadCollectionIterator.new(collection, partial, iter_vars, collection)

    105. 
            
            

            

                  else

    106. 
            
            

            

                    SameCollectionIterator.new(collection, partial, iter_vars)

                  end
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108.

                  template = find_template(partial, @locals.keys + iter_vars)
          
      111.

      112.

                  end
          
      115.

                def render_collection_derive_partial(collection, context, block)
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            
            

            

                  paths = collection.map { |o| partial_path(o, context) }
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            
            

            

            
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            
            

            

                  if paths.uniq.length == 1
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            
            

            

                    # Homogeneous
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            
            

            

                    render_collection_with_partial(collection, paths.first, context, block)
          
      125.

                  else
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            
            

            

                    if @options[:cached]

                      raise NotImplementedError, "render caching requires a template. Please specify a partial when rendering"
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            
            

            

            
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            
            

            

                    paths.map! { |path| retrieve_variable(path).unshift(path) }
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            
            

            

                    collection = MixedCollectionIterator.new(collection, paths)
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            
            

            

                    render_collection(collection, context, nil, nil, nil, block)
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            
            

            

                end

                private
          
      137.

                  def retrieve_variable(path)
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            
            

            

                    variable = local_variable(path)
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            
            

            

                    [variable, :"#{variable}_counter", :"#{variable}_iteration"]
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            
            

            

            
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            1
            

            

                  def render_collection(collection, view, path, template, layout, block)
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            
            

            

                    identifier = (template && template.identifier) || path
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            
            

            

                    ActiveSupport::Notifications.instrument(
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            
            

            

                      "render_collection.action_view",
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            
            

            

                      identifier: identifier,
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            
            

            

                      layout: layout && layout.virtual_path,
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            
            

            

                      count: collection.size
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            
            

            

                    ) do |payload|
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            
            

            

                      spacer = if @options.key?(:spacer_template)
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            
            

            

                        spacer_template = find_template(@options[:spacer_template], @locals.keys)
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            
            

            

                        build_rendered_template(spacer_template.render(view, @locals), spacer_template)
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            
            

            

                      else
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            
            

            

                        RenderedTemplate::EMPTY_SPACER
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            
            

            

                      end
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            
            

            

            
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            
            

            

                      collection_body = if template
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            
            

            

                        cache_collection_render(payload, view, template, collection) do |filtered_collection|
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            
            

            

                          collection_with_template(view, template, layout, filtered_collection)
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            
            

            

                        end
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            
            

            

                      else
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            
            

            

                        collection_with_template(view, nil, layout, collection)
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            
            

            

                      end
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            
            

            

            
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            
            

            

                      return RenderedCollection.empty(@lookup_context.formats.first) if collection_body.empty?
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            
            

            

            
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            
            

            

                      build_rendered_collection(collection_body, spacer)
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            
            

            

            
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            1
            

            

                  def collection_with_template(view, template, layout, collection)
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            
            

            

                    locals = @locals
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            
            

            

                    cache = {}
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            
            

            

            
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            
            

            

                    partial_iteration = PartialIteration.new(collection.size)
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            
            

            

            
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            
            

            

                    collection.each_with_info.map do |object, (path, as, counter, iteration)|
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            
            

            

                      index = partial_iteration.index
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            
            

            

            
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            
            

            

                      locals[as]        = object
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            
            

            

                      locals[counter]   = index
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            
            

            

                      locals[iteration] = partial_iteration
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            
            

            

            
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            
            

            

                      _template = (cache[path] ||= (template || find_template(path, @locals.keys + [as, counter, iteration])))
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            
            

            

            
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            
            

            

                      content = _template.render(view, locals)
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            
            

            

                      content = layout.render(view, locals) { content } if layout
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            
            

            

                      partial_iteration.iterate!
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            
            

            

                      build_rendered_template(content, _template)
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            
            

            

            end
          
      194.

    37.04% lines covered

            require "action_view/renderer/partial_renderer/collection_caching"

            module ActionView
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            
            

            

              # = Action View Partials
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            
            

            

              # There's also a convenience method for rendering sub templates within the current controller that depends on a
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            
            

            

              # single object (we call this kind of sub templates for partials). It relies on the fact that partials should
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            
            

            

              # follow the naming convention of being prefixed with an underscore -- as to separate them from regular
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            
            

            

              # templates that could be rendered on their own.
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            
            

            

              # In a template for Advertiser#account:
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            
            

            

              #  <%= render partial: "account" %>
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            
            

            

              # This would render "advertiser/_account.html.erb".
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            
            

            

              # In another template for Advertiser#buy, we could have:
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            
            

            

              #   <%= render partial: "account", locals: { account: @buyer } %>
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            
            

            

              #   <% @advertisements.each do |ad| %>
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            
            

            

              #     <%= render partial: "ad", locals: { ad: ad } %>
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            
            

            

              #   <% end %>
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            
            

            

              # This would first render <tt>advertiser/_account.html.erb</tt> with <tt>@buyer</tt> passed in as the local variable +account+, then
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            
            

            

              # render <tt>advertiser/_ad.html.erb</tt> and pass the local variable +ad+ to the template for display.
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            
            

            

              # == The :as and :object options
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            
            

            

              # By default ActionView::PartialRenderer doesn't have any local variables.
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            
            

            

              # The <tt>:object</tt> option can be used to pass an object to the partial. For instance:
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            
            

            

              #   <%= render partial: "account", object: @buyer %>
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            
            

            

              # would provide the <tt>@buyer</tt> object to the partial, available under the local variable +account+ and is
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            
            

            

              # equivalent to:
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            
            

            

              #   <%= render partial: "account", locals: { account: @buyer } %>
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            
            

            

              # With the <tt>:as</tt> option we can specify a different name for said local variable. For example, if we
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            
            

            

              # wanted it to be +user+ instead of +account+ we'd do:
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            
            

            

              #   <%= render partial: "account", object: @buyer, as: 'user' %>
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            
            

            

              # This is equivalent to
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            
            

            

              #   <%= render partial: "account", locals: { user: @buyer } %>
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            
            

            

              # == \Rendering a collection of partials
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            
            

            

              # The example of partial use describes a familiar pattern where a template needs to iterate over an array and
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            
            

            

              # render a sub template for each of the elements. This pattern has been implemented as a single method that
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            
            

            

              # accepts an array and renders a partial by the same name as the elements contained within. So the three-lined
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            
            

            

              # example in "Using partials" can be rewritten with a single line:
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            
            

            

              #   <%= render partial: "ad", collection: @advertisements %>
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            
            

            

              # This will render <tt>advertiser/_ad.html.erb</tt> and pass the local variable +ad+ to the template for display. An
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            
            

            

              # iteration object will automatically be made available to the template with a name of the form
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            
            

            

              # +partial_name_iteration+. The iteration object has knowledge about which index the current object has in
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            
            

            

              # the collection and the total size of the collection. The iteration object also has two convenience methods,
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            
            

            

              # +first?+ and +last?+. In the case of the example above, the template would be fed +ad_iteration+.
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            
            

            

              # For backwards compatibility the +partial_name_counter+ is still present and is mapped to the iteration's
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            
            

            

              # +index+ method.
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            
            

            

              # The <tt>:as</tt> option may be used when rendering partials.
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            
            

            

              # You can specify a partial to be rendered between elements via the <tt>:spacer_template</tt> option.
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            
            

            

              # The following example will render <tt>advertiser/_ad_divider.html.erb</tt> between each ad partial:
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            
            

            

              #   <%= render partial: "ad", collection: @advertisements, spacer_template: "ad_divider" %>
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            
            

            

              # If the given <tt>:collection</tt> is +nil+ or empty, <tt>render</tt> will return +nil+. This will allow you
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            
            

            

              # to specify a text which will be displayed instead by using this form:
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            
            

            

              #   <%= render(partial: "ad", collection: @advertisements) || "There's no ad to be displayed" %>
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            
            

            

              # == \Rendering shared partials
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            
            

            

              # Two controllers can share a set of partials and render them like this:
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            
            

            

              #   <%= render partial: "advertisement/ad", locals: { ad: @advertisement } %>
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            
            

            

              # This will render the partial <tt>advertisement/_ad.html.erb</tt> regardless of which controller this is being called from.
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            
            

            

              # == \Rendering objects that respond to +to_partial_path+
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            
            

            

              # Instead of explicitly naming the location of a partial, you can also let PartialRenderer do the work
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            
            

            

              # and pick the proper path by checking +to_partial_path+ method.
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            
            

            

              #  # @account.to_partial_path returns 'accounts/account', so it can be used to replace:
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            
            

            

              #  # <%= render partial: "accounts/account", locals: { account: @account} %>
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            
            

            

              #  <%= render partial: @account %>
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            
            

            

              #  # @posts is an array of Post instances, so every post record returns 'posts/post' on +to_partial_path+,
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            
            

            

              #  # that's why we can replace:
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            
            

            

              #  # <%= render partial: "posts/post", collection: @posts %>
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            
            

            

              #  <%= render partial: @posts %>
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            
            

            

              # == \Rendering the default case
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            
            

            

              # If you're not going to be using any of the options like collections or layouts, you can also use the short-hand
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            
            

            

              # defaults of render to render partials. Examples:
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            
            

            

              #  # Instead of <%= render partial: "account" %>
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            
            

            

              #  <%= render "account" %>
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            
            

            

              #  # Instead of <%= render partial: "account", locals: { account: @buyer } %>
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            
            

            

              #  <%= render "account", account: @buyer %>
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            
            

            

              #  # @account.to_partial_path returns 'accounts/account', so it can be used to replace:
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            
            

            

              #  # <%= render partial: "accounts/account", locals: { account: @account} %>
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            
            

            

              #  <%= render @account %>
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            
            

            

              #  # @posts is an array of Post instances, so every post record returns 'posts/post' on +to_partial_path+,
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            
            

            

              #  # that's why we can replace:
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            
            

            

              #  # <%= render partial: "posts/post", collection: @posts %>
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            
            

            

              #  <%= render @posts %>
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            
            

            

              # == \Rendering partials with layouts
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            
            

            

              # Partials can have their own layouts applied to them. These layouts are different than the ones that are
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            
            

            

              # specified globally for the entire action, but they work in a similar fashion. Imagine a list with two types
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            
            

            

              # of users:
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            
            

            

              #   <%# app/views/users/index.html.erb %>
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            
            

            

              #   Here's the administrator:
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            
            

            

              #   <%= render partial: "user", layout: "administrator", locals: { user: administrator } %>
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            
            

            

              #   Here's the editor:
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            
            

            

              #   <%= render partial: "user", layout: "editor", locals: { user: editor } %>
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            
            

            

              #   <%# app/views/users/_user.html.erb %>
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            
            

            

              #   Name: <%= user.name %>
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            
            

            

              #   <%# app/views/users/_administrator.html.erb %>
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            
            

            

              #   <div id="administrator">
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            
            

            

              #     Budget: $<%= user.budget %>
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            
            

            

              #     <%= yield %>
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            
            

            

              #   </div>
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            
            

            

              #   <%# app/views/users/_editor.html.erb %>
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            
            

            

              #   <div id="editor">
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            
            

            

              #     Deadline: <%= user.deadline %>
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            
            

            

              #     <%= yield %>
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            
            

            

              #   </div>
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            
            

            

              # ...this will return:
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            
            

            

              #   Here's the administrator:
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            
            

            

              #   <div id="administrator">
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            
            

            

              #     Budget: $<%= user.budget %>
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            
            

            

              #     Name: <%= user.name %>
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            
            

            

              #   </div>
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            
            

            

              #   Here's the editor:
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            
            

            

              #   <div id="editor">
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            
            

            

              #     Deadline: <%= user.deadline %>
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            
            

            

              #     Name: <%= user.name %>
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            
            

            

              #   </div>
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            
            

            

              # If a collection is given, the layout will be rendered once for each item in
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            
            

            

              # the collection. For example, these two snippets have the same output:
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            
            

            

              #   <%# app/views/users/_user.html.erb %>
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            
            

            

              #   Name: <%= user.name %>
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            
            

            

              #   <%# app/views/users/index.html.erb %>
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            
            

            

              #   <%# This does not use layouts %>
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            
            

            

              #   <ul>
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            
            

            

              #     <% users.each do |user| -%>
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            
            

            

              #       <li>
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            
            

            

              #         <%= render partial: "user", locals: { user: user } %>
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            
            

            

              #       </li>
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            
            

            

              #     <% end -%>
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            
            

            

              #   </ul>
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            
            

            

              #   <%# app/views/users/_li_layout.html.erb %>
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            
            

            

              #   <li>
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            
            

            

              #     <%= yield %>
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            
            

            

              #   </li>
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            
            

            

              #   <%# app/views/users/index.html.erb %>
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            
            

            

              #   <ul>
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            
            

            

              #     <%= render partial: "user", layout: "li_layout", collection: users %>
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            
            

            

              #   </ul>
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            
            

            

              # Given two users whose names are Alice and Bob, these snippets return:
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            
            

            

              #   <ul>
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            
            

            

              #     <li>
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            
            

            

              #       Name: Alice
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            
            

            

              #     </li>
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            
            

            

              #     <li>
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            
            

            

              #       Name: Bob
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            
            

            

              #     </li>
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            
            

            

              #   </ul>
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            
            

            

              # The current object being rendered, as well as the object_counter, will be
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            
            

            

              # available as local variables inside the layout template under the same names
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            
            

            

              # as available in the partial.
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            
            

            

              # You can also apply a layout to a block within any template:
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            
            

            

              #   <%# app/views/users/_chief.html.erb %>
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            
            

            

              #   <%= render(layout: "administrator", locals: { user: chief }) do %>
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            
            

            

              #     Title: <%= chief.title %>
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            
            

            

              #   <% end %>
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            
            

            

              # ...this will return:
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            
            

            

              #   <div id="administrator">
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            
            

            

              #     Budget: $<%= user.budget %>
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            
            

            

              #     Title: <%= chief.name %>
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            
            

            

              #   </div>
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            
            

            

              # As you can see, the <tt>:locals</tt> hash is shared between both the partial and its layout.
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            
            

            

              # If you pass arguments to "yield" then this will be passed to the block. One way to use this is to pass
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            
            

            

              # an array to layout and treat it as an enumerable.
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            
            

            

              #   <%# app/views/users/_user.html.erb %>
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            
            

            

              #   <div class="user">
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            
            

            

              #     Budget: $<%= user.budget %>
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            
            

            

              #     <%= yield user %>
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            
            

            

              #   </div>
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            
            

            

              #   <%# app/views/users/index.html.erb %>
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            
            

            

              #   <%= render layout: @users do |user| %>
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            
            

            

              #     Title: <%= user.title %>
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            
            

            

              #   <% end %>
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            
            

            

              # This will render the layout for each user and yield to the block, passing the user, each time.
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            
            

            

              # You can also yield multiple times in one layout and use block arguments to differentiate the sections.
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            
            

            

              #   <%# app/views/users/_user.html.erb %>
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            
            

            

              #   <div class="user">
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            
            

            

              #     <%= yield user, :header %>
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            
            

            

              #     Budget: $<%= user.budget %>
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            
            

            

              #     <%= yield user, :footer %>
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            
            

            

              #   </div>
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            
            

            

              #   <%# app/views/users/index.html.erb %>
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            
            

            

              #   <%= render layout: @users do |user, section| %>
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            
            

            

              #     <%- case section when :header -%>
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            
            

            

              #       Title: <%= user.title %>
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            
            

            

              #     <%- when :footer -%>
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            
            

            

              #       Deadline: <%= user.deadline %>
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            
            

            

              #     <%- end -%>
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            
            

            

              #   <% end %>
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            1
            

            

              class PartialRenderer < AbstractRenderer
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            1
            

            

                include CollectionCaching
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            
            

            

            
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            1
            

            

                def initialize(lookup_context, options)
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            
            

            

                  super(lookup_context)
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            
            

            

                  @options = options
          
      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260. 
            
            

            

                  @locals  = @options[:locals] || {}
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261. 
            
            

            

                  @details = extract_details(@options)
          
      262. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    262.

    263. 
            
            

            

            
          
      264. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    264. 
            1
            

            

                def render(partial, context, block)
          
      265. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    265. 
            
            

            

                  template = find_template(partial, template_keys(partial))

                  if !block && (layout = @options[:layout])

                  def render_partial_template(view, locals, template, layout, block)
          
      280. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    280. 
            
            

            

                    ActiveSupport::Notifications.instrument(
          
      281. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    281. 
            
            

            

                      "render_partial.action_view",
          
      282. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    282. 
            
            

            

                      identifier: template.identifier,
          
      283. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    283. 
            
            

            

                      layout: layout && layout.virtual_path
          
      284. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    284. 
            
            

            

                    ) do |payload|
          
      285. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    285. 
            
            

            

                      content = template.render(view, locals, add_to_stack: !block) do |*name|
          
      286. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    286. 
            
            

            

                        view._layout_for(*name, &block)
          
      287. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    287. 
            
            

            

                      end
          
      288. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    288. 
            
            

            

            
          
      289. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    289. 
            
            

            

                      content = layout.render(view, locals) { content } if layout
          
      290. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    290. 
            
            

            

                      payload[:cache_hit] = view.view_renderer.cache_hits[template.virtual_path]
          
      291. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    291. 
            
            

            

                      build_rendered_template(content, template)
          
      292. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    292. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      293. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    293.

                  def find_template(path, locals)

                  def will_cache?(options, view)
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            
            

            

                    options[:cached] && view.controller.respond_to?(:perform_caching) && view.controller.perform_caching
