                def initialize(source, identifier, handler, format: nil, variant: nil, locals: nil, virtual_path: nil, updated_at: nil)
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            
            

            

                  unless locals
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            
            

            

                    ActiveSupport::Deprecation.warn "ActionView::Template#initialize requires a locals parameter"
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            
            

            

                    locals = []
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            
            

            

            
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            
            

            

                  @source            = source
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            
            

            

                  @identifier        = identifier
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            
            

            

                  @handler           = handler
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            
            

            

                  @compiled          = false
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            
            

            

                  @locals            = locals
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            
            

            

                  @virtual_path      = virtual_path
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            
            

            

            
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            
            

            

                  @variable = if @virtual_path
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            
            

            

                    base = @virtual_path.end_with?("/") ? "" : ::File.basename(@virtual_path)
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            
            

            

                    base =~ /\A_?(.*?)(?:\.\w+)*\z/
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            
            

            

                    $1.to_sym
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            
            

            

            
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            
            

            

                  if updated_at
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            
            

            

                    ActiveSupport::Deprecation.warn "ActionView::Template#updated_at is deprecated"
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            
            

            

                    @updated_at        = updated_at
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            
            

            

                  else
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            
            

            

                    @updated_at        = Time.now
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            
            

            

                  @format            = format
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            
            

            

                  @variant           = variant
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            
            

            

                  @compile_mutex     = Mutex.new
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            
            

            

            
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            1
            

            

                deprecate :original_encoding
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            1
            

            

                deprecate :updated_at
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            1
            

            

                deprecate def virtual_path=(_); end
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            1
            

            

                deprecate def locals=(_); end
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            1
            

            

                deprecate def formats=(_); end
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            1
            

            

                deprecate def formats; Array(format); end
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            1
            

            

                deprecate def variants=(_); end
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            1
            

            

                deprecate def variants; [variant]; end
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            1
            

            

                deprecate def refresh(_); self; end
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            
            

            

            
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            
            

            

                # Returns whether the underlying handler supports streaming. If so,
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            
            

            

                # a streaming buffer *may* be passed when it starts rendering.
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            1
            

            

                def supports_streaming?
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            
            

            

                  handler.respond_to?(:supports_streaming?) && handler.supports_streaming?
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            
            

            

            
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            
            

            

                # Render a template. If the template was not compiled yet, it is done
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            
            

            

                # exactly before rendering.
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            
            

            

                #
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            
            

            

                # This method is instrumented as "!render_template.action_view". Notice that
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            
            

            

                # we use a bang in this instrumentation because you don't want to
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            
            

            

                # consume this in production. This is only slow if it's being listened to.
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            1
            

            

                def render(view, locals, buffer = ActionView::OutputBuffer.new, add_to_stack: true, &block)
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            
            

            

                  instrument_render_template do
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            
            

            

                    compile!(view)
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            
            

            

                    view._run(method_name, self, locals, buffer, add_to_stack: add_to_stack, &block)
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            
            

            

                rescue => e
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            
            

            

                  handle_render_error(view, e)
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            
            

            

            
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            1
            

            

                def type
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            
            

            

                  @type ||= Types[format]
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            
            

            

            
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            1
            

            

                def short_identifier
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            
            

            

                  @short_identifier ||= defined?(Rails.root) ? identifier.delete_prefix("#{Rails.root}/") : identifier
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            
            

            

            
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            1
            

            

                def inspect
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            
            

            

                  "#<#{self.class.name} #{short_identifier} locals=#{@locals.inspect}>"
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            
            

            

            
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            1
            

            

                def source
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            
            

            

                  @source.to_s
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            
            

            

            
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            
            

            

                # This method is responsible for properly setting the encoding of the
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            
            

            

                # source. Until this point, we assume that the source is BINARY data.
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            
            

            

                # If no additional information is supplied, we assume the encoding is
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            
            

            

                # the same as <tt>Encoding.default_external</tt>.
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            
            

            

                #
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            
            

            

                # The user can also specify the encoding via a comment on the first
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            
            

            

                # line of the template (# encoding: NAME-OF-ENCODING). This will work
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            
            

            

                # with any template engine, as we process out the encoding comment
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            
            

            

                # before passing the source on to the template engine, leaving a
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            
            

            

                # blank line in its stead.
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            1
            

            

                def encode!
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            
            

            

                  source = self.source
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            
            

            

            
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            
            

            

                  return source unless source.encoding == Encoding::BINARY
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            
            

            

            
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            
            

            

                  # Look for # encoding: *. If we find one, we'll encode the
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            
            

            

                  # String in that encoding, otherwise, we'll use the
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            
            

            

                  # default external encoding.
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            
            

            

                  if source.sub!(/\A#{ENCODING_FLAG}/, "")
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            
            

            

                    encoding = magic_encoding = $1
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            
            

            

                  else
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            
            

            

                    encoding = Encoding.default_external
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            
            

            

            
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            
            

            

                  # Tag the source with the default external encoding
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            
            

            

                  # or the encoding specified in the file
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            
            

            

                  source.force_encoding(encoding)
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            
            

            

            
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            
            

            

                  # If the user didn't specify an encoding, and the handler
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            
            

            

                  # handles encodings, we simply pass the String as is to
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            
            

            

                  # the handler (with the default_external tag)
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            
            

            

                  if !magic_encoding && @handler.respond_to?(:handles_encoding?) && @handler.handles_encoding?
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            
            

            

                    source
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            
            

            

                  # Otherwise, if the String is valid in the encoding,
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            
            

            

                  # encode immediately to default_internal. This means
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            
            

            

                  # that if a handler doesn't handle encodings, it will
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            
            

            

                  # always get Strings in the default_internal
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            
            

            

                  elsif source.valid_encoding?
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            
            

            

                    source.encode!
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            
            

            

                  # Otherwise, since the String is invalid in the encoding
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            
            

            

                  # specified, raise an exception
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            
            

            

                  else
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            
            

            

                    raise WrongEncodingError.new(source, encoding)
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            
            

            

            
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            
            

            

            
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            
            

            

                # Exceptions are marshalled when using the parallel test runner with DRb, so we need
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            
            

            

                # to ensure that references to the template object can be marshalled as well. This means forgoing
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            
            

            

                # the marshalling of the compiler mutex and instantiating that again on unmarshalling.
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            1
            

            

                def marshal_dump # :nodoc:
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            
            

            

                  [ @source, @identifier, @handler, @compiled, @locals, @virtual_path, @updated_at, @format, @variant ]
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            
            

            

            
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            1
            

            

                def marshal_load(array) # :nodoc:
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            
            

            

                  @source, @identifier, @handler, @compiled, @locals, @virtual_path, @updated_at, @format, @variant = *array
          
      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260. 
            
            

            

                  @compile_mutex = Mutex.new
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      262. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    262. 
            
            

            

            
          
      263. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    263. 
            1
            

            

                private
          
      264. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    264. 
            
            

            

                  # Compile a template. This method ensures a template is compiled
          
      265. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    265. 
            
            

            

                  # just once and removes the source after it is compiled.
          
      266. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    266. 
            1
            

            

                  def compile!(view)
          
      267. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    267. 
            
            

            

                    return if @compiled
          
      268. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    268. 
            
            

            

            
          
      269. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    269. 
            
            

            

                    # Templates can be used concurrently in threaded environments
          
      270. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    270. 
            
            

            

                    # so compilation and any instance variable modification must
          
      271. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    271. 
            
            

            

                    # be synchronized
          
      272. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    272. 
            
            

            

                    @compile_mutex.synchronize do
          
      273. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    273. 
            
            

            

                      # Any thread holding this lock will be compiling the template needed
          
      274. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    274. 
            
            

            

                      # by the threads waiting. So re-check the @compiled flag to avoid
          
      275. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    275. 
            
            

            

                      # re-compilation
          
      276. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    276. 
            
            

            

                      return if @compiled
          
      277. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    277. 
            
            

            

            
          
      278. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    278. 
            
            

            

                      mod = view.compiled_method_container
          
      279. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    279. 
            
            

            

            
          
      280. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    280. 
            
            

            

                      instrument("!compile_template") do
          
      281. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    281. 
            
            

            

                        compile(mod)
          
      282. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    282. 
            
            

            

                      end
          
      283. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    283. 
            
            

            

            
          
      284. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    284. 
            
            

            

                      @compiled = true
          
      285. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    285. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      286. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    286. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      287. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    287. 
            
            

            

            
          
      288. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    288. 
            1
            

            

                  class LegacyTemplate < DelegateClass(Template) # :nodoc:
          
      289. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    289. 
            1
            

            

                    attr_reader :source
          
      290. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    290. 
            
            

            

            
          
      291. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    291. 
            1
            

            

                    def initialize(template, source)
          
      292. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    292. 
            
            

            

                      super(template)
          
      293. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    293. 
            
            

            

                      @source = source
          
      294. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    294. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      295. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    295. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      296. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    296. 
            
            

            

            
          
      297. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    297. 
            
            

            

                  # Among other things, this method is responsible for properly setting
          
      298. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    298. 
            
            

            

                  # the encoding of the compiled template.
          
      299. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    299. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      300. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    300. 
            
            

            

                  # If the template engine handles encodings, we send the encoded
          
      301. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    301. 
            
            

            

                  # String to the engine without further processing. This allows
          
      302. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    302. 
            
            

            

                  # the template engine to support additional mechanisms for
          
      303. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    303. 
            
            

            

                  # specifying the encoding. For instance, ERB supports <%# encoding: %>
          
      304. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    304. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      305. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    305. 
            
            

            

                  # Otherwise, after we figure out the correct encoding, we then
          
      306. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    306. 
            
            

            

                  # encode the source into <tt>Encoding.default_internal</tt>.
          
      307. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    307. 
            
            

            

                  # In general, this means that templates will be UTF-8 inside of Rails,
          
      308. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    308. 
            
            

            

                  # regardless of the original source encoding.
          
      309. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    309. 
            1
            

            

                  def compile(mod)
          
      310. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    310. 
            
            

            

                    source = encode!
          
      311. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    311. 
            
            

            

                    code = @handler.call(self, source)
          
      312. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    312. 
            
            

            

            
          
      313. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    313. 
            
            

            

                    # Make sure that the resulting String to be eval'd is in the
          
      314. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    314. 
            
            

            

                    # encoding of the code
          
      315. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    315. 
            
            

            

                    original_source = source
          
      316. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    316. 
            
            

            

                    source = +<<-end_src
          
      317. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    317. 
            
            

            

                      def #{method_name}(local_assigns, output_buffer)
          
      318. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    318. 
            
            

            

                        @virtual_path = #{@virtual_path.inspect};#{locals_code};#{code}
          
      319. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    319. 
            
            

            

                      end
          
      320. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    320. 
            
            

            

                    end_src
          
      321. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    321. 
            
            

            

            
          
      322. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    322. 
            
            

            

                    # Make sure the source is in the encoding of the returned code
          
      323. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    323. 
            
            

            

                    source.force_encoding(code.encoding)
          
      324. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    324. 
            
            

            

            
          
      325. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    325. 
            
            

            

                    # In case we get back a String from a handler that is not in
          
      326. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    326. 
            
            

            

                    # BINARY or the default_internal, encode it to the default_internal
          
      327. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    327. 
            
            

            

                    source.encode!
          
      328. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    328. 
            
            

            

            
          
      329. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    329. 
            
            

            

                    # Now, validate that the source we got back from the template
          
      330. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    330. 
            
            

            

                    # handler is valid in the default_internal. This is for handlers
          
      331. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    331. 
            
            

            

                    # that handle encoding but screw up

      333.

      334.

                    end
          
      335.

                    start_line = @handler.respond_to?(:start_line) ? @handler.start_line(self) : 0

                    rescue SyntaxError

                      # Account for when code in the template is not syntactically valid; e.g. if we're using
          
      342.

            module ActionView
          
      11.
