              # = Action View Resolver
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            1
            

            

              class Resolver
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            
            

            

                # Keeps all information about view path and builds virtual path.
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            1
            

            

                class Path
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            1
            

            

                  attr_reader :name, :prefix, :partial, :virtual
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            1
            

            

                  alias_method :partial?, :partial
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            
            

            

            
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            1
            

            

                  def self.build(name, prefix, partial)
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            
            

            

                    virtual = +""
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            
            

            

                    virtual << "#{prefix}/" unless prefix.empty?
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            
            

            

                    virtual << (partial ? "_#{name}" : name)
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            
            

            

                    new name, prefix, partial, virtual
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            
            

            

            
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            1
            

            

                  def initialize(name, prefix, partial, virtual)
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            
            

            

                    @name    = name
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            
            

            

                    @prefix  = prefix
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            
            

            

                    @partial = partial
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            
            

            

                    @virtual = virtual
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            
            

            

            
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            1
            

            

                  def to_str
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            
            

            

                    @virtual
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            1
            

            

                  alias :to_s :to_str
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            
            

            

            
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            1
            

            

                class PathParser # :nodoc:
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            1
            

            

                  def build_path_regex
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            
            

            

                    handlers = Template::Handlers.extensions.map { |x| Regexp.escape(x) }.join("|")
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            
            

            

                    formats = Template::Types.symbols.map { |x| Regexp.escape(x) }.join("|")
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            
            

            

                    locales = "[a-z]{2}(?:-[A-Z]{2})?"
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            
            

            

                    variants = "[^.]*"
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            
            

            

            
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            
            

            

                    %r{
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            
            

            

                      \A
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            
            

            

                      (?:(?<prefix>.*)/)?
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            
            

            

                      (?<partial>_)?
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            
            

            

                      (?<action>.*?)
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            
            

            

                      (?:\.(?<locale>#{locales}))??
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            
            

            

                      (?:\.(?<format>#{formats}))??
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            
            

            

                      (?:\+(?<variant>#{variants}))??
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            
            

            

                      (?:\.(?<handler>#{handlers}))?
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            
            

            

                      \z
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            
            

            

                    }x
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            
            

            

            
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            1
            

            

                  def parse(path)
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            
            

            

                    @regex ||= build_path_regex
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            
            

            

                    match = @regex.match(path)
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            
            

            

                    {
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            
            

            

                      prefix: match[:prefix] || "",
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            
            

            

                      action: match[:action],
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            
            

            

                      partial: !!match[:partial],
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            
            

            

                      locale: match[:locale]&.to_sym,
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            
            

            

                      handler: match[:handler]&.to_sym,
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            
            

            

                      format: match[:format]&.to_sym,
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            
            

            

                      variant: match[:variant]
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            
            

            

                    }
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            
            

            

            
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            
            

            

                # Threadsafe template cache
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            1
            

            

                class Cache #:nodoc:
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            1
            

            

                  class SmallCache < Concurrent::Map
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            1
            

            

                    def initialize(options = {})
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            6
            

            

                      super(options.merge(initial_capacity: 2))
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            
            

            

            
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            
            

            

                  # Preallocate all the default blocks for performance/memory consumption reasons
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            1
            

            

                  PARTIAL_BLOCK = lambda { |cache, partial| cache[partial] = SmallCache.new }
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            1
            

            

                  PREFIX_BLOCK  = lambda { |cache, prefix|  cache[prefix]  = SmallCache.new(&PARTIAL_BLOCK) }
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            1
            

            

                  NAME_BLOCK    = lambda { |cache, name|    cache[name]    = SmallCache.new(&PREFIX_BLOCK) }
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            1
            

            

                  KEY_BLOCK     = lambda { |cache, key|     cache[key]     = SmallCache.new(&NAME_BLOCK) }
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            
            

            

            
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            
            

            

                  # Usually a majority of template look ups return nothing, use this canonical preallocated array to save memory
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            1
            

            

                  NO_TEMPLATES = [].freeze
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            
            

            

            
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            1
            

            

                  def initialize
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            3
            

            

                    @data = SmallCache.new(&KEY_BLOCK)
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            3
            

            

                    @query_cache = SmallCache.new
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            
            

            

            
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            1
            

            

                  def inspect
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            
            

            

                    "#{to_s[0..-2]} keys=#{@data.size} queries=#{@query_cache.size}>"
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            
            

            

            
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            
            

            

                  # Cache the templates returned by the block
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            1
            

            

                  def cache(key, name, prefix, partial, locals)
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            
            

            

                    @data[key][name][prefix][partial][locals] ||= canonical_no_templates(yield)
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            
            

            

            
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            1
            

            

                  def cache_query(query) # :nodoc:
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            
            

            

                    @query_cache[query] ||= canonical_no_templates(yield)
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            
            

            

            
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            1
            

            

                  def clear
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            3
            

            

                    @data.clear
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            3
            

            

                    @query_cache.clear
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            
            

            

            
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            
            

            

                  # Get the cache size. Do not call this
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            
            

            

                  # method. This method is not guaranteed to be here ever.
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            1
            

            

                  def size # :nodoc:
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            
            

            

                    size = 0
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            
            

            

                    @data.each_value do |v1|
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            
            

            

                      v1.each_value do |v2|
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            
            

            

                        v2.each_value do |v3|
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            
            

            

                          v3.each_value do |v4|
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            
            

            

                            size += v4.size
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            
            

            

                          end
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            
            

            

                        end
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            
            

            

                      end
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            
            

            

            
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            
            

            

                    size + @query_cache.size
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            
            

            

            
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            1
            

            

                  private
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            1
            

            

                    def canonical_no_templates(templates)
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            
            

            

                      templates.empty? ? NO_TEMPLATES : templates
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            
            

            

            
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            1
            

            

                cattr_accessor :caching, default: true
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            
            

            

            
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            1
            

            

                class << self
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            1
            

            

                  alias :caching? :caching
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            
            

            

            
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            1
            

            

                def initialize
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            3
            

            

                  @cache = Cache.new
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            
            

            

            
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            1
            

            

                def clear_cache
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            3
            

            

                  @cache.clear
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            
            

            

            
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            
            

            

                # Normalizes the arguments and passes it on to find_templates.
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            1
            

            

                def find_all(name, prefix = nil, partial = false, details = {}, key = nil, locals = [])
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            
            

            

                  locals = locals.map(&:to_s).sort!.freeze
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            
            

            

            
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            
            

            

                  cached(key, [name, prefix, partial], details, locals) do
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            
            

            

                    _find_all(name, prefix, partial, details, key, locals)
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            
            

            

            
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            1
            

            

                alias :find_all_anywhere :find_all
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            1
            

            

                deprecate :find_all_anywhere
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            
            

            

            
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            1
            

            

                def find_all_with_query(query) # :nodoc:
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            
            

            

                  @cache.cache_query(query) { find_template_paths(File.join(@path, query)) }
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            
            

            

            
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            1
            

            

              private
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            1
            

            

                def _find_all(name, prefix, partial, details, key, locals)
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            
            

            

                  find_templates(name, prefix, partial, details, locals)
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            
            

            

            
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            1
            

            

                delegate :caching?, to: :class
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            
            

            

            
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            
            

            

                # This is what child classes implement. No defaults are needed
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            
            

            

                # because Resolver guarantees that the arguments are present and
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            
            

            

                # normalized.
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            1
            

            

                def find_templates(name, prefix, partial, details, locals = [])
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            
            

            

                  raise NotImplementedError, "Subclasses must implement a find_templates(name, prefix, partial, details, locals = []) method"
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            
            

            

            
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            
            

            

                # Handles templates caching. If a key is given and caching is on
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            
            

            

                # always check the cache before hitting the resolver. Otherwise,
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            
            

            

                # it always hits the resolver but if the key is present, check if the
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            
            

            

                # resolver is fresher before returning it.
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            1
            

            

                def cached(key, path_info, details, locals)
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            
            

            

                  name, prefix, partial = path_info
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            
            

            

            
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            
            

            

                  if key
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            
            

            

                    @cache.cache(key, name, prefix, partial, locals) do
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            
            

            

                      yield
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            
            

            

                  else
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            
            

            

                    yield
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            
            

            

            
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            
            

            

              # An abstract class that implements a Resolver with path semantics.
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            1
            

            

              class PathResolver < Resolver #:nodoc:
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            1
            

            

                EXTENSIONS = { locale: ".", formats: ".", variants: "+", handlers: "." }
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            1
            

            

                DEFAULT_PATTERN = ":prefix/:action{.:locale,}{.:formats,}{+:variants,}{.:handlers,}"
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            
            

            

            
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            1
            

            

                def initialize(pattern = nil)
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            3
            

            

                  if pattern
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            
            

            

                    ActiveSupport::Deprecation.warn "Specifying a custom path for #{self.class} is deprecated. Implement a custom Resolver subclass instead."
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            
            

            

                    @pattern = pattern
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            
            

            

                  else
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            3
            

            

                    @pattern = DEFAULT_PATTERN
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            3
            

            

                  @unbound_templates = Concurrent::Map.new
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            3
            

            

                  @path_parser = PathParser.new
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            3
            

            

                  super()
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            
            

            

            
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            1
            

            

                def clear_cache
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            3
            

            

                  @unbound_templates.clear
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            3
            

            

                  @path_parser = PathParser.new
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            3
            

            

                  super()
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            
            

            

            
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            1
            

            

                private
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            1
            

            

                  def _find_all(name, prefix, partial, details, key, locals)
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            
            

            

                    path = Path.build(name, prefix, partial)
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            
            

            

                    query(path, details, details[:formats], locals, cache: !!key)
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            
            

            

            
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            1
            

            

                  def query(path, details, formats, locals, cache:)
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            
            

            

                    template_paths = find_template_paths_from_details(path, details)
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            
            

            

                    template_paths = reject_files_external_to_app(template_paths)
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            
            

            

            
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            
            

            

                    template_paths.map do |template|
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            
            

            

                      unbound_template =
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            
            

            

                        if cache
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            
            

            

                          @unbound_templates.compute_if_absent([template, path.virtual]) do
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            
            

            

                            build_unbound_template(template, path.virtual)
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            
            

            

                          end
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            
            

            

                        else
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            
            

            

                          build_unbound_template(template, path.virtual)
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            
            

            

                        end
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            
            

            

            
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            
            

            

                      unbound_template.bind_locals(locals)
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            
            

            

            
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            1
            

            

                  def source_for_template(template)
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            
            

            

                    Template::Sources::File.new(template)
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            
            

            

            
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            1
            

            

                  def build_unbound_template(template, virtual_path)
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            
            

            

                    handler, format, variant = extract_handler_and_format_and_variant(template)
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            
            

            

                    source = source_for_template(template)
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            
            

            

            
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            
            

            

                    UnboundTemplate.new(
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            
            

            

                      source,
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            
            

            

                      template,
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            
            

            

                      handler,
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            
            

            

                      virtual_path: virtual_path,
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            
            

            

                      format: format,
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            
            

            

                      variant: variant,
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            
            

            

                    )
          
      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261. 
            
            

            

            
          
      262. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    262. 
            1
            

            

                  def reject_files_external_to_app(files)
          
      263. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    263. 
            
            

            

                    files.reject { |filename| !inside_path?(@path, filename) }
          
      264. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    264. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      265. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    265. 
            
            

            

            
          
      266. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    266. 
            1
            

            

                  def find_template_paths_from_details(path, details)
          
      267. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    267. 
            
            

            

                    if path.name.include?(".")
          
      268. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    268. 
            
            

            

                      ActiveSupport::Deprecation.warn("Rendering actions with '.' in the name is deprecated: #{path}")
          
      269. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    269. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      270. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    270. 
            
            

            

            
          
      271. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    271. 
            
            

            

                    query = build_query(path, details)
          
      272. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    272. 
            
            

            

                    find_template_paths(query)
          
      273. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    273. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      274. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    274. 
            
            

            

            
          
      275. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    275. 
            1
            

            

                  def find_template_paths(query)
          
      276. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    276. 
            
            

            

                    Dir[query].uniq.reject do |filename|
          
      277. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    277. 
            
            

            

                      File.directory?(filename) ||
          
      278. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    278. 
            
            

            

                        # deals with case-insensitive file systems.
          
      279. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    279. 
            
            

            

                        !File.fnmatch(query, filename, File::FNM_EXTGLOB)
          
      280. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    280. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      281. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    281. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      282. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    282. 
            
            

            

            
          
      283. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    283. 
            1
            

            

                  def inside_path?(path, filename)
          
      284. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    284. 
            
            

            

                    filename = File.expand_path(filename)
          
      285. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    285. 
            
            

            

                    path = File.join(path, "")
          
      286. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    286. 
            
            

            

                    filename.start_with?(path)
          
      287. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    287. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      288. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    288. 
            
            

            

            
          
      289. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    289. 
            
            

            

                  # Helper for building query glob string based on resolver's pattern.
          
      290. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    290. 
            1
            

            

                  def build_query(path, details)
          
      291. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    291. 
            
            

            

                    query = @pattern.dup
          
      292. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    292. 
            
            

            

            
          
      293. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    293. 
            
            

            

                    prefix = path.prefix.empty? ? "" : "#{escape_entry(path.prefix)}\\1"
          
      294. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    294. 
            
            

            

                    query.gsub!(/:prefix(\/)?/, prefix)
          
      295. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    295. 
            
            

            

            
          
      296. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    296. 
            
            

            

                    partial = escape_entry(path.partial? ? "_#{path.name}" : path.name)
          
      297. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    297. 
            
            

            

                    query.gsub!(":action", partial)
          
      298. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    298. 
            
            

            

            
          
      299. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    299. 
            
            

            

                    details.each do |ext, candidates|
          
      300. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    300. 
            
            

            

                      if ext == :variants && candidates == :any
          
      301. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    301. 
            
            

            

                        query.gsub!(/:#{ext}/, "*")
          
      302. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    302. 
            
            

            

                      else
          
      303. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    303. 
            
            

            

                        query.gsub!(/:#{ext}/, "{#{candidates.compact.uniq.join(',')}}")
          
      304. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    304. 
            
            

            

                      end
          
      305. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    305. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      306. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    306. 
            
            

            

            
          
      307. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    307. 
            
            

            

                    File.expand_path(query, @path)
          
      308. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    308. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      309. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    309. 
            
            

            

            
          
      310. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    310. 
            1
            

            

                  def escape_entry(entry)
          
      311. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    311. 
            
            

            

                    entry.gsub(/[*?{}\[\]]/, '\\\\\\&')
          
      312. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    312. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      313. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    313. 
            
            

            

            
          
      314. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    314. 
            
            

            

                  # Extract handler, formats and variant from path. If a format cannot be found neither
          
      315. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    315. 
            
            

            

                  # from the path, or the handler, we should return the array of formats given
          
      316. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    316. 
            
            

            

                  # to the resolver.
          
      317. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    317. 
            1
            

            

                  def extract_handler_and_format_and_variant(path)
          
      318. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    318. 
            
            

            

                    details = @path_parser.parse(path)
          
      319. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    319. 
            
            

            

            
          
      320. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    320. 
            
            

            

                    handler = Template.handler_for_extension(details[:handler])
          
      321. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    321. 
            
            

            

                    format = details[:format] || handler.try(:default_format)
          
      322. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    322. 
            
            

            

                    variant = details[:variant]
          
      323. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    323. 
            
            

            

            
          
      324. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    324. 
            
            

            

                    # Template::Types[format] and handler.default_format can return nil
          
      325. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    325. 
            
            

            

                    [handler, format, variant]
          
      326. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    326. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      327. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    327. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      328. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    328. 
            
            

            

            
          
      329. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    329. 
            
            

            

              # A resolver that loads files from the filesystem.
          
      330. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    330. 
            1
            

            

              class FileSystemResolver < PathResolver
          
      331. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    331. 
            1
            

            

                attr_reader :path
          
      332. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    332. 
            
            

            

            
          
      333. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    333. 
            1
            

            

                def initialize(path, pattern = nil)
          
      334. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    334. 
            3
            

            

                  raise ArgumentError, "path already is a Resolver class" if path.is_a?(Resolver)
          
      335. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    335. 
            3
            

            

                  super(pattern)
          
      336. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    336. 
            3
            

            

                  @path = File.expand_path(path)
          
      337. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    337. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      338. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    338. 
            
            

            

            
          
      339. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    339. 
            1
            

            

                def to_s
          
      340. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    340. 
            
            

            

                  @path.to_s
          
      341. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    341. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      342. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    342. 
            1
            

            

                alias :to_path :to_s
          
      343. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    343. 
            
            

            

            
          
      344. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    344. 
            1
            

            

                def eql?(resolver)
          
      345. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    345. 
            
            

            

                  self.class.equal?(resolver.class) && to_path == resolver.to_path
          
      346. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    346. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      347. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    347. 
            1
            

            

                alias :== :eql?
          
      348. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    348. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      349. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    349. 
            
            

            

            
          
      350. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    350. 
            
            

            

              # An Optimized resolver for Rails' most common case.
          
      351. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    351. 
            1
            

            

              class OptimizedFileSystemResolver < FileSystemResolver #:nodoc:
          
      352. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    352. 
            1
            

            

                def initialize(path)
          
      353. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    353. 
            1
            

            

                  super(path)
          
      354. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    354. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      355. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    355. 
            
            

            

            
          
      356. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    356. 
            1
            

            

                private
          
      357. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    357. 
            1
            

            

                  def find_candidate_template_paths(path)
          
      358. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    358. 
            
            

            

                    # Instead of checking for every possible path, as our other globs would
          
      359. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    359. 
            
            

            

                    # do, scan the directory for files with the right prefix.
          
      360. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    360. 
            
            

            

                    query = "#{escape_entry(File.join(@path, path))}*"
          
      361. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    361. 
            
            

            

            
          
      362. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    362. 
            
            

            

                    Dir[query].reject do |filename|
          
      363. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    363. 
            
            

            

                      File.directory?(filename)
          
      364. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    364. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      365. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    365. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      366. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    366. 
            
            

            

            
          
      367. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    367. 
            1
            

            

                  def find_template_paths_from_details(path, details)
          
      368. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    368. 
            
            

            

                    if path.name.include?(".")
          
      369. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    369. 
            
            

            

                      # Fall back to the unoptimized resolver, which will warn
          
      370. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    370. 
            
            

            

                      return super
          
      371. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    371. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      372. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    372. 
            
            

            

            
          
      373. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    373. 
            
            

            

                    candidates = find_candidate_template_paths(path)
          
      374. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    374. 
            
            

            

            
          
      375. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    375. 
            
            

            

                    regex = build_regex(path, details)
          
      376. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    376. 
            
            

            

            
          
      377. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    377. 
            
            

            

                    candidates.uniq.reject do |filename|
          
      378. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    378. 
            
            

            

                      # This regex match does double duty of finding only files which match
          
      379. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    379. 
            
            

            

                      # details (instead of just matching the prefix) and also filtering for
          
      380. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    380. 
            
            

            

                      # case-insensitive file systems.
          
      381. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    381. 
            
            

            

                      !regex.match?(filename) ||
          
      382. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    382. 
            
            

            

                        File.directory?(filename)
          
      383. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    383. 
            
            

            

                    end.sort_by do |filename|
          
      384. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    384. 
            
            

            

                      # Because we scanned the directory, instead of checking for files
          
      385. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    385. 
            
            

            

                      # one-by-one, they will be returned in an arbitrary order.
          
      386. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    386. 
            
            

            

                      # We can use the matches found by the regex and sort by their index in
          
      387. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    387. 
            
            

            

                      # details.
          
      388. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    388. 
            
            

            

                      match = filename.match(regex)
          
      389. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    389. 
            
            

            

                      EXTENSIONS.keys.map do |ext|
          
      390. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    390. 
            
            

            

                        if ext == :variants && details[ext] == :any
          
      391. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    391. 
            
            

            

                          match[ext].nil? ? 0 : 1
          
      392. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    392. 
            
            

            

                        elsif match[ext].nil?
          
      393. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    393. 
            
            

            

                          # No match should be last
          
      394. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    394. 
            
            

            

                          details[ext].length
          
      395. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    395. 
            
            

            

                        else
          
      396. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    396. 
            
            

            

                          found = match[ext].to_sym
          
      397. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    397. 
            
            

            

                          details[ext].index(found)
          
      398. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    398. 
            
            

            

                        end
          
      399. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    399. 
            
            

            

                      end
          
      400. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    400. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      401. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    401. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      402. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    402. 
            
            

            

            
          
      403. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    403. 
            1
            

            

                  def build_regex(path, details)
          
      404. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    404. 
            
            

            

                    query = Regexp.escape(File.join(@path, path))
          
      405. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    405. 
            
            

            

                    exts = EXTENSIONS.map do |ext, prefix|
          
      406. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    406. 
            
            

            

                      match =
          
      407. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    407. 
            
            

            

                        if ext == :variants && details[ext] == :any
          
      408. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    408. 
            
            

            

                          ".*?"
          
      409. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    409. 
            
            

            

                        else
          
      410. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    410. 
            
            

            

                          arr = details[ext].compact
          
      411. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    411. 
            
            

            

                          arr.uniq!
          
      412. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    412. 
            
            

            

                          arr.map! { |e| Regexp.escape(e) }
          
      413. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    413. 
            
            

            

                          arr.join("|")
          
      414. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    414.

                    def view_rendered?(view, expected_locals)

                        expected_locals.all? { |key, value| value == actual_locals[key] }

      157.

                    def render(options = {}, local_assigns = {})

    194. 
            
            

            

                      case options
          
      195.

      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197.

    198. 
            
            

            

                        elsif options.key?(:partial)
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            
            

            

                          rendered_views.add options[:partial], options[:locals]
          
      200.

      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            
            

            

                      else

    202.

      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            
            

            

                      end

                  # Returns a Hash of instance variables and their values, as defined by
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            
            

            

                  # the user in the test case, which are then assigned to the view being

                  # frameworks.

                  def method_missing(selector, *args)
          
      269. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    269. 
            
            

            

                    begin
          
      270. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    270. 
            
            

            

                      routes = @controller.respond_to?(:_routes) && @controller._routes
          
      271. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    271. 
            
            

            

                    rescue
          
      272. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    272. 
            
            

            

                      # Don't call routes, if there is an error on _routes call
          
      273. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    273. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      274. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    274. 
            
            

            

            
          
      275. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    275. 
            
            

            

                    if routes &&
          
      276. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    276. 
            
            

            

                       (routes.named_routes.route_defined?(selector) ||
          
      277. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    277. 
            
            

            

                         routes.mounted_helpers.method_defined?(selector))
          
      278. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    278. 
            
            

            

                      @controller.__send__(selector, *args)
          
      279. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    279. 
            
            

            

                    else
          
      280. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    280.

      281. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    281.

                  end

            module ActionView #:nodoc:

              # Use FixtureResolver in your tests to simulate the presence of files on the
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            
            

            

              # file system. This is used internally by Rails' own test suite, and is
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            
            

            

              # useful for testing extensions that have no way of knowing what the file
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            
            

            

              # system will look like at runtime.
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            1
            

            

              class FixtureResolver < OptimizedFileSystemResolver
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            1
            

            

                def initialize(hash = {}, pattern = nil)
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            
            

            

                  super("")
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            
            

            

                  if pattern
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            
            

            

                    ActiveSupport::Deprecation.warn "Specifying a custom path for #{self.class} is deprecated. Implement a custom Resolver subclass instead."
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            
            

            

                    @pattern = pattern
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            
            

            

                  @hash = hash

                  @path = ""

                end

                def data

                  @hash

                def to_s

                  def find_candidate_template_paths(path)
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            
            

            

                    @hash.keys.select do |fixture|
          
      32.

                      fixture.start_with?(path.virtual)
